traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: The ancient deep crow has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Shadow Stealth
traits.text: While in dim light or darkness, the ancient deep crow can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The ancient deep crow makes three attacks: one with its mandibles and two with its claws.

actions.name: Mandibles
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. On hit: 17 (2d10 + 6) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 19). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the ancient deep crow can't use its mandibles on another target.

actions.name: Claw
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) slashing damage.

actions.name: Shadow Caw
actions.text: The ancient deep crow releases an ear-splitting caw. Each creature within 60 feet of the crow and able to hear it must make a DC 17 Constitution saving throw. On a failure, a creature takes 10 (3d6) psychic damage.

legendary_actions.name: ​
legendary_actions.text: The Ancient Deep Crow can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The Ancient Deep Crow regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary_actions.name: Detect
legendary_actions.text: The deep crow makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

legendary_actions.name: Shadow Caw (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.text: The ancient deep crow uses Shadow Caw.

legendary_actions.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.text: The ancient deep crow beats its wings. Each creature within 10 feet of the deep crow must succeed on a DC 19 Dexterity saving throw or take 13 (2d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone. The ancient deep crow can then fly up to half its flying speed.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Auspicia makes two attacks.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Light Crossbow
actions.text: Ranged weapon attack +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. On hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.text: Brahma has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put her to sleep.

traits.name: Taunt (2/Day)
traits.text: Brahma can use a bonus action to target one creature she can see within 30 feet of her. If the target can hear Brahma, it must succeed on a DC 13 Charisma saving throw or have disadvantage on ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws until the start of Brahma's next turn.

actions.name: War Lute
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Song of Domination (3/Day)
actions.text: Brahma targets one creature that can see or hear her, which must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or be charmed by her for 1 minute. The target can repeat the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. It has disadvantage on these saves if being charmed by Brahma is something the target openly or secretly desires. For 1 hour after the charm effect ends, the target has disadvantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma checks made as part of a contest with Brahma.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: The chaos quadrapod has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The chaos quadrapod makes up to two tentacle attacks.

actions.name: Tentacle
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +6 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. On hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it is grappled (escape DC 14). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained. The chaos quadrapod can grapple no more than two targets at a time.

actions.name: Chaos Cloud (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
actions.text: The chaos quadrapod shoots forth a knot of roiling ethereal light that explodes at a point it can see within 60 feet of it. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must succeed on a DC 14 Charisma saving throw or be stunned until the end of its next turn.

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.text: While the clockwork dragon remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a metal statue.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Fire Breath (recharge 5-6)
actions.text: The clockwork dragon exhales fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 11 Dexterity saving throw, taking 14 (4d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: The deep crow has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Shadow Stealth
traits.text: While in dim light or darkness, the deep crow can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.text: While in sunlight, the deep crow has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The deep crow makes three attacks: one with its mandibles and two with its claws.

actions.name: Mandibles
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. On hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 17). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the deep crow can't use its mandibles on another target.

actions.name: Claw
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage.

traits.name: Champion Challenge (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
traits.text: As a bonus action, Donaar causes each creature of his choice that he can see within 30 feet of him to make a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, a creature can't willingly move more than 30 feet away from Donaar. This effect ends on the creature if Donaar is incapacitated or dies, or if the creature is moved more than 30 feet away from him.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Donaar makes two attacks with his greatsword or his whip.

actions.name: Greatsword
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage. Whenever Donaar rolls a 1 or 2 on a damage die, he can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

actions.name: Whip
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. On hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Acid Vomit
actions.text: Donaar regurgitates acid in a 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 7 (2d6) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.text: Melee or ranged weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. On hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

traits.name: Special Equipment
traits.text: Jim carries a wand of wonder. Benign Transportation (Recharges after Jim Casts a Conjuration Spell of 1st Level or Higher). As a bonus action, Jim teleports up to 30 feet to a space he can see. The space must be unoccupied or occupied by a willing Small or Medium creature. If the latter, Jim and the willing creature both teleport, swapping places.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.text: Melee or ranged weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. On hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Minor Conjuration
actions.text: Jim conjures an inanimate object, no larger than 3 feet on a side and no more than 10 pounds, in his hand or on the ground in an unoccupied space he can see within 10 feet of him. The object is visibly magical, radiating dim light out to 5 feet. It disappears if it takes any damage, after 1 hour, or when Jim uses this feature again.

traits.name: Special Equipment
traits.text: K'thriss wears a robe of stars (accounted for in his statistics). The robe allows him to cast the following spells: 6/day: magic missile (7 missiles)

traits.name: Awakened Mind
traits.text: K'thriss can telepathically speak to any creature he can see within 30 feet of him, provided the creature can understand at least one language.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.text: K'thriss has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put him to sleep. Sunlight Sensitivity. While in sunlight, K'thriss has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: K'thriss makes two attacks with his sickle.

actions.name: Sickle
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.

traits.name: Customizable Storage
traits.text: A keg robot can hold up to three types of liquid payload totaling 12 gallons within its hollow, barrel-shaped body. A full keg robot can make one liquid attack per gallon before the liquid must be refilled. Filling a keg robot takes 2 rounds per gallon. Differing payloads can alter the keg robot's attacks from those presented here.

actions.name: Fist
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Acid Squirt
actions.text: Ranged weapon attack +5 to hit, range 20/40 ft., one target. On hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) acid damage.

actions.name: Beer Shower
actions.text:
The keg robot spews an unnaturally potent beer in a 15-foot cone or in a 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in the area must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned. While poisoned in this way, a creature has its speed halved by exposure to the potent brew. An affected creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Additionally, the beer shower extinguishes any fires or open flames in its area.

actions.name: Hot Oil Spray (recharge 5-6)
actions.text:
The keg robot sprays hot oil in a 15-foot cone or in a 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in the area must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 7 (1d8 + 3) fire damage and falls prone. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and doesn't fall prone.

Any creature affected by the hot oil spray that takes fire damage before the oil dries (after 1 minute) takes an additional 3 (1d6) fire damage, and the oil burns away.

If the oil that remains in the area of the spray is lit, it burns for 1d4 rounds and deals 3 (1d6) fire damage to any creature that enters the area for the first time on a turn or ends its turn there.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.text: Môrgæn has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put her to sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Môrgæn makes three attacks with her scimitars or her longbow.

actions.name: Scimitars
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.text: Ranged weapon attack +6 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. On hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.text: Oak has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put him to sleep.

traits.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
traits.text: Oak has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Oak makes three attacks with his hooked daggers or his hand crossbow.

actions.name: Hooked Dagger
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Hand Crossbow
actions.text: Ranged weapon attack +5 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. On hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

traits.name: Divine Strike
traits.text: Once on each of his turns when he hits a creature with a weapon attack, Omin can cause the attack to deal an extra 4 (1d8) damage of the same type dealt by the weapon.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.text: Omin has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put him to sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Omin makes two attacks with his maul.

actions.name: Maul
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Echo Spell (1/Day)
traits.text: Pendragon can cast the spell he cast on his last turn, whose casting time becomes 1 bonus action. This bonus casting uses a spell slot as normal.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

traits.name: Divine Display (1/Day)
traits.text: As a bonus action, Phoenix causes his shield to flare with divine light. Each creature of his choice within 30 feet of him must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or be blinded for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself with a success.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Phoenix makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Warhammer
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 12 Strength saving throw or be pushed 5 feet.

traits.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
traits.text: Portentia deals an extra 14 (4d6) damage when she hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of Portentia that isn't incapacitated and Portentia doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Portentia makes three melee attacks.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Change Shape
actions.text: Portentia magically polymorphs into a humanoid or beast that has a challenge rating equal to or less than her own, or back into her true form. Any equipment she is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (her choice). In a new form, Portentia retains her game statistics and ability to speak, but her AC, movement modes, Strength, Dexterity, and special senses are replaced by those of the new form, and she gains any statistics and capabilities (except class features, legendary actions, and lair actions) that the new form has but that she lacks.

traits.name: Divine Eminence
traits.text: As a bonus action, Prophetess can expend a spell slot to cause her melee weapon attacks to magically deal an extra 10 (3d6) radiant damage to a target on a hit. This benefit lasts until the end of the turn. If Prophetess expends a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the extra damage increases by 1d6 for each level above 1st.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.text: Prophetess has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put her to sleep.

actions.name: Maul
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Brave
traits.text: Rosie has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

traits.name: Halfling Nimbleness
traits.text: Rosie can move through the space of any creature that is of a size larger than hers.

traits.name: Evasion
traits.text: If Rosie is subjected to an effect that allows her to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, she instead takes no damage if she succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if she fails. She can't use this trait if she's incapacitated.

traits.name: Shadow Step
traits.text: When Rosie is in dim light or darkness, she can use a bonus action to teleport 60 feet to an unoccupied space she can see that is also in dim light or darkness. She then has advantage on the first melee attack she makes before the end of the turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Rosie makes three attacks, then makes two unarmed strike attacks.

actions.name: Staff of the Master (+1 Quarterstaff)
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage, or 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Unarmed Strike
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage. Rosie's unarmed strikes are magical.

traits.name: Defensive Advantage
traits.text: As long as two or more of Splugoth's allies are within 5 feet of him and are not incapacitated, attack rolls against him are made with disadvantage.

traits.name: Nimble Escape
traits.text: Splugoth can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of his turns.

traits.name: Touch of Madness
traits.text: Splugoth has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Splugoth makes two attacks with his dagger.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Word From Beyond (1/Day)
actions.text: Splugoth remembers and repeats aloud a few words from a place he entered while walking back from the next world to this one. Each creature of his choice within 30 feet of him that can hear him must succeed on a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw or be stunned until the end of its next turn.

name: Viari
ac: 18 (+1 studded leather); 19 (while wielding two melee weapons) (+1 studded leather)

traits.name: Evasion
traits.text: If Viari is subjected to an effect that allows him to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, he instead takes no damage if he succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if he fails. He can't use this trait if he's incapacitated.

traits.name: Second-Story Work
traits.text: Climbing does not cost Viari extra movement. Additionally, when he makes a running jump, the distance he covers increases by 5 feet.

traits.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
traits.text: Viari deals an extra 14 (4d6) damage when he hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of Viari that isn't incapacitated and Viari doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Viari makes two attacks with his shortsword and two attacks with his rapier.

actions.name: +1 Shortsword
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 9 (1d6 + 6) piercing damage.

actions.name: Rapier
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) piercing damage.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.text: Melee or ranged weapon attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. On hit: 7 (1d4 + 5) piercing damage.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.text: Walnut has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put her to sleep.

traits.name: Mask of the Wild
traits.text: Walnut can attempt to hide even when she is only lightly obscured by foliage, heavy rain, falling snow, mist, and other natural phenomena.

traits.name: Wild Shape (Recharges after a Short or Long rest)
traits.text:
As a bonus action, Walnut can assume the shape of a dire wolf. She can stay in this form for 3 hours or until she reverts to her normal form as a bonus action. She automatically reverts if she falls unconscious, drops to 0 hit points, or dies.

While transformed, Walnut's game statistics are replaced by the statistics of the dire wolf, except she retains her alignment, personality, and Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores.

Her attacks in beast form are magical. While in beast form, Walnut can use a bonus action to expend one spell slot and regain 1d8 hit points per level of the spell slot expended.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Walnut makes two attacks with Foremother or her longbow.

actions.name: Foremother (+1 Scimitar)
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.text: Ranged weapon attack +5 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. On hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

name: Abyssal Chicken
speed: walk 30 ft., fly 30 ft. (see bad flier below)

traits.name: Bad Flier
traits.text: The abyssal chicken falls at the end of a turn if it's airborne and the only thing holding it aloft is its flying speed.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The abyssal chicken makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. On hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

traits.name: Suave Defense
traits.text: While Amrik is wearing light or no armor and wielding no shield, his AC includes his Charisma modifier.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Amrik makes three dagger attacks.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.text: Melee or ranged weapon attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. On hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Smoke Bomb (1/Day)
actions.text: Amrik hurls a smoke bomb up to 20 feet away. The bomb explodes on impact, creating a cloud of black smoke that fills a 10-foot-radius sphere. The area within the cloud is heavily obscured. A strong wind disperses the cloud, which otherwise remains until the end of Amrik's next turn.

name: Arkhan the Cruel
senses: darkvision 60 ft. (can see invisible creatures out to the same range)

traits.name: Aura of Hate
traits.text: While Arkhan isn't incapacitated, he and all fiends and undead within 30 feet of him deal 4 extra damage whenever they hit with a melee weapon attack (already factored into Arkhan's attacks). This extra damage is of the same type as the weapon's damage type.

traits.name: Hand of Vecna
traits.text: The Hand of Vecna has 8 charges and regains 1d4 + 4 expended charges daily at dawn. Arkhan can cast the following spells from the hand by expending the specified number of charges (spell save DC 18): finger of death (5 charges), sleep (1 charge), slow (2 charges), and teleport (3 charges).

traits.name: Special Equipment
traits.text: Arkhan wields Fane-Eater and wears a suit of Obsidian Flint Dragon Plate. The armor gives Arkhan advantage on ability checks and saving throws made to avoid or end the grappled condition on him.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Arkhan makes three weapon attacks.

actions.name: Fane-Eater (Battleaxe)
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +13 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 16 (1d8 + 12) slashing damage, or 17 (1d10 + 12) slashing damage when used with two hands, plus 9 (2d8) cold damage. If the target is a creature and Arkhan rolls a 20 on the attack roll, the creature takes an extra 9 (2d8) necrotic damage, and Arkhan regains an amount of hit points equal to the necrotic damage dealt.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.text: Melee or ranged weapon attack +10 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. On hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) piercing damage, plus 4 piercing damage and 9 (2d8) cold damage if the javelin was used to make a melee attack.

traits.name: Fear Aura
traits.text: Any creature hostile to Bel that starts its turn within 20 feet of him must make a DC 23 Wisdom saving throw, unless Bel is incapacitated. Unless the save succeeds, the creature is frightened until the start of its next turn. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to Bel's Fear Aura for the next 24 hours.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.text: If Bel fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: Bel has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.text: Bel's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Bel makes three attacks: two with his greatsword and one with his tail.

actions.name: Greatsword
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +16 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. On hit: 23 (4d6 + 9) slashing damage plus 21 (6d6) fire damage. If the target is a flammable object that is not being held or worn, it catches fire.

actions.name: Tail
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +16 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. On hit: 25 (3d10 + 9) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 23 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of its next turn.

legendary_actions.name: ​
legendary_actions.text: The Bel can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The Bel regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary_actions.name: Fireball
legendary_actions.text: Bel casts fireball.

legendary_actions.name: Tactical Edge (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.text: Roll a d6 for Bel. The number rolled on the die is subtracted from the next attack roll made against Bel or an ally of his choice within the next minute.

legendary_actions.name: Summon Ice Devil (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.text: Bel magically summons an ice devil with an ice spear (as described in the ice devil's entry in the Monster Manual). The ice devil appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of Bel, acts as Bel's ally, and can summon other devils if it has such power. The ice devil remains until Bel dies or until he dismisses it as an action.

traits.name: Aura of Terror
traits.text: When a hostile creature within 5 feet of the black gauntlet makes an attack roll or a saving throw, it has disadvantage on the roll. Creatures that are immune to the frightened condition are immune to this trait.

traits.name: Tactical Discipline
traits.text: The black gauntlet has advantage on all ability checks and saving throws made during combat.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The black gauntlet makes two attacks with its mace.

actions.name: Mace
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 13 (3d8) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Guiding Bolt (1st-Level Spell; Requires a Spell Slot)
actions.text: rs +7 to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. On hit: 14 (4d6) radiant damage, and the next attack roll made against the target before the end of the black gauntlet's next turn has advantage. If the black gauntlet casts this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 1st.

traits.name: Adhesive
traits.text: The bone whelk can cause Medium or smaller objects to adhere to it. A Medium or smaller creature that touches the bone whelk is grappled by it (escape DC 10).

traits.name: Death Scream
traits.text: When the bone whelk dies, it emits a blood-curdling shriek than can be heard out to a range of 120 feet. This shriek causes nonmagical, organic material within 10 feet of the bone whelk to rot. Each creature within 10 feet of the bone whelk when it dies takes 9 (2d8) necrotic damage.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.text: The bone whelk can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. On hit: 4 (1d8) piercing damage.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.text: Crokek'toeck can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: Crokek'toeck has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.text: Crokek'toeck's weapon attacks are magical.

traits.name: Secure Memory
traits.text: Crokek'toeck is immune to the waters of the River Styx as well as any effect that would steal or modify its memories or detect or read its thoughts.

traits.name: Standing Leap
traits.text: Crokek'toeck's long jump is up to 60 feet and its high jump is up to 30 feet, with or without a running start.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +14 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. On hit: 44 (10d6 + 9) piercing damage.

actions.name: Disgorge Allies (recharge on 6)
actions.text: Crokek'toeck opens its mouth and disgorges 1d4 barlguras, 3d6 gnolls led by 1 gnoll fang of Yeenoghu, 6d6 dretches, or 1d3 vrocks. Each creature it disgorges appears in an unoccupied space within 30 feet of Crokek'toeck's mouth, or the next closest unoccupied space.

traits.name: Aura of Murder
traits.text: As long as the death's head is not incapacitated, hostile creatures within 5 feet of it gain vulnerability to piercing damage unless they have resistance or immunity to such damage.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: The death's head has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The death's head uses Stunning Gaze and makes two dagger attacks.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.text: Melee or ranged weapon attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. On hit: 7 (1d4 + 5) piercing damage.

actions.name: Stunning Gaze
actions.text: The death's head targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or be stunned until the end of its next turn.

traits.name: Dark Devotion
traits.text: Thalamra has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

traits.name: Devil's Sight
traits.text: Thalamra can see normally in darkness, both magical and nonmagical, out to a distance of 120 feet.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Thalamra uses eldritch blast twice or makes two unarmed strikes.

actions.name: Eldritch Blast (Cantrip)
actions.text: rs +6 to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. On hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) force damage.

actions.name: Unarmed Strike
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 4 bludgeoning damage.

name: Fiendish Flesh Golem
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

traits.name: Berserk
traits.text: Whenever the golem starts its turn with 100 hit points or fewer, roll a d6. On a 6, the golem goes berserk. On each of its turns while berserk, the golem attacks the nearest creature it can see. If no creature is near enough to move to and attack, the golem attacks an object, with preference for an object smaller than itself. Once the golem goes berserk, it continues to do so until it is destroyed or regains all its hit points. If the golem's creator is within 60 feet of the berserk golem, the creator can try to calm it by speaking firmly and persuasively. The golem must be able to hear its creator, who must take an action to make a DC 15 Charisma (Persuasion) check. If the check succeeds, the golem ceases being berserk. If it takes damage while still at 100 hit points or fewer, the golem might go berserk again.

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.text: The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

traits.name: Lightning Absorption
traits.text: Whenever the golem is subjected to lightning damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the lightning damage dealt.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: The golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.text: The golem's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The golem makes two slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Tactical Discipline
traits.text: The fist of Bane has advantage on all ability checks and saving throws made during combat.

actions.name: Mace
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.text: Ranged weapon attack +2 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. On hit: 4 (1d8) piercing damage.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.text: Gideon regains 10 hit points at the start of each of his turns. If he takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of his next turn. Gideon is destroyed only if he starts his turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Gideon attacks twice with his fists.

actions.name: Fist
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Withering Gaze
actions.text: Gideon targets one creature he can see within 60 feet of him. The target must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.text: The hellwasp's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The hellwasp makes two attacks: one with its sting and one with its sword talons.

actions.name: Sting
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. On hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) fire damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. While poisoned in this way, the target is also paralyzed. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Sword Talons
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.

traits.name: Aura of Invulnerability
traits.text: An invisible aura forms a 10-foot-radius sphere around the hollyphant for as long as it lives. Any spell of 5th level or lower cast from outside the barrier can't affect creatures or objects within it, even if the spell is cast using a higher level spell slot. Such a spell can target creatures and objects within the barrier, but the spell has no effect on them. Similarly, the area within the barrier is excluded from the areas affected by such spells. The hollyphant can use an action to suppress this trait until its concentration ends (as if concentrating on a spell).

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.text: The hollyphant's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Tusks
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 3 (1d6) piercing damage.

actions.name: Trumpet (3/Day)
actions.text: The hollyphant blows air through its trunk, creating a trumpet sound that can be heard out to a range of 600 feet. The trumpet also creates a 30-foot cone of energy that has one of the following effects, chosen by the hollyphant:

actions.name: Trumpet of Blasting
actions.text: Each creature in the cone must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 17 (5d6) thunder damage and is deafened for 1 minute. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't deafened. Nonmagical objects in the cone that aren't being held or worn take 35 (10d6) thunder damage.

actions.name: Trumpet of Sparkles
actions.text: Creatures in the cone must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw, taking 22 (4d8 + 4) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Evil creatures have disadvantage on the saving throw. Good creatures in the cone take no damage.

traits.name: Tactical Discipline
traits.text: The iron consul has advantage on all ability checks and saving throws made during combat.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The iron consul makes one attack with its spear and can use its Voice of Command ability.

actions.name: Spear
actions.text: Melee or ranged weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. On hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage, or 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage when used with two hands to make a melee attack.

actions.name: Voice of Command
actions.text: The iron consul selects up to two allies within 90 feet of it that can hear its commands. Each ally can immediately use its reaction to make one melee attack.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.text: If Kostchtchie fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: Kostchtchie has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Kostchtchie makes two melee attacks, only one of which can be a bite attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +18 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. On hit: 13 (1d6 + 10) piercing damage.

actions.name: Matalotok (Warhammer)
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +18 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. On hit: 19 (2d8 + 10) bludgeoning damage, or 21 (2d10 + 10) bludgeoning damage when used with two hands, and the weapon emits a burst of cold that deals 10 (3d6) cold damage to each creature within 30 feet of it.

legendary_actions.name: ​
legendary_actions.text: The Kostchtchie can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The Kostchtchie regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary_actions.name: Attack
legendary_actions.text: Kostchtchie makes one melee weapon attack.

legendary_actions.name: Charge
legendary_actions.text: Kostchtchie moves up to his speed.

legendary_actions.name: Curse (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.text: Kostchtchie curses one creature he can see within 60 feet of him. The cursed creature gains vulnerability to all damage dealt by Kostchtchie until the end of Kostchtchie's next turn.

traits.name: Hold Breath
traits.text: Krull can hold his breath for 1 hour.

traits.name: Inescapable Destruction
traits.text: Necrotic damage dealt by Krull's spells ignores resistance to necrotic damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 7 (1d4 + 5) piercing damage.

actions.name: +1 Maul
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage plus 9 (2d8) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Shell Defense
actions.text: Krull withdraws into his shell. Until he emerges as a bonus action, he has a +4 bonus to AC and has advantage on Strength and Constitution saving throws. While in his shell, Krull is prone, his speed is 0 and can't increase, he has disadvantage on Dexterity saving throws, he can't take reactions, and the only action he can take is to emerge from his shell.

traits.name: Limited Magic Immunity
traits.text: Mahadi can't be affected or detected by spells of 6th level or lower unless he wishes to be. He has advantage on saving throws against all other spells and magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.text: Mahadi's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Mahadi makes four claw attacks.

actions.name: Claw
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) slashing damage, and the target is cursed if it's a creature. The curse takes effect whenever the target takes a short or long rest, filling the target's thoughts with horrible images and dreams. The cursed target gains no benefit from finishing a short or long rest. The curse lasts until it is lifted by a remove curse spell or similar magic.

actions.name: Summon Erinyes (1/Day)
actions.text: Mahadi summons Ilzabet, an erinyes bound to him by an infernal contract. The erinyes appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of him, acts as his ally, and can't summon other devils. The erinyes remains for 10 minutes or until Mahadi dismisses it as an action. If the erinyes dies, Mahadi loses this action option.

traits.name: Grave Magic
traits.text: When the master of souls cast a spell that deals damage, it can change the spell's damage type to necrotic.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The master of souls attacks twice with its flail.

actions.name: Silvered Skull Flail
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 4 (1d8) bludgeoning damage plus 14 (4d6) necrotic damage, and the target has disadvantage on all saving throws until the end of the master of souls' next turn.

actions.name: Chill Touch (Cantrip)
actions.text: rs +6 to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. On hit: 13 (2d8) necrotic damage, and the target can't regain hit points until the start of the master of souls' next turn. If the target is undead, it has disadvantage on attack rolls against the master of souls for the same duration.

actions.name: Ray of Sickness (1st-Level Spell; Requires a Spell Slot)
actions.text: rs +6 to hit, range 60 ft., one creature. On hit: 9 (2d8) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the end of the master of souls' next turn. If the master of souls casts this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 1st.

actions.name: Scorching Ray (2nd-Level Spell; Requires a Spell Slot)
actions.text: rs +6 to hit, range 120 ft., one target per ray (3 rays if a 2nd-level spell slot is used, 4 rays if a 3rd-level spell slot is used). On hit: 7 (2d6) fire damage per ray.

traits.name: Indomitable (2/Day)
traits.text: Mortlock can reroll a saving throw that he fails. He must use the new roll.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Mortlock makes two attacks with his greatclub.

actions.name: Greatclub
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) bludgeoning damage, plus 5 (2d4) bludgeoning damage if Mortlock has taken any damage since his last turn.

actions.name: Heavy Crossbow
actions.text: Ranged weapon attack +4 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. On hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Skull Flail
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 4 (1d8) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Claws of the Grave
actions.text: rs +5 to hit, range 90 ft., one target. On hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) necrotic damage.

traits.name: Aura of Murder
traits.text: As long as the night blade is not incapacitated, hostile creatures within 5 feet of it gain vulnerability to piercing damage unless they have resistance or immunity to such damage.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.text: Melee or ranged weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. On hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

traits.name: Cunning Action
traits.text: On each of her turns in combat, Nine-Fingers can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

traits.name: Dagger Thrower
traits.text: Nine-Fingers adds double her proficiency bonus to the damage she deals on ranged attacks made with daggers (already factored into her attacks).

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Nine-Fingers attacks three times with her daggers.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.text: Melee or ranged weapon attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. On hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage, plus 6 piercing damage if it's a ranged attack.

traits.name: Aura of Murder
traits.text: As long as the reaper is not incapacitated, hostile creatures within 5 feet of it gain vulnerability to piercing damage unless they have resistance or immunity to such damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The reaper makes two dagger attacks and uses Shroud Self.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.text: Melee or ranged weapon attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. On hit: 7 (1d4 + 5) piercing damage.

actions.name: Shroud Self
actions.text: The reaper magically turns invisible until the start of its next turn. This invisibility ends if the reaper makes an attack roll, makes a damage roll, or casts a spell.

traits.name: Cunning Action
traits.text: On each of her turns in combat, Rilsa can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

traits.name: Focus
traits.text: If Rilsa damages a creature with a weapon attack, she gains advantage on attack rolls against that target until the end of her next turn.

traits.name: Tactical Leadership
traits.text: As a bonus action, Rilsa chooses one creature she can see within 30 feet of her. The creature doesn't provoke opportunity attacks until the end of its next turn, provided it can hear Rilsa's commands.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Rilsa makes three weapon attacks.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.text: Melee or ranged weapon attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. On hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The skull lasher makes two attacks with its flail.

actions.name: Iron Skull Flail
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 4 (1d8) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) necrotic damage, and the target has disadvantage on all saving throws until the end of the skull lasher's next turn.

actions.name: Ray of Sickness (1st-Level Spell; Requires a Spell Slot)
actions.text: rs +5 to hit, range 60 ft., one creature. On hit: 9 (2d8) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the end of the skull lasher's next turn. If the skull lasher casts this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 1st.

traits.name: Fey Step (recharge 4-6)
traits.text: As a bonus action, Smiler can teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space that he can see or to the empty seat of his infernal war machine.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: Smiler has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Equipment
traits.text: Smiler wears +2 leather armor. He carries seven soul coins in a bag and a +1 shortsword

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Smiler makes two weapon attacks. He can cast a spell in place of one of these attacks.

actions.name: +1 Shortsword
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 9 (1d6 + 6) piercing damage.

traits.name: Shadow of Guilt
traits.text: Thavius's shadow is that of a pudgy, horned devil with small wings.

actions.name: Mace
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Dark Devotion
traits.text: Thurstwell has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

actions.name: Sacred Flame (Cantrip)
actions.text: Flame-like radiance descends on one creature Thurstwell can see within 60 feet of him. The target must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or take 4 (1d8) radiant damage, gaining no benefit from cover.

traits.name: Goring Rush
traits.text: Immediately after using the Dash action, Torogar can make one melee attack with his horns.

traits.name: Labyrinthine Recall
traits.text: Torogar can perfectly recall any path he has traveled.

traits.name: Rage (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
traits.text:
As a bonus action, Torogar can enter a rage that lasts for 1 minute. The rage ends early if Torogar is knocked unconscious or if his turn ends and he hasn't attacked a hostile creature or taken damage since his last turn. While raging, Torogar gains the following benefits:

He has advantage on Strength checks and Strength saving throws.

He deals an extra 3 damage when he hits a target with a melee weapon attack.

He has resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.

traits.name: Special Equipment
traits.text: Torogar wears gauntlets of flaming fury and a belt of fire giant strength. Without the belt, his Strength is 21. He also carries a soul coin.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Torogar makes three attacks: two with his scimitars and one with his horns.

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 14 (2d6 + 7) slashing damage, or 17 (2d6 + 10) slashing damage while raging, plus 3 (1d6) fire damage from the gauntlets of flaming fury.

actions.name: Horns
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 16 (2d8 + 7) piercing damage, or 19 (2d8 + 10) piercing damage while raging.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Ulder makes three melee attacks, only one of which can be with his shield.

actions.name: +1 Longsword
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage when used with two hands.

actions.name: Shield
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. On hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage, and Ulder pushes the target 5 feet away from him. Ulder then enters the space vacated by the target. If the target is pushed to within 5 feet of a creature friendly to Ulder, the target provokes an opportunity attack from that creature.

traits.name: Shapechanger
traits.text: Baba Lysaga can use an action to polymorph into a swarm of insects (flies), or back into her true form. While in swarm form, she has a walking speed of 5 feet and a flying speed of 30 feet. Anything she is wearing transforms with her, but nothing she is carrying does.

traits.name: Blessing of Mother Night
traits.text: Baba Lysaga is shielded against divination magic, as though protected by a nondetection spell.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Baba Lysaga makes three attacks with her quarterstaff.

actions.name: Quarterstaff
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage, or 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage if wielded with two hands.

actions.name: Summon Swarms of Insects (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
actions.text: Baba Lysaga summons 1d4 swarms of insects. A summoned swarm appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of Baba Lysaga and acts as her ally. It remains until it dies or until Baba Lysaga dismisses it as an action.

traits.name: Constructed Nature
traits.text:
An animated object doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

The magic that animates an object is dispelled when the construct drops to 0 hit points. An animated object reduced to 0 hit points becomes inanimate and is too damaged to be of much use or value to anyone.

traits.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
traits.text: The hut is incapacitated while the magic gem that animates it is in the area of an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic, the hut must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall unconscious for 1 minute.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.text: The hut deals double damage to objects and structures.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The hut makes three attacks with its roots. It can replace one of these attacks with a rock attack.

actions.name: Root
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +12 to hit, reach 60 ft., one target. On hit: 30 (4d10 + 8) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Rock
actions.text: Ranged weapon attack +12 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. On hit: 21 (3d8 + 8) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Claws (Requires Alter Self)
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) slashing damage. This attack is magical.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.text: Melee or ranged weapon attack +2 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. On hit: 2 (1d4) piercing damage.

traits.name: Constructed Nature
traits.text:
An animated object doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

The magic that animates an object is dispelled when the construct drops to 0 hit points. An animated object reduced to 0 hit points becomes inanimate and is too damaged to be of much use or value to anyone.

traits.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
traits.text: The broom is incapacitated while in the area of an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic, the broom must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall unconscious for 1 minute.

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.text: While the broom remains motionless and isn't flying, it is indistinguishable from a normal broom.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The broom makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Broomstick
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Special Equipment
traits.text: In addition to her magic armor and weapons, Ezmerelda has two potions of greater healing, six vials of holy water, and three wooden stakes.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Ezmerelda makes three attacks: two with her +1 rapier and one with her +1 handaxe or her silvered shortsword.

actions.name: Rapier +1
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) piercing damage.

actions.name: Handaxe +1
actions.text: Melee or ranged weapon attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. On hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Silvered Shortsword
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Curse (Recharges after a Long Rest)
actions.text: Ezmerelda targets one creature that she can see within 30 feet of her. The target must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or be cursed. While cursed, the target has vulnerability to one type of damage of Ezmerelda's choice. The curse lasts until ended with a greater restoration spell, a remove curse spell, or similar magic. When the curse ends, Ezmerelda takes 3d6 psychic damage.

actions.name: Evil Eye (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
actions.text: Ezmerelda targets one creature that she can see within 10 feet of her and casts one of the following spells on the target (save DC 14), requiring neither somatic nor material components to do so: animal friendship, charm person, or hold person. If the target succeeds on the initial saving throw, Ezmerelda is blinded until the end of her next turn. Once a target succeeds on a saving throw against this effect, it is immune to the Evil Eye power of all Vistani for 24 hours.

name: Guardian Portrait
languages: plus up to two other languages

traits.name: Constructed Nature
traits.text:
An animated object doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

The magic that animates an object is dispelled when the construct drops to 0 hit points. An animated object reduced to 0 hit points becomes inanimate and is too damaged to be of much use or value to anyone.

traits.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
traits.text: The portrait is incapacitated while in the area of an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic, the portrait must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or become unconscious for 1 minute.

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.text: While the figure in the portrait remains motionless, the portrait is indistinguishable from a normal painting.

traits.name: Brute
traits.text: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when Izek hits with it (included in the attack).

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Izek makes two attacks with his battleaxe.

actions.name: Battleaxe
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage, or 15 (2d10 + 4) when used with two hands.

actions.name: Hurl Flame
actions.text: rs +5 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. On hit: 10 (3d6) fire damage. If the target is a flammable object that isn't being worn or carried, it catches fire.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 2 (1d4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Curse (Recharges after a Long Rest)
actions.text: Madam Eva targets one creature that she can see within 30 feet of her. The target must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw or be cursed. While cursed, the target is blinded and deafened. The curse lasts until ended with a greater restoration spell, a remove curse spell, or similar magic. When the curse ends, Madam Eva takes 5d6 psychic damage.

actions.name: Evil Eye (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
actions.text: Madam Eva targets one creature that she can see within 10 feet of her and casts one of the following spells on the target (save DC 17), requiring neither somatic nor material components to do so: animal friendship, charm person, or hold person. If the target succeeds on the initial saving throw, Madam Eva is blinded until the end of her next turn. Once a target succeeds on a saving throw against this effect, it is immune to the Evil Eye power of all Vistani for 24 hours.

traits.name: Extraordinary Feature
traits.text:
The mongrelfolk has one of the following extraordinary features, determined randomly by rolling a d20 or chosen by the DM:

1–3: Amphibious. The mongrelfolk can breathe air and water.

4–9: Darkvision. The mongrelfolk has darkvision out to a range of 60 feet.

10: Flight. The mongrelfolk has leathery wings and a flying speed of 40 feet.

11–15: Keen Hearing and Smell. The mongrelfolk has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

16–17: Spider Climb. The mongrelfolk can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

18–19: Standing Leap. The mongrelfolk's long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.

20: Two-Headed. The mongrelfolk has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks and on saving throws against being blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, or knocked unconscious.

traits.name: Mimicry
traits.text: The mongrelfolk can mimic any sounds it has heard, including voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful DC 12 Wisdom (Insight) check.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The mongrelfolk makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claw or dagger.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) slashing damage.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.text: Melee or ranged weapon attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. On hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.

name: Phantom Warrior
languages: any languages it knew in life

traits.name: Ethereal Sight
traits.text: The phantom warrior can see 60 feet into the Ethereal Plane when it is on the Material Plane, and vice versa.

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
traits.text: The phantom warrior can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

traits.name: Spectral Armor and Shield
traits.text: The phantom warrior's AC accounts for its spectral armor and shield.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The phantom warrior makes two attacks with its spectral longsword.

actions.name: Spectral Longsword
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) force damage.

actions.name: Etherealness
actions.text: The phantom warrior enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, or vice versa. It is visible on the Material Plane while it is in the Border Ethereal, and vice versa, yet it can't affect or be affected by anything on the other plane.

name: Pidlwick II
languages: understands Common but doesn't speak and can't read or write

traits.name: Ambusher
traits.text: During the first round of combat, Pidlwick II has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't had a turn yet.

actions.name: Club
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Dart
actions.text: Ranged weapon attack +4 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. On hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

traits.name: Deathly Choir
traits.text: Any creature within 10 feet of Rahadin that isn't protected by a mind blank spell hears in its mind the screams of the thousands of people Rahadin has killed. As a bonus action, Rahadin can force all creatures that can hear the screams to make a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw. Each creature takes 16 (3d10) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.text: Rahadin has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put him to sleep.

traits.name: Mask of the Wild
traits.text: Rahadin can attempt to hide even when he is only lightly obscured by foliage, heavy rain, falling snow, mist, and other natural phenomena.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Rahadin attacks three times with his scimitar, or twice with his poisoned darts.

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 9 (1d6 + 6) slashing damage.

actions.name: Poisoned Dart
actions.text: Ranged weapon attack +10 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. On hit: 8 (1d4 + 6) piercing damage plus 5 (2d4) poison damage.

traits.name: Special Equipment
traits.text: In addition to his sword cane, Rictavio wears a hat of disguise and a ring of mind shielding, and he carries a spell scroll of raise dead.

traits.name: Undead Slayer
traits.text: When Rictavio hits an undead with a weapon attack, the undead takes an extra 10 (3d6) damage of the weapon's type.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Rictavio makes two attacks with his sword cane.

actions.name: Sword Cane
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage (wooden cane) or piercing damage (silvered sword).

traits.name: Shapechanger
traits.text:
If Strahd isn't in running water or sunlight, he can use his action to polymorph into a Tiny bat, a Medium wolf, or a Medium cloud of mist, or back into his true form.

While in bat or wolf form, Strahd can't speak. In bat form, his walking speed is 5 feet, and he has a flying speed of 30 feet. In wolf form, his walking speed is 40 feet. His statistics, other than his size and speed, are unchanged. Anything he is wearing transforms with him, but nothing he is carrying does. He reverts to his true form if he dies.

While in mist form, Strahd can't take any actions, speak, or manipulate objects. He is weightless, has a flying speed of 20 feet, can hover, and can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. In addition, if air can pass through a space, the mist can do so without squeezing, and he can't pass through water. He has advantage on Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution saving throws, and he is immune to all nonmagical damage, except the damage he takes from sunlight.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.text: If Strahd fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Misty Escape
traits.text:
When Strahd drops to 0 hit points outside his coffin, he transforms into a cloud of mist (as in the Shapechanger trait) instead of falling unconscious, provided that he isn't in running water or sunlight. If he can't transform, he is destroyed.

While he has 0 hit points in mist form, he can't revert to his vampire form, and he must reach his coffin within 2 hours or be destroyed. Once in his coffin, he reverts to his vampire form. He is then paralyzed until he regains at least 1 hit point. After 1 hour in his coffin with 0 hit points, he regains 1 hit point.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.text: Strahd regains 20 hit points at the start of his turn if he has at least 1 hit point and isn't in running water or sunlight. If he takes radiant damage or damage from holy water, this trait doesn't function at the start of his next turn.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.text: Strahd can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without having to make an ability check.

traits.name: Vampire Weaknesses
traits.text:
Strahd has the following flaws:

Forbiddance. He can't enter a residence without an invitation from one of the occupants.

Harmed by Running Water. He takes 20 acid damage if he ends his turn in running water.

Stake to the Heart. If a piercing weapon made of wood is driven into his heart while he is incapacitated in his coffin, he is paralyzed until the stake is removed.

Sunlight Hypersensitivity. While in sunlight, Strahd takes 20 radiant damage at the start of his turn, and he has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

actions.name: Multiattack (Vampire Form Only)
actions.text: Strahd makes two attacks, only one of which can be a bite attack.

actions.name: Unarmed Strike (Vampire or Wolf Form Only)
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage, plus 14 (4d6) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, Strahd can grapple it (escape DC 18) instead of dealing the slashing damage.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one willing creature, or a creature that is grappled by Strahd, incapacitated, or restrained. On hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) necrotic damage. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and Strahd regains hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0. A humanoid slain in this way and then buried in the ground rises the following night as a vampire spawn under Strahd's control.

actions.name: Charm
actions.text:
Strahd targets one humanoid he can see within 30 feet of him. If the target can see Strahd, the target must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw against this magic or be charmed. The charmed target regards Strahd as a trusted friend to be heeded and protected. The target isn't under Strahd's control, but it takes Strahd's requests and actions in the most favorable way and lets Strahd bite it.

Each time Strahd or his companions do anything harmful to the target, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. Otherwise, the effect lasts 24 hours or until Strahd is destroyed, is on a different plane of existence than the target, or takes a bonus action to end the effect.

actions.name: Children of the Night (1/Day)
actions.text: Strahd magically calls 2d4 swarms of bats or swarms of rats, provided that the sun isn't up. While outdoors, Strahd can call 3d6 wolves instead. The called creatures arrive in 1d4 rounds, acting as allies of Strahd and obeying his spoken commands. The beasts remain for 1 hour, until Strahd dies, or until he dismisses them as a bonus action.

legendary_actions.name: ​
legendary_actions.text: The Strahd von Zarovich can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The Strahd von Zarovich regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary_actions.name: Move
legendary_actions.text: Strahd moves up to his speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary_actions.name: Unarmed Strike
legendary_actions.text: Strahd makes one unarmed strike.

legendary_actions.name: Bite (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.text: Strahd makes one bite attack.

name: Strahd Zombie
languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

traits.name: Loathsome Limbs
traits.text:
Whenever the zombie takes at least 5 bludgeoning or slashing damage at one time, roll a d20 to determine what else happens to it:

1–8: One leg is severed from the zombie if it has any legs left.

9–16: One arm is severed from the zombie if it has any arms left.

17–20: The zombie is decapitated.

If the zombie is reduced to 0 hit points, all parts of it die. Until then, a severed part acts on the zombie's initiative and has its own action and movement. A severed part has AC 8. Any damage it takes is subtracted from the zombie's hit points.

A severed leg is unable to attack and has a speed of 5 feet.

A severed arm has a speed of 5 feet and can make one claw attack on its turn, with disadvantage on the attack roll. Each time the zombie loses an arm, it loses a claw attack.

If its head is severed, the zombie loses its bite attack and its body is blinded unless the head can see it. The severed head has a speed of 0 feet. It can make a bite attack, but only against a target in its space.

The zombie's speed is halved if it's missing a leg. If it loses both legs, it falls prone. If it has both arms, it can crawl. With only one arm, it can still crawl, but its speed is halved. With no arms or legs, its speed is 0 feet, and it can't benefit from bonuses to speed.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The zombie makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) slashing damage.

traits.name: Constructed Nature
traits.text:
An animated object doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

The magic that animates an object is dispelled when the construct drops to 0 hit points. An animated object reduced to 0 hit points becomes inanimate and is too damaged to be of much use or value to anyone.

traits.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
traits.text: The armor is incapacitated while in the area of an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic, the armor must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall unconscious for 1 minute.

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.text: While the armor remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal suit of armor.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The armor makes two melee attacks or uses Shocking Bolt twice.

actions.name: Greatsword
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) lightning damage.

actions.name: Shocking Bolt
actions.text: rs +4 to hit (with advantage on the attack roll if the target is wearing armor made of metal), range 60 ft., one target. On hit: 10 (3d6) lightning damage.

name: Tree Blight
languages: understands Common and Druidic but doesn't speak

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.text: While the blight remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a dead tree.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.text: The blight deals double damage to objects and structures.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The blight makes four attacks: two with its branches and two with its grasping roots. If it has a target grappled, the blight can also make a bite attack against that target as a bonus action.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 19 (3d8 + 6) piercing damage.

actions.name: Branch
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +9 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. On hit: 16 (3d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Grasping Root
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +9 to hit, reach 15 ft., one creature not grappled by the blight. On hit: The target is grappled (escape DC 15). Until the grapple ends, the target takes 9 (1d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage at the start of each of its turns. The root has AC 15 and can be severed by dealing 6 slashing damage or more to it at once. Cutting the root doesn't hurt the blight, but ends the grapple.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.text: Vladimir regains 10 hit points at the start of his turn. If he takes fire or radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of his next turn. Vladimir's body is destroyed only if he starts his turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

traits.name: Rejuvenation
traits.text: When Vladimir's body is destroyed, his soul lingers. After 24 hours, the soul inhabits and animates another corpse on the same plane of existence and regains all its hit points. While the soul is bodiless, a wish spell can be used to force the soul to go to the afterlife and not return.

traits.name: Special Equipment
traits.text: Vladimir wields a +2 greatsword with a hilt sculpted to resemble silver dragon wings and a pommel shaped like a silver dragon's head clutching a black opal between its teeth.

traits.name: Turn Immunity
traits.text: Vladimir is immune to effects that turn undead.

traits.name: Vengeful Tracker
traits.text: Vladimir knows the distance to and direction of Strahd, even if Strahd and Vladimir are on different planes of existence. If Strahd is destroyed, Vladimir knows.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Vladimir makes two fist attacks or two attacks with his +2 Greatsword.

actions.name: Fist
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage. Strahd, the target of Vladimir's sworn vengeance, takes an extra 14 (4d6) bludgeoning damage. Instead of dealing damage, Vladimir can grapple the target (escape DC 14) provided the target is Large or smaller.

actions.name: Greatsword +2
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 20 (4d6 + 6) slashing damage. Against Strahd, Vladimir deals an extra 14 (4d6) slashing damage with this weapon.

actions.name: Vengeful Glare
actions.text: Vladimir can target Strahd within 30 feet provided he can see Strahd. Strahd must make a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw. One a failure, Strahd is paralyzed until Vladimir deals damage to him, or until the end of Vladimir's next turn. When the paralysis ends, Strahd is frightened of Vladimir for 1 minute. Strahd can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of his turns, with disadvantage if he can see Vladimir, ending the frightened condition on itself on a success.

name: Wereraven
speed: walk 30 ft. (fly 50 ft. in raven and hybrid forms)

traits.name: Shapechanger
traits.text: The wereraven can use its action to polymorph into a raven-humanoid hybrid or into a raven, or back into its human form. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its human form if it dies.

traits.name: Mimicry
traits.text: The wereraven can mimic simple sounds it has heard, such as a person whispering, a baby crying, or an animal chittering. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful DC 10 Wisdom (Insight) check.

actions.name: Multiattack (Human or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.text: The wereraven makes two weapon attacks, one of which can be with its hand crossbow.

actions.name: Beak (Raven or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 1 piercing damage in raven form, or 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage in hybrid form. If the target is humanoid, it must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or be cursed with wereraven lycanthropy.

actions.name: Shortsword (Human or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Hand Crossbow (Human or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.text: Ranged weapon attack +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. On hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

name: Ebondeath
languages: Any languages it knew in life

traits.name: Ethereal Sight
traits.text: Ebondeath can see 60 feet into the Ethereal Plane when it is on the Material Plane, and vice versa.

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
traits.text: Ebondeath can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.text: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Withering Touch
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 17 (4d6 + 3) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Etherealness
actions.text: Ebondeath enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, or vice versa. It is visible on the Material Plane while it is in the Border Ethereal, and vice versa, yet it can't affect or be affected by anything on the other plane.

actions.name: Horrifying Visage
actions.text: Each non-undead creature within 60 feet of Ebondeath that can see it must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened for 1 minute. If the save fails by 5 or more, the target also ages 1d4 × 10 years. A frightened target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the frightened condition on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to this Ebondeath's Horrifying Visage for the next 24 hours. The aging effect can be reversed with a greater restoration spell, but only within 24 hours of it occurring.

actions.name: Possession (recharge on 6)
actions.text:
One humanoid that Ebondeath can see within 5 feet of it must succeed on a DC 20 Charisma saving throw or be possessed by Ebondeath; Ebondeath then disappears, and the target is incapacitated and loses control of its body. Ebondeath now controls the body but doesn't deprive the target of awareness. Ebondeath can't be targeted by any attack, spell, or other effect, except ones that turn undead, and it retains its alignment, Intelligence, Wisdom, Charisma, and immunity to being charmed and frightened. It otherwise uses the possessed target's statistics, including gaining access to the target's knowledge, class features, and proficiencies.

The possession lasts until the body drops to 0 hit points, Ebondeath ends it as a bonus action, or Ebondeath is turned or forced out by an effect like the dispel evil and good spell. When the possession ends, Ebondeath reappears in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the body. The target is immune to Ebondeath Possession for 24 hours after succeeding on the saving throw or after the possession ends.

traits.name: Helpful
traits.text: The expert can take the Help action as a bonus action, and the creature who receives the help gains a 1d6 bonus to the d20 roll. If that roll is an attack roll, the creature can forgo adding the bonus to it, and then if the attack hits, the creature can add the bonus to the attack's damage roll against one target.

traits.name: Evasion
traits.text: When the expert is not incapacitated and subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it failed.

traits.name: Reliable Talent
traits.text: Whenever the expert makes an ability check that includes its whole proficiency bonus, it can treat a d20 roll of 9 or lower as a 10.

traits.name: Tools
traits.text: The expert has thieves' tools and a musical instrument.

actions.name: Extra Attack
actions.text: The expert can attack twice, instead of once, whenever it takes the attack action on its turn.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) piercing damage.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.text: Melee or ranged weapon attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. On hit: 7 (1d4 + 5) piercing damage.

actions.name: Shortbow
