actions.text: Ranged weapon attack +9 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. On hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) piercing damage.

traits.name: Empowered Spells
traits.text: Whenever the spellcaster casts a spell of the evocation school by expending a spell slot, the spellcaster can add its spellcasting ability modifier to the spell's damage roll or healing roll, if any.

traits.name: Potent Cantrip
traits.text: The spellcaster can add its spellcasting ability modifier to the damage it deals with any cantrip.

actions.name: Quarterstaff
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage, or 4 (1d8) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

traits.name: Empowered Spells
traits.text: Whenever the spellcaster casts a spell of the evocation school by expending a spell slot, the spellcaster can add its spellcasting ability modifier to the spell's damage roll or healing roll, if any.

traits.name: Potent Cantrip
traits.text: The spellcaster can add its spellcasting ability modifier to the damage it deals with any cantrip.

actions.name: Quarterstaff
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage, or 4 (1d8) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

traits.name: Battle Readiness
traits.text: The warrior has advantage on initiative rolls.

traits.name: Improved Critical
traits.text: The warrior's attack rolls score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20 on the d20.

traits.name: Improved Defense
traits.text: The warrior's AC increases by 1.

traits.name: Indomitable (1/Day)
traits.text: The warriorcan reroll a saving throw that it fails, but it must use the new result.

traits.name: Martial Role
traits.text: The warrior has one of the following traits of your choice:

traits.name: Attacker
traits.text: The warrior gains a +2 bonus to attack rolls.

traits.name: Defender
traits.text: The warrior gains the Protection reaction below.

traits.name: Second Wind (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
traits.text: The warrior can use a bonus action on its turn to regain hit points equal to 1d10 + its level.

actions.name: Extra Attack
actions.text: The warrior can attack three times, instead of once, whenever it takes the attack action on its turn.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.text: Ranged weapon attack +6 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. On hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

traits.name: Shapechanger
traits.text: The anchorite can use its action to polymorph into a boar or back into its true form, which is humanoid. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

actions.name: Clawed Gauntlet (Humanoid Form Only)
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Tusk (Boar Form Only)
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

traits.name: Brave
traits.text: Don-Jon has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

traits.name: Not Dead Yet (Recharges after a Long Rest)
traits.text: If damage reduces Don-Jon to 0 hit points, he drops to 1 hit point instead and gains advantage on attack rolls until the end of his next turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Don-Jon makes three melee attacks.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.text: Melee or ranged weapon attack +2 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. On hit: 2 (1d4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Sling
actions.text: Ranged weapon attack +2 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. On hit: 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Archer
traits.text: A longbow or shortbow deals one extra die of its damage when Falcon hits with it (included in his longbow attack).

traits.name: Sharpshooter
traits.text: Falcon's ranged weapon attacks ignore half cover and three-quarters cover.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Falcon makes three melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage, or 7 (1d10 + 2) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.text: Ranged weapon attack +4 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. On hit: 11 (2d8 + 2) piercing damage.

traits.name: Relentless (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
traits.text: If Gorthok takes 27 damage or less that would reduce it to 0 hit points, it is reduced to 1 hit point instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Gorthok makes two melee attacks: one with its lightning tusks and one with its thunder hooves.

actions.name: Lightning Tusks
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. On hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) lightning damage.

actions.name: Thunder Hooves
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. On hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) thunder damage.

actions.name: Lightning Bolt (recharge on 6)
actions.text: Gorthok shoots a bolt of lightning at one creature it can see within 120 feet of it. The target must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 18 (4d8) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

traits.name: Gnome Cunning
traits.text: The gnome has advantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws against magic.

actions.name: Magic Missile (Expends a 1st-Level Spell Slot)
actions.text: The gnome creates three magical darts. Each dart hits a creature the gnome chooses within 120 feet of it and deals 3 (1d4 + 1) force damage.

actions.name: Ray of Frost
actions.text: rs +4 to hit, range 60 ft., one creature. On hit: 4 (1d8) cold damage, and the target's speed is reduced by 10 feet until the start of the gnome's next turn.

name: Avatar of Death
languages: all languages known to its summoner
hp: half the hit point maximum of its summoner

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
traits.text: The avatar can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

traits.name: Turn Immunity
traits.text: The avatar is immune to features that turn undead.

actions.name: Reaping Scythe
actions.text: The avatar sweeps its spectral scythe through a creature within 5 feet of it, dealing 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage plus 4 (1d8) necrotic damage.

name: Larva
languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 1 (1d4 - 1) piercing damage.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: The absorber has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Pounce
traits.text: If the absorber moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits its claws attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 17 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the absorber can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The absorber makes three attacks: one with its bite or Mind Bolt and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. On hit: 10 (1d10 + 5) piercing damage plus 5 (1d10) force damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) force damage.

actions.name: Mind Bolt
actions.text: rs +8 to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. On hit: 22 (4d10) psychic damage.

traits.name: Horrid Gnashing
traits.text:
The nullifier's mouths gnash incoherently while it can see any enemies. Each creature that starts its turn within 20 feet of the nullifier and can hear it must make a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw. Unless the save succeeds, the creature rolls a d8 to determine what it does during the current turn:

1-4: The creature is stunned until the end of the turn.

5-6: The creature is frightened until the end of the turn and uses its movement to get as far as possible from the nullifier.

7-8: The creature doesn't move, and it uses its action to make one melee attack against a random creature (other than itself) if one is within reach. It otherwise does nothing.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: The nullifier has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The nullifier makes three attacks: one with its bites and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bites
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. On hit: 17 (2d12 + 4) piercing damage plus 11 (2d10) force damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. On hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage plus 11 (2d10) force damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 16) if it's a creature. The nullifier has two claws, each of which can grapple one creature.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: The reverser has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The reverser makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +8 to hit, range 5 ft., one creature. On hit: 11 (1d12 + 5) piercing damage plus 6 (1d12) force damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) force damage.

traits.name: Blood Curse of Binding (1/Day)
traits.text: As a bonus action, the blood hunter targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or have its speed reduced to 0 and be unable to take reactions. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

traits.name: Blood Frenzy
traits.text: The blood hunter has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: The blood hunter has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The blood hunter attacks twice with a weapon.

actions.name: Greatsword
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) fire damage.

actions.name: Heavy Crossbow
actions.text: Ranged weapon attack +4 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. On hit: 6 (1d10 + 1) piercing damage.

traits.name: Dark One's Blessing
traits.text: When Bol'bara reduces a hostile creature to 0 hit points, she gains 6 temporary hit points.

traits.name: Nimble Escape
traits.text: Bol'bara can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of her turns.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Bol'bara makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.text: Melee or ranged weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. On hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Eldritch Blast (Cantrip)
actions.text: rs +4 to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. On hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) force damage.

legendary_actions.name: ​
legendary_actions.text: The Bol'bara can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The Bol'bara regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary_actions.name: Incorporeal Dash
legendary_actions.text: Bol'bara moves up to her speed. She can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. She takes 5 (1d10) force damage if she ends her turn inside an object.

legendary_actions.name: Zone of Calamity (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.text: A 15-foot-radius sphere of magical confusion extends from a point Bol'bara can see within 60 feet of her and spreads around corners. Each creature that starts its turn in that area is treated as if targeted by the confusion spell (save DC 12). The sphere lasts as long as Bol'bara maintains concentration, up to 1 minute (as if concentrating on a spell).

traits.name: Bladed Hide
traits.text: At the start of each of its turns, the moorbounder deals 5 (2d4) piercing damage to any creature grappling it.

traits.name: Standing Leap
traits.text: The moorbounder's long jump is up to 40 feet and its high jump is up to 20 feet, with or without a running start.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The moorbounder makes two attacks: one with its blades and one with its claws.

actions.name: Blades
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 14 (4d4 + 4) slashing damage.

name: Core Spawn Crawler
languages: understands Deep Speech but can't speak

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.text: The crawler has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the crawler's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

actions.name: Multiattack

actions.name: Claws
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. On hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. On hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

traits.text: The emissary has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Alluring Thrum (Recharges 5-6)
actions.text: The emissary emits a dreadful yet alluring hum. Each creature within 20 feet of the emissary that can hear it and that isn't an aberration must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be charmed for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Crystal Spores (recharge on 6)
actions.text: A 15-foot-radius cloud of toxic crystalline spores extends out from the emissary. The spores spread around corners. Each creature in the area must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned. While poisoned in this way, a creature takes 11 (2d10) poison damage at the start of each of its turns. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

traits.name: Earth Glide
traits.text: The seer can traverse through nonmagical, unworked earth and stone. While doing so, the seer doesn't disturb the material it moves through.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: The seer has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack

actions.name: Fission Staff
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. On hit: 9 (1d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage plus 18 (4d8) radiant damage, and the target is knocked prone.

actions.name: Psychedelic Orb
actions.text: The seer hurls a glimmering orb at one creature it can see within 120 of it. The target must succeed on a DC 19 Wisdom saving throw or take 27 (5d10) psychic damage and suffer a random condition until the start of the seer's next turn. Roll a d6 for the condition: (1-2) blinded, (3-4) frightened, or (5-6) stunned.

name: Core Spawn Worm
languages: understands Deep Speech but can't speak

traits.name: Illumination
traits.text: The worm sheds dim light in a 20-foot radius.

traits.name: Radiant Mirror
traits.text: If the worm takes radiant damage, each creature within 20 feet of it takes that damage as well.

traits.name: Tunneler
traits.text: The worm can burrow through solid rock at half its burrowing speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The worm makes two attacks: one with its barbed tentacles and one with its bite.

actions.name: Barbed Tentacles
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. On hit: 25 (5d6 + 8) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 18). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained. The tentacles can grapple only one creature at a time.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text:
Melee weapon attack +13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. On hit: 30 (5d8 + 8) piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw or be swallowed by the worm. A swallowed creature is blinded and restrained, has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the worm, and takes 21 (6d6) fire damage at the start of each of the worm's turns.

If the worm takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the worm must succeed on a DC 21 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall prone in a space within 10 feet of the worm. If the worm dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse by using 20 feet of movement, exiting prone.

traits.name: Numbing Aura
traits.text: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the zombie must make a DC 17 Constitution saving throw. Unless the save succeeds, the creature can't make more than one attack, or take a bonus action on that turn.

traits.name: Undead Fortitude
traits.text: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is fire, radiant, or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The zombie makes two weapon attacks.

actions.name: Greataxe
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. On hit: 25 (3d12 + 6) slashing damage.

actions.name: Hurl Rock
actions.text: Ranged weapon attack +10 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. On hit: 28 (4d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Freezing Stare
actions.text: The zombie targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw or take 35 (10d6) cold damage and be paralyzed until the end of its next turn.

traits.name: Freezing Body
traits.text: A creature that touches the worm or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 10 (3d6) cold damage.

traits.name: Death Burst
traits.text: When the worm dies, it explodes in a burst of frigid energy. Each creature within 60 feet of it must make a DC 20 Dexterity saving throw, taking 28 (8d6) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Creatures inside the worm when it dies automatically fail this saving throw.

traits.name: Tunneler
traits.text: The worm can burrow through solid rock at half its burrowing speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The worm makes two bite attacks, or uses its Trill and makes a bite attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text:
Melee weapon attack +15 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. On hit: 22 (3d8 + 9) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) cold damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 20 Dexterity saving throw or be swallowed by the worm. A swallowed creature is blinded and restrained, has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the worm, and takes 10 (3d6) acid damage and 10 (3d6) cold damage at the start of each of the worm's turns.

If the worm takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the worm must succeed on a DC 20 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall prone in a space within 10 feet of the worm.

actions.name: Trill
actions.text: The frost worm emits a haunting cry. Each creature within 60 feet of the worm that can hear it must succeed on a DC 20 Wisdom saving throw or be stunned for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw each time it takes damage and at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. Once a creature successfully saves against this effect, or if this effect ends for it, that creature is immune to the Trill of all frost worms for the next 24 hours. Frost worms are immune to this effect.

name: Gearkeeper Construct
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

traits.name: Immutable Form

traits.name: Rapid Shifting

actions.text: Melee weapon attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 18 (3d8 + 5) slashing damage.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.text: The tortoise can breathe air and water.

The tortoise can carry up to 20,000 pounds of weight atop its shell, but moves at half speed if the weight exceeds 10,000 pounds. Medium or smaller creatures can move underneath the tortoise while it's not prone.

Any creature under the tortoise when it falls prone is grappled (escape DC 18). Until the grapple ends, the creature is prone and restrained.

actions.name: Bite

actions.name: Claw
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

traits.text: The kobold has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kobold's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.text: While in sunlight, the kobold has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.text: Melee weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Hand Crossbow
actions.text: Ranged weapon attack +5 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. On hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.text: The merrow can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Harpoon
actions.text: Melee or ranged weapon attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. On hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, the merrow can pull it 10 feet closer.

actions.name: Lightning Bolt (3rd-Level Spell; Requires a Spell Slot)
actions.text: The merrow unleashes a stroke of lightning in a line 100 feet long and 5 feet wide. Each creature in the line must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 28 (8d6) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

traits.name: Standing Leap
traits.text: The moorbounder's long jump is up to 40 feet and its high jump is up to 20 feet, with or without a running start.

traits.name: Shadow Stealth
traits.text: While in dim light or darkness, the nergaliid can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

traits.name: Standing Leap
traits.text: The nergaliid's long jump is up to 30 feet and its high jump is up to 20 feet, with or without a running start.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. On hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned for 1 minute. The poisoned creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Tongue Lash
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +6 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. On hit: 10 (1d12 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

An incapacitated target fails the save automatically. On a failed save, the creature takes 10 (3d6) psychic damage, and the nergaliid gains temporary hit points equal to the damage taken. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage, and the nergaliid doesn't gain temporary hit points. If this damage kills the target, its body rises at the end of the nergaliid's current turn as a husk zombie (see earlier in this chapter).

traits.name: Blood Frenzy
traits.text: The warlock has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

traits.name: Limited Amphibiousness
traits.text: The warlock can breathe air and water, but it needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

traits.name: Shark Telepathy
traits.text: The warlock can magically command any shark within 120 feet of it, using a limited telepathy.

actions.name: Multiattack

actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. On hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) slashing damage, and if the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or begin choking. The choking creature is incapacitated until the end of its next turn, when the effect ends on it.

actions.text: rs +5 to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. On hit: 5 (1d10) force damage.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.text: The sea fury can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.text: If the sea fury fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: The sea fury has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack

actions.name: Claws
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage.
