actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The horncaller makes two melee attacks with its staff and uses One with the Worldsoul.

actions.name: Staff
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage, or 5 (1d8 + 1) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: One with the Worldsoul
actions.text: The horncaller chooses one beast it can see within 30 feet of it. If the beast can hear the horncaller, the beast uses its reaction to make one melee attack against a target that the horncaller can see.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.text: The hybrid can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The hybrid makes two claw attacks.

actions.name: Claw
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The hybrid makes two javelin attacks. It can replace one javelin attack with Spit Acid.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.text: Melee or ranged weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. On hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Spit Acid
actions.text: Ranged weapon attack +5 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. On hit: 10 (4d4) acid damage.

traits.name: Assassinate
traits.text: During its first turn, the hybrid poisoner has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn. Any hit the hybrid scores against a surprised creature is a critical hit.

traits.name: Poisonous Skin
traits.text: Any creature that touches the hybrid or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 3 (1d6) poison damage.

actions.name: Toxic Touch
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 7 (2d6) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned for 1 minute. At the end of each of the poisoned target's turns, it must repeat the save, taking 3 (1d6) poison damage on a failed save, or ending the effect on itself on a successful one.

traits.name: Electrified Body
traits.text: Any creature that touches the hybrid or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 5 (1d10) lightning damage.

traits.name: Illumination
traits.text: The hybrid sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The hybrid makes two attacks: one with its shocking touch and one with its tentacles.

actions.name: Shocking Touch
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 9 (2d8) lightning damage.

actions.name: Tentacles
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 15 ft., one creature. On hit: The target is grappled (escape DC 11), and the hybrid pulls the target up to 15 feet straight toward it. Until this grapple ends, the target takes 5 (1d10) lightning damage at the start of each of its turns, and the hybrid shocker can't use its tentacles on another creature.

traits.name: Chameleon Skin
traits.text: The hybrid has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.text: The hybrid can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The hybrid makes two shortsword attacks.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

name: Indentured Spirit
languages: the languages it knew in life

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
traits.text: The spirit can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

actions.name: Withering Touch
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 10 (3d6) necrotic damage.

traits.name: Inscrutable
traits.text: Isperia is immune to any effect that would sense her emotions or read her thoughts, as well as any divination spell that she refuses. Wisdom (Insight) checks made to ascertain her intentions or sincerity have disadvantage.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.text: If Isperia fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: Isperia has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Isperia makes two claw attacks. She can cast a spell with a casting time of 1 action in place of one claw attack.

actions.name: Claw
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 21 (3d10 + 5) slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 23 Wisdom saving throw or take 14 (4d6) psychic damage after each attack it makes against Isperia before the start of her next turn.

actions.name: Supreme Legal Authority
actions.text: Isperia chooses up to three creatures she can see within 90 feet of her. Each target must succeed on a DC 23 Intelligence saving throw or Isperia chooses an action for that target: Attack, Cast a Spell, Dash, Disengage, Dodge, Help, Hide, Ready, Search, or Use an Object. The affected target can't take that action for 1 minute. At the end of each of the target's turns, it can end the effect on itself with a successful DC 23 Intelligence saving throw. A target that succeeds on the saving throw becomes immune to Isperia's Supreme Legal Authority for 24 hours.

legendary_actions.name: ​
legendary_actions.text: The Isperia can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The Isperia regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary_actions.name: Claw Attack
legendary_actions.text: Isperia makes one claw attack.

legendary_actions.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.text: Isperia casts a spell of 3rd level or lower from her list of prepared spells, using a spell slot as normal.

legendary_actions.name: Supreme Legal Authority (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.text: Isperia uses Supreme Legal Authority.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.text: If Jarad fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: Jarad has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.text: Jarad regains 25 hit points at the start of his turn. If he takes fire or radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of his next turn. He dies only if he starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

traits.name: Spore Infusion
traits.text: Jarad is surrounded by a cloud of spores. As a bonus action, he can cause the spores to deal 11 (2d10) poison damage to a creature he can see within 10 feet of him.

traits.name: Turn Resistance
traits.text: Jarad has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

traits.name: Undead Fortitude
traits.text: If damage reduces Jarad to 0 hit points, he must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, he drops to 1 hit point instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Jarad makes two attacks: one with his Noxious Touch and one with his Staff of Svogthir. He can cast a spell with a casting time of 1 action in place of one of these attacks.

actions.name: Noxious Touch
actions.text: ms +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. On hit: 28 (8d6) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 20 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Staff of Svogthir
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage plus 13 (3d8) poison damage and 13 (3d8) necrotic damage.

legendary_actions.name: ​
legendary_actions.text: The Jarad Vod Savo can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The Jarad Vod Savo regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary_actions.name: Cantrip
legendary_actions.text: Jarad casts one of his cantrips.

legendary_actions.name: Noxious Touch (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.text: Jarad uses Noxious Touch.

legendary_actions.name: Disrupt Life (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.text: Each creature within 30 feet of Jarad must make a DC 20 Constitution saving throw, taking 35 (10d6) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

name: Kraul Death Priest
speed: walk 30 ft., climb 30 ft., fly 40 ft.

traits.name: Feed on Death
traits.text: When a creature within 30 feet of the kraul drops to 0 hit points, the kraul or another creature of its choice within 30 feet of it gains 5 (1d10) temporary hit points, provided the kraul isn't incapacitated.

traits.name: Hive Mind
traits.text: The kraul is immune to the charmed and frightened conditions while within 30 feet of at least one other kraul.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.text: The kraul has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kraul's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.text: The kraul can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The kraul makes one attack with its quarterstaff and casts one of its spells with a casting time of 1 action.

actions.name: Quarterstaff
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage, or 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

name: Kraul Warrior
languages: understands Common but can't speak it

traits.name: Hive Mind
traits.text: The kraul is immune to the charmed and frightened conditions while within 30 feet of at least one other kraul.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.text: The kraul has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kraul's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.text: The kraul can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.name: Spear
actions.text: Melee or ranged weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. On hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

actions.name: Quarterstaff
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage, or 5 (1d8 + 1) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

traits.name: Elusive
traits.text: No attack roll has advantage against Lazav unless he is incapacitated.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.text: If Lazav fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Shapechanger Savant
traits.text: Lazav can use a bonus action to polymorph into a Small or Medium humanoid he has seen. His statistics, other than his size, are the same in each form. Any equipment he is wearing or carrying isn't transformed.

traits.name: Psychic Defenses
traits.text: Unless Lazav is incapacitated, he is immune to magic that allows other creatures to read his thoughts, determine whether he is lying, know his alignment, or know his creature type. Creatures can telepathically communicate with Lazav only if he allows it.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Lazav makes three shortsword attacks.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +13 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 10 (1d6 + 7) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) psychic damage, and the target has disadvantage on the next attack roll it makes before Lazav's next turn.

legendary_actions.name: ​
legendary_actions.text: The Lazav can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The Lazav regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary_actions.name: Attack
legendary_actions.text: Lazav makes a weapon attack.

legendary_actions.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.text: Lazav casts one of his innate spells.

legendary_actions.name: Shifting Nightmare (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.text: Lazav rapidly takes the form of several nightmarish creatures, lashing out at all nearby. Each creature within 10 feet of Lazav must succeed on a DC 21 Dexterity saving throw or take 18 (4d8) damage of a type chosen by Lazav: acid, cold, fire, lightning, or necrotic.

traits.name: Aura of Blood Lust
traits.text: When any other creature starts its turn within 30 feet of the master, that creature must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw, or it must immediately take the Attack action, making one melee attack against a random creature within reach. If no creatures are within reach, it makes a ranged attack against a random creature within range, throwing its weapon if necessary.

traits.name: Feed on the Crowd
traits.text: Whenever a creature within 60 feet of the master dies, the master gains 15 temporary hit points and has advantage on all attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws until the end of its next turn.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: The master has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The master makes two melee attacks with its spear.

actions.name: Spear
actions.text: Melee or ranged weapon attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. On hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage, or 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack, plus 13 (3d8) psychic damage.

actions.name: Captivating Presence (recharge on 6)
actions.text: Each creature within 120 feet of the master must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw or be charmed by the master for 1 hour. While charmed in this way, a creature's speed is 0. If the charmed creature takes damage, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. A target that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to the Captivating Presence of all masters of cruelties for the next 24 hours.

name: Mind Drinker Vampire
languages: the languages it knew in life

traits.name: Shadow Stealth
traits.text: While in dim light or darkness, the vampire can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.text: While in sunlight, the vampire has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The vampire makes two attacks, only one of which can be a bite attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one willing creature, or a creature that is grappled by the vampire, incapacitated, or restrained. On hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) necrotic damage. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and the vampire regains hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0.

actions.name: Unarmed Strike
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage. The vampire can also grapple the target (escape DC 13) if it is a creature and the vampire has a hand free.

actions.name: Mind Siphon (recharge 5-6)
actions.text: The vampire targets a creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must make a DC 14 Intelligence saving throw, with disadvantage if the vampire has previously consumed the target's blood. On a failed save, the target takes 28 (8d6) psychic damage, and the vampire discerns the target's surface emotions and thoughts. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage, and the vampire discerns the target's general emotional state but not its thoughts.

traits.name: Special Equipment
traits.text: The mage wears a spies' murmur (see chapter 5).

actions.name: Dagger
actions.text: Melee or ranged weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. On hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

traits.name: Mount
traits.text: If the specter isn't mounted, it can use a bonus action to magically teleport onto its gloamwing mount, provided the specter and the gloamwing are on the same plane of existence. When it teleports, the specter appears astride the gloamwing along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying. While mounted and not incapacitated, the specter can't be surprised, and both it and its mount gain advantage on Dexterity saving throws.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The specter makes two scythe attacks.

actions.name: Scythe
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. On hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage plus 13 (3d8) psychic damage.

actions.name: Mind Twist (recharge 5-6)
actions.text: The specter magically emits psychic energy in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or take 22 (5d8) psychic damage and be stunned for 1 minute. The stunned creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Reap Memory (3/Day)
actions.text: The specter touches one incapacitated creature and chooses 1 hour from among the past 24. Unless the creature succeeds on a DC 15 Intelligence saving throw, the creature loses all memory of that hour. The creature regains the memory only if the specter dies within the next 24 hours.

name: Niv-Mizzet
speed: walk 40 ft., climb 30 ft., fly 80 ft.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.text: If Niv-Mizzet fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Locus of the Firemind
traits.text: Niv-Mizzet can maintain concentration on two different spells at the same time. In addition, he has advantage on saving throws to maintain concentration on spells.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: Niv-Mizzet has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Master Chemister
traits.text: When Niv-Mizzet casts a spell that deals damage, he can change the spell's damage to cold, fire, force, lightning, or thunder.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Niv-Mizzet makes three attacks: one with his bite and two with his claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +17 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. On hit: 18 (2d8 + 9) piercing damage plus 14 (4d6) fire damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +17 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. On hit: 14 (2d4 + 9) slashing damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +17 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. On hit: 16 (2d6 + 9) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Fire Breath (recharge 5-6)
actions.text: Niv-Mizzet exhales fire in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 25 Dexterity saving throw, taking 91 (26d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary_actions.name: ​
legendary_actions.text: The Niv-Mizzet can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The Niv-Mizzet regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary_actions.name: Cantrip
legendary_actions.text: Niv-Mizzet casts one of his cantrips.

legendary_actions.name: Tail Attack
legendary_actions.text: Niv-Mizzet makes a tail attack.

legendary_actions.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.text: Niv-Mizzet beats his wings. Each creature within 15 feet of him must succeed on a DC 25 Dexterity saving throw or take 14 (2d4 + 9) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone. Niv-Mizzet can then fly up to half his flying speed.

legendary_actions.name: Dracogenius (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.text: Niv-Mizzet regains a spell slot of 3rd level or lower.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: The cyclops has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The cyclops makes two slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. On hit: 23 (3d10 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Council of Five
traits.text:
The ghost has a trait based on who it is, as shown below:

• Enezesku: Enfeebling Ray. Enezesku's Innate Spellcasting trait includes ray of enfeeblement, which he can cast at will.
• Fautomni: Undead Fortitude. If damage reduces Fautomni to 0 hit points, he must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, Fautomni drops to 1 hit point instead.
• Karlov: Unnatural Vigor. When Karlov regains hit points, he has advantage on attack rolls he makes on his next turn.
• Vuliev: Teleportation. Vuliev's Innate Spellcasting trait includes misty step, which he can cast at will.
• Xil Xaxosz: Lingering Spite. When Xil Xaxosz is reduced to 0 hit points, his incorporeal form explodes in a burst of necrotic energy. Each creature within 5 feet of him must make a DC 16 Constitution saving throw, taking 14 (4d6) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one

traits.name: Ethereal Sight
traits.text: The ghost can see 60 feet into the Ethereal Plane when it is on the Material Plane, and vice versa.

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
traits.text: The ghost can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
traits.text: If the ghost fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Life Drain
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. On hit: 18 (4d8) necrotic damage, and the ghost regains hit points equal to half the amount of damage the target takes. The target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. The target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0. This reduction to the target's hit point maximum lasts until the target finishes a long rest.

actions.name: Convene the Ghost Council
actions.text: The ghost summons the other four members of the Obzedat. At the start of the ghost's next turn, the other members appear in unoccupied spaces within 30 feet of the summoner. The ghosts each roll initiative when they appear.

legendary_actions.name: ​
legendary_actions.text: If five Obzedat ghosts are all within 30 feet of each other, they can collectively take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time, and only at the end of another creature's turn. Obzedat ghosts regain spent legendary actions at the start of the turn of the ghost with the highest initiative.

legendary_actions.name: Forced Obedience
legendary_actions.text: A target that all of the Obzedat ghosts can see must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or bow until the end of its next turn. Until this bow ends, the target can't take actions or reactions, and its speed is 0 and can't be increased.

legendary_actions.name: Indentured Spirits (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.text: The Obzedat ghosts conjure 1d6 indentured spirits (described in this chapter) within 60 feet of one of them.

traits.name: Focus
traits.text: As a bonus action, the giant can target a creature it can see within 30 feet of it and make that creature its focus. The target remains the giant's focus for 1 minute, or until either the target or the giant drops to 0 hit points. When the giant makes an attack roll against its focus, it adds a d4 to its attack roll. If the giant attacks a different target while it has a focus, it subtracts a d4 from its attack roll.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The giant makes two greataxe attacks.

actions.name: Greataxe
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. On hit: 25 (3d12 + 6) slashing damage. If the Orzhov giant scores a critical hit, it rolls the damage dice three times, instead of twice.

actions.name: Rock
actions.text: Ranged weapon attack +9 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. On hit: 28 (4d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Quarterstaff
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 2 (1d6 - 1) bludgeoning damage, or 3 (1d8 - 1) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Glimpse the Temporal Flood (recharge 5-6)
actions.text: The mage targets one creature within 120 feet of it that it can see. The target takes 18 (4d8) psychic damage, and it must succeed on a DC 14 Intelligence saving throw or be stunned until the end of its next turn.

traits.name: Captivating Presence
traits.text: Any creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of Rakdos must make a DC 25 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature becomes charmed by Rakdos for 1 minute or until the creature is farther than 30 feet away from him. On a successful save, the creature becomes immune to Rakdos's Captivating Presence for 24 hours.

traits.name: Cruel Entertainment
traits.text: When a creature Rakdos can see within 60 feet of him is reduced to 0 hit points, Rakdos gains 25 temporary hit points.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.text: If Rakdos fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: Rakdos has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.text: Rakdos's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Rakdos makes two attacks with his Curtain-Call Scythe or his claws.

actions.name: Curtain-Call Scythe
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +15 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. On hit: 24 (3d10 + 8) slashing damage plus 13 (3d8) fire damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +15 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. On hit: 17 (2d8 + 8) slashing damage.

legendary_actions.name: ​
legendary_actions.text: The Rakdos can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The Rakdos regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary_actions.name: Sadistic Revelry
legendary_actions.text: Each creature within 60 feet of Rakdos that is his ally or is charmed by him must use its reaction to move up to half its speed toward the creature closest to it that it can see, provided it isn't already within 5 feet of that creature. It then must make one melee attack against that creature if it is able to do so.

legendary_actions.name: Scythe (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.text: Rakdos uses Curtain-Call Scythe.

legendary_actions.name: Touch of Pain (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.text: Rakdos makes a claw attack against one creature within 10 feet of him. The target must succeed on a DC 25 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. While poisoned in this way, the creature can't maintain concentration on a spell or any other effect that requires concentration. The poisoned creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Club
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Nimble
traits.text: The performer can take the Disengage action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The juggler makes three dagger attacks.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.text: Melee or ranged weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. On hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

traits.name: Nimble
traits.text: The performer can take the Disengage action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The fire eater makes two attacks with its bladed chain.

actions.name: Bladed Chain
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. On hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Spew Flame (recharge 4-6)
actions.text: The fire eater exhales flames. Each creature in a 15-foot cone must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 9 (2d8) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

traits.name: Nimble
traits.text: The performer can take the Disengage action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The acrobat makes two attacks with its barbed pole.

actions.name: Barbed Pole
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage, and the acrobat can jump up to 20 feet. This movement doesn't provoke opportunity attacks.

traits.name: First Strike
traits.text: The reckoner has advantage on initiative rolls.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands.

traits.name: Ambusher
traits.text: In the first round of a combat, the stalker has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn yet.

traits.name: Nimble Escape
traits.text: The stalker can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

traits.name: Ruin Dweller
traits.text: The stalker has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in ruins, and its speed is not reduced in difficult terrain composed of rubble.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.text: The stalker deals double damage to objects and structures.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The stalker makes three attacks with its shortsword.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.text: m +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

traits.name: Explosive Tank
traits.text: When the guard dies, or if it rolls a 1 when checking whether its Scorchbringer action recharges, the tank on its back explodes in a 10-foot radius sphere. Each creature in that area must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 7 (2d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The explosion ignites flammable objects that aren't being worn or carried, and it destroys the scorchbringer.

actions.name: Light Hammer
actions.text: Melee or ranged weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. On hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Scorchbringer (recharge 4-6)
actions.text: The guard's scorchbringer spouts a stream of flame in a line that is 30 feet long and 5 feet wide. Each creature in the line must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 7 (2d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: Claws
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) slashing damage.

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
traits.text: The horror can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

traits.name: Shadow Stealth
traits.text: While in dim light or darkness, the horror can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

traits.name: Shadow Stride
traits.text: As a bonus action, the horror can step into a shadow within 5 feet of it and magically appear in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of a second shadow that is up to 60 feet away. Both shadows must be cast by a Small or larger creature or object.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.text: While in sunlight, the horror has disadvantage on attack rolls and on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The horror makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 21 (4d8 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 13 (3d6 + 3) slashing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened of the horror until the end of the target's next turn.

actions.name: Lashing Shadows (recharge 5-6)
actions.text: Each creature within 60 feet of the horror, except other horrors, must succeed on a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw or take 27 (6d8) necrotic damage.

traits.name: Aura of Mind Erosion
traits.text: Any creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the sire must make a DC 18 Wisdom saving throw. On a successful save, the creature is immune to this aura for the next 24 hours. On a failed save, the creature has disadvantage for 1 minute on Wisdom and Charisma checks and on Wisdom and Charisma saves. At the start of each of its turns, the sire can suppress this aura until the start of its next turn.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: The sire has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The sire makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. On hit: 25 (3d12 + 6) piercing damage plus 16 (3d10) psychic damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. On hit: 10 (1d8 + 6) slashing damage plus 9 (2d8) psychic damage.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.text: The horror can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.text: While in sunlight, the horror has disadvantage on attack rolls and on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The horror can use its Maddening Presence and make three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. On hit: 28 (4d10 + 6) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. On hit: 24 (4d8 + 6) slashing damage.

actions.name: Maddening Presence
actions.text: The horror targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see or hear the horror, the target must make a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed saving throw, the target becomes paralyzed until the end of its next turn. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to the horror's Maddening Presence for the next 24 hours.

traits.name: Keen Sight
traits.text: The roc has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The roc makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its talons.

actions.name: Beak
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) piercing damage.

actions.name: Talons
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 10 (2d4 + 5) slashing damage.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.text: The skyswimmer can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The skyswimmer makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its slam.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. On hit: 22 (3d10 + 6) piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 19 Dexterity saving throw or be swallowed by the skyswimmer. A swallowed creature is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the skyswimmer, and it takes 21 (6d6) acid damage at the start of each of the skyswimmer's turns. If the skyswimmer takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from the swallowed creature, the skyswimmer must succeed on a DC 18 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate the creature, which falls prone in a space within 10 feet of the skyswimmer. If the skyswimmer dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse by using 15 feet of movement, exiting prone.

actions.name: Slam
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +11 to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. On hit: 19 (2d12 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Formation Tactics
traits.text: The soldier has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, frightened, grappled, or restrained while it is within 5 feet of at least one ally.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The soldier makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage, or 7 (1d10 + 2) slashing damage if used with two hands.

traits.name: Reckless
traits.text: At the start of its turn, the giant can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls it makes during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.text: The giant deals double damage to objects and structures.

traits.name: Stone Camouflage
traits.text: The giant has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The giant makes two slam attacks. The first of those attacks that hits deals an extra 18 (4d8) damage if the giant has taken damage since its last turn.

actions.name: Slam
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +10 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. On hit: 24 (4d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Rock
actions.text: Ranged weapon attack +10 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. On hit: 28 (4d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 18 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

traits.name: Cunning Action
traits.text: On each of its turns, the thought spy can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The thought spy makes two melee attacks, or it makes three ranged attacks with its daggers.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.text: Melee or ranged weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. On hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Rapier
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.text: If Trostani fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: Trostani has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.text: Trostani's weapon attacks are magical.

traits.name: Speak with Beasts and Plants
traits.text: Trostani can communicate with beasts and plants as if they shared a language.

traits.name: Tree Stride
traits.text: Once on her turn, Trostani can use 10 feet of her movement to step magically into one living tree within her reach and emerge from a second living tree within 60 feet of the first tree, appearing in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the second tree. Both trees must be Large or bigger.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Trostani takes three actions: she uses Constrict and Touch of Order, and she casts a spell with a casting time of 1 action.

actions.name: Constrict
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. On hit: 15 (3d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 19). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained. Trostani can grapple no more than three targets at a time.

actions.name: Touch of Order
actions.text: ms +16 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. On hit: 23 (3d8 + 10) radiant damage, and Trostani can choose one magic item she can see in the target's possession. Unless it's an artifact, the item's magic is suppressed until the start of Trostani's next turn.

actions.name: Wrath of Mat'Selesnya (recharge 5-6)
actions.text: Trostani conjures a momentary whirl of branches and vines at a point she can see within 60 feet of her. Each creature in a 30-foot cube on that point must make a DC 24 Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 (6d6) bludgeoning damage and 21 (6d6) slashing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary_actions.name: ​
legendary_actions.text: The Trostani can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The Trostani regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary_actions.name: Voice of Harmony
legendary_actions.text: Trostani makes one melee attack, with advantage on the attack roll.

legendary_actions.name: Voice of Life
legendary_actions.text: Trostani bestows 20 temporary hit points on another creature she can see within 120 feet of her.

legendary_actions.name: Voice of Order
legendary_actions.text: Trostani casts dispel magic.

legendary_actions.name: Chorus of the Conclave (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.text: Trostani casts suggestion. This counts as one of her daily uses of the spell.

legendary_actions.name: Awaken Grove Guardians (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.text: Trostani animates one or two trees she can see within 120 feet of her, causing them to uproot themselves and become awakened trees (see the Monster Manual for their stat blocks) for 1 minute or until Trostani uses a bonus action to end the effect. These trees understand Druidic and obey Trostani's spoken commands, but can't speak. If she issues no commands to them, the trees do nothing but follow her and take the Dodge action.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: The medusa has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Surprise Attack
traits.text: During the first round of combat, the medusa has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that is surprised, and it deals an extra 10 (3d6) damage each time it hits such a creature with an attack.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The medusa makes two claw attacks. It can also use Petrifying Gaze before or after making these attacks.

actions.name: Claw
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Petrifying Gaze
actions.text: The medusa fixes its gaze on one creature within 60 feet of it that it can see and that can see its eyes. The target must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the creature is instantly petrified. Otherwise, a creature that fails the save begins to turn to stone and is restrained. The restrained creature must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn, becoming petrified on a failure or ending the effect on a success. The petrification lasts until the creature is freed by a greater restoration spell or similar magic.

actions.name: Claws
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Rock
actions.text: Ranged weapon attack +4 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. On hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.text: The wurm deals double damage to objects and structures.

traits.name: Earth Tremors
traits.text: The wurm creates earth tremors as it moves overland or underground. Any creature that comes within 30 feet of the moving wurm for the first time on a turn must succeed on a DC 20 Dexterity saving throw or take 10 (3d6) bludgeoning damage and fall prone. Any structure or object anchored to the ground that comes within 30 feet of the moving wurm for the first time on a turn takes 10 (3d6) force damage.

traits.name: Tunneler
traits.text: The wurm can burrow through solid rock at half its burrow speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. On hit: 24 (5d6 + 7) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 20 Dexterity saving throw or be swallowed by the wurm. A swallowed creature is blinded and restrained, has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the wurm, and takes 17 (5d6) acid damage at the start of each of the wurm's turns. If the wurm takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the wurm must succeed on a DC 21 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall prone in a space within 10 feet of the wurm. If the wurm dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse by using 20 feet of movement, exiting prone.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.text: Zegana can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.text: If Zegana fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: Zegana has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Prime Speaker's Trident
actions.text: Melee or ranged weapon attack +10 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. On hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) piercing damage, and the trident emits a thunderous boom. Each creature in a 15-foot cube originating from the prongs of the trident must make a DC 18 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 9 (2d8) thunder damage and is pushed 10 feet away from Zegana. If the creature is underwater, the damage is increased to 13 (3d8). On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't pushed.

actions.name: Deluge (recharge 4-6)
actions.text: Zegana conjures a wave of water that crashes down on an area within 120 feet of her. The area can be up to 30 feet long, up to 10 feet wide, and up to 10 feet tall. Each creature in that area must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 18 (4d8) bludgeoning damage and is knocked prone. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't knocked prone. The water spreads out across the ground, extinguishing unprotected flames it comes in contact with, and then vanishes.

legendary_actions.name: ​
legendary_actions.text: The Zegana can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The Zegana regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary_actions.name: Adaptive Skin
legendary_actions.text: Zegana gains resistance to one damage type of her choice-acid, fire, lightning, or thunder-until the start of her next turn.

legendary_actions.name: Trident
legendary_actions.text: Zegana makes one melee attack with the Prime Speaker's Trident.

legendary_actions.name: Enlarge (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.text: Zegana casts enlarge/reduce on herself, using the enlarge option, without expending a spell slot.

legendary_actions.name: Deluge (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.text: Zegana uses Deluge, if available.

traits.name: Two Heads
traits.text: The amphisbaena has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks and on saving throws against being blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, and knocked unconscious.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The amphisbaena makes two bite attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 11 Constitution saving throw, taking 3 (1d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.text: The croaker can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Speak with Frogs and Toads
traits.text: The croaker can communicate simple concepts to frogs and toads when it speaks in Bullywug.

traits.name: Standing Leap
traits.text: The croaker's long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.

traits.name: Swamp Camouflage
traits.text: The croaker has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in swampy terrain.

actions.name: Spear
actions.text: Melee or ranged weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. On hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Glaaar-pat (3/Day)
actions.text: The croaker sings a song of marshy doom. Each chosen creature within 30 feet of the croaker that can hear the song must make a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw, taking 9 (2d8) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature that fails this saving throw also has disadvantage on Constitution saving throws until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Rooooo-glog (1/Day)
actions.text: The croaker sings an ode to an elder froghemoth. Each bullywug within 30 feet of the croaker that can hear the song gains 10 temporary hit points.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.text: The royal can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Brute
traits.text: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the royal hits with it (included in the attack).

traits.name: Frog Rider
traits.text: The royal has advantage on melee attacks made while riding a frog mount.

traits.name: Speak with Frogs and Toads
traits.text: The royal can communicate simple concepts to frogs and toads when it speaks in Bullywug.

traits.name: Standing Leap
traits.text: The royal's long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.

traits.name: Swamp Camouflage
traits.text: The royal has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in swampy terrain.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The royal makes two attacks: one with its royal spear and one with its bite.

actions.name: Royal Spear
actions.text: Melee or ranged weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 10 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. On hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage, or 12 (2d8 + 3) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Croaked Decree (1/Day)
actions.text: The royal makes a loud pronouncement. Each bullywug within 60 feet of the royal that can hear the pronouncement has advantage on its next attack roll.

name: Drowned Ascetic
languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

traits.name: Bottom Treader
traits.text: The drowned ascetic cannot swim, and it sinks to the bottom of any body of water. It takes no penalties to its movement or attacks underwater. It is immune to the effects of being underwater at a depth greater than 100 feet.

traits.name: Bound Together
traits.text: The drowned ascetic shares its mind with every other drowned one within 1 mile of it, and can communicate its thoughts and observations to them instantaneously and without limitation.

traits.name: Undead Fortitude
traits.text: If damage reduces the drowned ascetic to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the drowned ascetic drops to 1 hit point instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The drowned ascetic makes three unarmed strikes.

actions.name: Unarmed Strike
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or contract bluerot (see the "Bluerot" in notes).

name: Drowned Assassin
languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

traits.name: Bottom Treader
traits.text: The drowned assassin cannot swim, and it sinks to the bottom of any body of water. It takes no penalties to its movement or attacks underwater. It is immune to the effects of being underwater at a depth greater than 100 feet.

traits.name: Bound Together
traits.text: The drowned assassin shares its mind with every other drowned one within 1 mile of it, and can communicate its thoughts and observations to them instantaneously and without limitation.

traits.name: Undead Fortitude
traits.text: If damage reduces the drowned assassin to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the drowned assassin drops to 1 hit point instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The drowned assassin makes two hand crossbow attacks or two dagger attacks. It can then take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

actions.name: Hand Crossbow
actions.text: Ranged weapon attack +5 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. On hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or contract bluerot (see the "Bluerot" in notes).

actions.name: Dagger
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or contract bluerot (see the "Bluerot" in notes).

actions.name: Reveal (1/Day)
actions.text: The drowned assassin removes its mask, revealing its rotting face. Each creature of the assassin's choice within 30 feet of it that can see the assassin must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of its next turn.

name: Drowned Blade
languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

traits.name: Bottom Treader
traits.text: The drowned blade cannot swim, and it sinks to the bottom of any body of water. It takes no penalties to its movement or attacks underwater. It is immune to the effects of being underwater at a depth greater than 100 feet.

traits.name: Bound Together
traits.text: The drowned blade shares its mind with every other drowned one within 1 mile of it, and can communicate its thoughts and observations to them instantaneously and without limitation.

traits.name: Undead Fortitude
traits.text: If damage reduces the drowned blade to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the drowned blade drops to 1 hit point instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The drowned blade makes two rusted longsword attacks.

actions.name: Rusted Longsword
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or contract bluerot (see the "Bluerot" in notes).

name: Drowned Master
languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

traits.name: Bound Together
traits.text: The drowned master shares its mind with every other drowned one within 1 mile of it, and can communicate its thoughts and observations to them instantaneously and without limitation.

traits.name: Cold Aura
traits.text: At the start of each of the drowned master's turns, each creature within 5 feet of it takes 5 (1d10) cold damage. A creature that touches the drowned master or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 5 (1d10) cold damage.

traits.name: Undead Fortitude
traits.text: If damage reduces the drowned master to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the drowned master drops to 1 hit point instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The drowned master makes two attacks: one with its greatsword and one with its Life-Draining Tentacle.

actions.name: Greatsword
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage plus 14 (4d6) cold damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or contract bluerot (see the "Bluerot" in notes).

actions.name: Life-Draining Tentacle
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +7 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. On hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or have its hit point maximum reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. On a failed save, the target also contracts bluerot (see the "Bluerot" in notes).

actions.name: Necrotic Ink (recharge 5-6)
actions.text: The drowned master discharges foul ink in front of itself in a 30-foot cone. Each creature caught in the ink must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 27 (6d8) necrotic damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature that fails this saving throw is blinded until the end of its next turn and contracts bluerot (see the "Bluerot" in notes).

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of its next turn. On a failed save, the target begins to hallucinate and is afflicted with a short-term madness table effect (determined randomly or by the DM; see "Madness" in chapter 8 of the Dungeon Master's Guide). The effect lasts 10 minutes.

traits.name: Water Breathing
traits.text: The eel can breathe only underwater.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 13 (2d10 + 2) piercing damage.

traits.name: Luring Maestro
traits.text: While within 60 feet of the matriarch, creatures have disadvantage on saving throws against the matriarch's Luring Song.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: The matriarch has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The matriarch makes two claws attacks.

actions.name: Claws
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 13 (3d6 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Fleeting Form
actions.text: The matriarch can magically disguise itself to resemble a humanoid of roughly similar size and shape for up to 1 hour. It can revert to its true form as a bonus action. This illusion does not hold up to close scrutiny.

actions.name: Luring Song
actions.text:
The matriarch sings a magical melody. Every humanoid and giant within 300 feet of the matriarch that can hear the song must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or be charmed until the song ends. The matriarch must take a bonus action on its subsequent turns to continue singing. It can stop singing at any time. The song ends if the matriarch is incapacitated.

While charmed by the matriarch, a target is incapacitated and ignores the songs of other harpies. If the charmed target is more than 5 feet away from the matriarch, the target must move on its turn toward the matriarch by the most direct route, trying to get within 5 feet. It doesn't avoid opportunity attacks, but before moving into damaging terrain, such as lava or a pit, and whenever it takes damage from a source other than the matriarch, the target can repeat the saving throw. A charmed target can also repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns. If the saving throw is successful, the effect ends on it.

A target that successfully saves is immune to this matriarch's song for the next 24 hours.

actions.name: Visage of Desire (1/Day)
actions.text: The matriarch projects a vision into the minds of creatures within 30 feet of it that aren't constructs or undead, showing each creature achieving whatever it most desires. An affected creature must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or drop whatever it is holding and become paralyzed until the end of its next turn.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.text: The kraken can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Freedom of Movement
traits.text: The kraken ignores difficult terrain, and magical effects can't reduce its speed or cause it to be restrained. It can spend 5 feet of movement to escape from nonmagical restraints or being grappled.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The kraken makes two tentacle attacks, each of which it can replace with a use of Fling.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text:
Melee weapon attack +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 20 (3d8 + 7) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature grappled by the kraken, that creature is swallowed and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the creature is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the kraken, and it takes 21 (6d6) acid damage at the start of each of the kraken's turns. One Medium or two smaller creatures can be swallowed at the same time.

If the kraken takes 35 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the kraken must succeed on a DC 23 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall prone in spaces within 10 feet of the kraken. If the kraken dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse using 10 feet of movement, exiting prone.

actions.name: Tentacle
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +12 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. On hit: 17 (3d6 + 7) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 20). Until the grapple ends, the target is restrained. The kraken has ten tentacles, each of which can grapple one target.

actions.name: Fling
actions.text: One Medium or smaller object held or creature grappled by the kraken is thrown up to 40 feet in a random direction and knocked prone. If a thrown target strikes a solid surface, the target takes 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage for every 10 feet it was thrown. If the target is thrown at another creature, that creature must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or take the same damage and be knocked prone.

actions.name: Lightning Strike
actions.text: The kraken magically create a bolt of lightning, which can strike a target the kraken can see within 90 feet of it. The target must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary_actions.name: ​
legendary_actions.text: The Juvenile Kraken can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The Juvenile Kraken regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary_actions.name: Tentacle Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.text: The kraken makes one tentacle attack.

legendary_actions.name: Fling
legendary_actions.text: The kraken uses Fling.

legendary_actions.name: Ink Cloud (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.text: While underwater, the kraken expels an ink cloud in a 40-foot radius. The cloud spreads around corners, and that area is heavily obscured to creatures other than the kraken. Each creature other than the kraken that ends its turn there must succeed on a DC 18 Constitution saving throw, taking 11 (2d10) poison damage on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one. A strong current disperses the cloud, which otherwise disappears at the end of the kraken's next turn.

actions.name: Whirlpool (1/Day)
actions.text:
The wave shaper targets a body of water at least 50 feet square and 25 feet deep, causing a whirlpool to form in the center of the area. The whirlpool forms a vortex that is 5 feet wide at the base, up to 50 feet wide at the top, 25 feet tall, and lasts for 1 minute or until the wave shaper is incapacitated. Any creature or object in the water and within 25 feet of the vortex is pulled 10 feet toward it. A creature can swim away from the vortex by succeeding on a DC 14 Strength (Athletics) check.

When a creature enters the vortex for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there, it must make a DC 14 Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 9 (2d8) bludgeoning damage and is caught in the vortex until it ends. On a success, the creature takes half damage and isn't caught in the vortex. A creature caught in the vortex can use its action to try to swim away from the vortex as described above, but it has disadvantage on the Strength (Athletics) check to do so.

The first time each turn that an object enters the vortex, the object takes 9 (2d8) bludgeoning damage. This damage occurs each round it remains in the vortex.

legendary_actions.text:
If she is wearing the Black Dragon Mask, Rezmir can take up to two legendary actions between each of her turns, taking the actions all at once or spreading them over the round. A legendary action can be taken only at the start or end of a turn.

A 15-foot radius of magical darkness extends from a point Rezmir can see within 60 feet of her and spreads around corners. The darkness lasts as long as Rezmir maintains concentration, up to 1 minute. A creature with darkvision can't see through this darkness, and no natural light can illuminate it. If any of the area overlaps with a area of light created by a spell of 2nd level or lower, the spell creating the light is dispelled.

traits.text: If Auril fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Ice Morningstar
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) cold damage.

actions.name: Ice Dart
