actions.name: Cone of Cold (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
actions.text: Auril causes a magical blast of cold air to erupt from her hand. Each creature in a 60-foot cone must make a DC 21 Constitution saving throw, taking 36 (8d8) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: Create Ice Mephit (3/Day)
actions.text: Auril breaks off an icicle from her body and hurls it into an unoccupied space she can see within 20 feet of her, where it magically transforms into an ice mephit (see its entry in the Monster Manual). The mephit acts immediately after Auril in the initiative order and obeys her commands.

actions.name: Ice Stasis (recharge 5-6)
actions.text: Auril magically creates a gem-sized ice crystal that hovers in a space within 5 feet of her. Auril then targets a creature she can see within 60 feet of the crystal. The target must succeed on a DC 21 Charisma saving throw or become trapped in the crystal, which is immovable. If the saving throw succeeds, the crystal shatters and nothing else happens. A creature trapped in the crystal is stunned, has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the crystal, and takes 21 (6d6) cold damage at the start of each of its turns. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, freeing itself on a success. The creature is also freed if the crystal is destroyed, which is a Tiny object with AC 18, 9 hit points, and immunity to all damage except fire damage. The freed creature appears in an unoccupied space of its choice within 30 feet of the shattered crystal.

legendary_actions.name: ​
legendary_actions.text: The Auril (Second Form) can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The Auril (Second Form) regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary_actions.name: Attack
legendary_actions.text: Auril makes one weapon attack.

legendary_actions.name: Ice Flurry (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.text: Each creature within 30 feet of Auril takes 5 (2d4) piercing damage from swirling ice, and nonmagical, open flames in that area are extinguished.

legendary_actions.name: Splinter (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.text: Auril uses Create Ice Mephit or causes one to ice mephit she can see within 60 feet of her to explode and die. A mephit that dies in this way does not use its Death Burst. Instead, each creature within 10 feet of the exploding mephit must succeed on a DC 21 Dexterity saving throw, taking 13 (3d8) piercing damage on a failed saving throw, and half as much damage on a successful one.

traits.name: Divine Being
traits.text: Auril can't be surprised and can't be changed into another form against her will.

traits.name: Divine Resurrection
traits.text: When Auril drops to 0 hit points, her crystalline form shatters and her divine spark vanishes. She is dead until the next winter solstice, when she reappears at full health in a cold, remote location of her choosing.

traits.name: Frigid Aura
traits.text: So long as Auril has at least 1 hit point in this form, each creature within 10 feet of her takes 10 cold damage at the start of each of her turns.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day in This Form)
traits.text: If Auril fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: Auril has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.text: Auril doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Auril uses Polar Ray twice.

actions.name: Polar Ray
actions.text: rs +13 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. On hit: 14 (4d6) cold damage.

actions.name: Blizzard Veil
actions.text: Auril creates a magical blizzard in a 30-foot-radius sphere centered on herself. The area within the sphere is heavily obscured, and the sphere moves with Auril. The effect lasts until Auril drops to 0 hit points in this form, until she chooses to end the effect (no action required), or until her concentration is broken (as if concentrating on a spell).

legendary_actions.name: ​
legendary_actions.text: The Auril (Third Form) can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The Auril (Third Form) regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary_actions.name: Polar Ray
legendary_actions.text: Auril uses Polar Ray.

legendary_actions.name: Intensify Aura (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.text: Auril's Frigid Aura deals an extra 10 cold damage until the end of her next turn.

legendary_actions.name: Blinding Gleam (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.text: Auril's form flares with a blue light. Each creature that can see Auril and is within 10 feet of her must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw or be blinded by Auril's magical gleam for 1 minute. The blinded creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

traits.name: Icy Doom
traits.text: When Avarice dies, her corpse freezes for 9 days, during which time it can't be thawed, harmed by fire, animated, or raised from the dead.

traits.name: Special Equipment
traits.text: Avarice wields a staff of frost with 10 charges (see "Actions" below).

actions.name: Fire Bolt (Cantrip)
actions.text: rs +6 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. On hit: 11 (2d10) fire damage.

actions.name: Staff of Frost
actions.text: While holding this staff, Avarice can expend 1 or more of its charges to cast one of the following spells from it (spell save DC 14): cone of cold (5 charges), fog cloud (1 charge), ice storm (4 charges), or wall of ice (4 charges). The staff regains 1d6 + 4 charges daily at dawn. If its last charge is expended, roll a d20; on a 1, the staff turns to water and is destroyed.

traits.name: Charge
traits.text: If the moose moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with an antlers attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 9 (2d8) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

traits.name: Sure-Footed
traits.text: The moose has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it prone.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The moose makes two attacks: one with its antlers and one with its hooves.

actions.name: Antlers
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Hooves
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
traits.text: The dwarf has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

traits.name: Dwarven Resilience
traits.text: The dwarf has advantage on saving throws against poison and resistance against poison damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The dwarf makes two melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

actions.name: Handaxe
actions.text: Melee or ranged weapon attack +2 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. On hit: 3 (1d6 + 0) piercing damage.

actions.name: Light Crossbow
actions.text: Ranged weapon attack +4 to hit, ranged 80/320 ft., one target. On hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

traits.name: Auril's Blessing (3/Day)
traits.text: When Bjornhild hits a creature with a weapon attack, the attack deals an extra 11 (2d10) cold damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Bjornhild makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Greataxe
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 10 (1d12 + 4) slashing damage, plus 11 (2d10) cold damage if Bjornhild uses Auril's Blessing.

actions.name: Spear
actions.text: Melee or ranged weapon attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. On hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage, or 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack, plus 11 (2d10) cold damage if Bjornhild uses Auril's Blessing.

name: Brain in a Jar
languages: the languages it knew in life
senses: blindsight 120 ft. (blind beyond this radius); see also "detect sentience" below

traits.name: Detect Sentience
traits.text: The brain can sense the presence and location of any creature within 300 feet of it that has an Intelligence of 3 or higher, regardless of interposing barriers, unless the creature is protected by a mind blank spell.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: The brain has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magic effects.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.text: The brain doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Chill Touch (Cantrip)
actions.text: rs +6 to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. On hit: 13 (3d8) necrotic damage, and the target can't regain hit points until the start of the brain's next turn. If the target is undead, it also has disadvantage on attack rolls against the brain until the end of the brain's next turn.

actions.name: Mind Blast (recharge 5-6)
actions.text: The brain magically emits psychic energy in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 14 Intelligence saving throw or take 17 (3d8 + 4) psychic damage and be stunned for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

traits.name: Chardalyn Madness
traits.text: The berserker must roll a d6 at the start of each of its turns. On a 1, the berserker does nothing on its turn except speak to a nonexistent, evil master whom it has pledged to serve.

traits.name: Reckless
traits.text: At the start of its turn, the berserker can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The berserker attacks three times with a melee weapon.

actions.name: Chardalyn Flail
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Chardalyn Javelin
actions.text: Melee or ranged weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. On hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the end of its next turn.

name: Chardalyn Dragon
languages: the languages known by its creator

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.text: The dragon is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: The dragon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.text: The dragon deals double damage to objects and structures.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.text: The dragon doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep, and it gains no benefit from finishing a short or long rest.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The dragon uses its Malevolent Presence. It then makes three attacks: two with its claws and one with its tail. If the dragon isn't flying, it can also make one attack with its wings.

actions.name: Claw
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 14 (2d6 + 7) slashing damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. On hit: 18 (2d10 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Wings
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. On hit: 12 (2d4 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Malevolent Presence
actions.text: Any creature with an Intelligence of 4 or more that is within 30 feet of the dragon must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or be charmed by it for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Malevolent Presence for the next 24 hours. A creature charmed in this way fixates on another creature or object that the dragon mentally chooses and must, on each of its turns, move as close as it can to that target and use its action to make a melee attack against it. If the dragon doesn't choose a target, the charmed creature can act normally on its turn.

actions.name: Radiant Breath (recharge 5-6)
actions.text: The dragon exhales a ray of radiant energy in a 120-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw, taking 31 (7d8) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.text: The baboon has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the baboon's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 1 (1d4 - 1) piercing damage, plus an extra 3 (1d6) poison damage.

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.text: The cat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

actions.name: Claws
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 1 slashing damage.

traits.text: The fox has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.

traits.name: Chimeric Creation

actions.text: Melee weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. On hit: 1 piercing damage.

traits.name: Escape
traits.text: The hare can take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

traits.text: The rat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Chimeric Creation
traits.text: The rat has gills, iridescent scales, and the ability to breathe air and water.

actions.text: Melee weapon attack +0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 1 piercing damage.

traits.text: The weasel has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

traits.name: Chimeric Creation
traits.text: The weasel has glowing eyes that emit bright light out in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 1 piercing damage.

traits.name: Blinding Light
traits.text: The walker sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet. As a bonus action, the walker can target one creature in its bright light that it can see and force it to succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be blinded until the start of the walker's next turn.

traits.name: Icy Doom
traits.text: Any creature killed by the walker freezes for 9 days, during which time it can't be thawed, harmed by fire, animated, or raised from the dead.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.text: The walker doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack

actions.name: Slam
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 11 (2d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage plus 14 (4d6) cold damage.

actions.name: Cold Ray
actions.text: rs +3 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. On hit: 25 (4d10 + 3) cold damage.

name: Demos Magen
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

traits.name: Fiery End
traits.text: If the magen dies, its body disintegrates in a harmless burst of fire and smoke, leaving behind anything it was wearing or carrying.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: The magen has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.text: The magen doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack

actions.name: Greatsword
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Light Crossbow
actions.text: Ranged weapon attack +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. On hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Shocking Grasp (Cantrip)
actions.text: ms +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature (the attack roll has advantage if the target is wearing armor made of metal). On hit: 9 (2d8) lightning damage, and the target can't take reactions until the start of his next turn.

actions.name: Acid Splash (Cantrip)
actions.text: Dzaan hurls a bubble of acid at one creature he can see within 60 feet of it, or at two such creatures that are within 5 feet of each other. A target must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or take 7 (2d6) acid damage.

actions.name: Magic Missile (1st-Level Spell; Requires a Spell Slot)
actions.text: Dzaan creates three darts of magical force. Each dart unerringly strikes one creature Dzaan can see within 120 feet of it, dealing 3 (1d4 + 1) force damage. If Dzaan casts this spell using a 2nd-level spell slot, he creates one more dart.

actions.name: Shocking Grasp (Cantrip)
actions.text: ms +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature (the attack roll has advantage if the target is wearing armor made of metal). On hit: 9 (2d8) lightning damage, and the target can't take reactions until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Acid Splash (Cantrip)
actions.text: The simulacrum hurls a bubble of acid at one creature it can see within 60 feet of it, or at two such creatures that are within 5 feet of each other. A target must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or take 7 (2d6) acid damage.

actions.name: Magic Missile (1st-Level Spell; Requires a Spell Slot)
actions.text: The simulacrum creates three darts of magical force. Each dart unerringly strikes one creature the simulacrum can see within 120 feet of it, dealing 3 (1d4 + 1) force damage. If the simulacrum casts this spell using a 2nd-level spell slot, it creates one more dart.

traits.name: Keen Hearing
traits.text: The fox has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. On hit: 1 piercing damage.

name: Frost Druid
speed: walk 40 ft. (wolf form only), burrow 5 ft. (fox form only), climb 30 ft. (goat form only), fly 60 ft. (owl form only)

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The druid makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Ice Sickle (Humanoid Form Only)
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) slashing damage plus 5 (2d4) cold damage.

actions.name: Maul (Beast Form Only)
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.

actions.name: Change Shape
actions.text: The druid magically polymorphs into a beast form—fox, mountain goat, owl, or wolf—or back into its humanoid form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the beast form (the druid's choice). It reverts to its humanoid form when it dies. The druid's statistics are the same in each form, except where noted in this stat block.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.text: The skeleton doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The skeleton makes two greataxe attacks.

actions.name: Greataxe
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. On hit: 25 (3d12 + 6) slashing damage.

actions.name: Freezing Stare
actions.text: The skeleton targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or take 35 (10d6) cold damage and be paralyzed until the end of its next turn.

name: Galvan Magen
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

traits.name: Fiery End
traits.text: If the magen dies, its body disintegrates in a harmless burst of fire and smoke, leaving behind anything it was wearing or carrying.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: The magen has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.text: The magen doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The magen makes two Shocking Touch attacks.

actions.name: Shocking Touch
actions.text: ms +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target (the magen has advantage on the attack roll if the target is wearing armor made of metal). On hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) lightning damage.

actions.name: Static Discharge (recharge 5-6)
actions.text: The magen discharges a lightning bolt in a 60-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw (with disadvantage if the creature is wearing armor made of metal), taking 22 (4d10) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

traits.name: Hold Breath
traits.text: The walrus can hold its breath for 30 minutes.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The walrus makes two attacks: one with its body flop and one with its tusks.

actions.name: Body Flop
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Tusks
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 16 (3d6 + 6) piercing damage.

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.text: The vampire has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Rampage
traits.text: When it reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the vampire can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a bite attack.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.text: The vampire regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point and isn't in sunlight or running water. If the vampire takes radiant damage or damage from holy water, this trait doesn't function at the start of the vampire's next turn.

traits.name: Shapechanger
traits.text:
If the vampire isn't in sunlight, it can use its action to polymorph into a Large hyena or a Medium cloud of mist, or back into its true form.

While in hyena form, the vampire can't speak, and its walking speed is 50 feet. Its statistics, other than its size and speed, are unchanged. Anything it is wearing transforms with it, but nothing it is carrying does. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

While in mist form, the vampire can't take any actions, speak, or manipulate objects. it is weightless, has a flying speed of 20 feet, can hover, and can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. In addition, if air can pass through a space, the mist can do so without squeezing, and it can't pass through water. It has advantage on Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution saving throws, and it is immune to all nonmagical damage, except the damage it takes from sunlight.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.text: The vampire doesn't require air.

traits.name: Vampire Weaknesses
traits.text:
The vampire has the following flaws:

Enraged by Celestial. If it hears words of Celestial spoken, the vampire must try to attack the source of those spoken words on its next turn. If these words come from multiple sources and from opposite directions, the vampire is restrained. Otherwise, it moves to attack what it perceives to be the closest source.

Repulsed by Perfume. The vampire has disadvantage on melee attack rolls made against any creature wearing perfume or carrying an open container of it.

Stake to the Heart. If a piercing weapon made of wood is driven into the vampire's heart while the vampire is incapacitated in its resting place, the vampire is paralyzed until the stake is removed.

Sunlight Hypersensitivity. The vampire takes 20 radiant damage when it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

actions.name: Multiattack (Vampire Form Only)
actions.text: The vampire makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

actions.name: Bite (Hyena or Vampire Form Only)
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. On hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) necrotic damage. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and the vampire regains hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. the target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0.

actions.name: Claws (Vampire Form Only)
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 10 (2d4 + 5) slashing damage.

actions.name: Frightful Cackle (Hyena or Vampire Form Only)
actions.text: The vampire emits a bone-chilling cackle. Each creature of the vampire's choice that is within 120 feet of the vampire and can hear its cackle must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the vampire's Frightful Cackle for the next 24 hours.

actions.name: Sickening Gaze (Hyena or Vampire Form Only)
actions.text: The vampire targets one humanoid it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see the vampire, the target must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw against this magic or be poisoned for 24 hours. A creature whose saving throw is successful is immune to this vampire's Sickening Gaze for 24 hours.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: The ceremorph has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.text: Melee weapon attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. On hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) psychic damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is grappled (escape DC 9) and must succeed on a DC 15 Intelligence saving throw or be stunned until this grapple ends.

actions.name: Extract Brain
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one incapacitated humanoid grappled by the ceremorph. On hit: 55 (10d10) piercing damage. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the ceremorph kills the target by extracting and devouring its brain.

actions.name: Laser Pistol
actions.text: Ranged weapon attack +5 to hit, range 40/120 ft., one target. On hit: 12 (3d6 + 2) radiant damage.

actions.name: Mind Blast (recharge 5-6)

Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 15 Intelligence saving throw or take 22 (4d8 + 4) psychic damage and be stunned for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Extract Brain
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one incapacitated creature grappled by the squidling. On hit: 27 (5d10) piercing damage. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the squidling kills the target by extracting and devouring its brain.

actions.name: Mind Tickle (recharge 5-6)

traits.text: Grandolpha has advantage on saving throws against poison, spells, and illusions, as well as to resist being charmed or paralyzed.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.text: While in sunlight, Grandolpha has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Poison Spray (Cantrip)
actions.text: Grandolpha extends her hand toward a creature she can see within 10 feet of her and projects a puff of noxious gas from her palm. The creature must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or take 13 (2d12) poison damage.

traits.name: Indomitable (3/Day)
traits.text: Gunvald can reroll a saving throw he fails. He must use the new roll.

traits.name: Menacing Blows (1/Turn)
traits.text: Gunvald deals an extra 6 (1d12) damage when he hits a target with a weapon attack. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the start of Gunvald's next turn.

traits.name: Second Wind (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
traits.text: As a bonus action, Gunvald can regain 15 hit points.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Gunvald makes three melee attacks.

actions.name: Battleaxe
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) slashing damage, or 10 (1d10 + 5) slashing damage when used with two hands, plus 6 (1d12) slashing damage if Gunvald uses Menacing Blows.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.text: Melee or ranged weapon attack +8 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. On hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) piercing damage, plus 6 (1d12) piercing damage if Gunvald uses Menacing Blows.

traits.name: Escape
traits.text: The hare can take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

name: Headless Iron Golem
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

traits.name: Fire Absorption
traits.text: Whenever the golem is subjected to fire damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the fire damage dealt.

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.text: The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: The golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.text: The golem's weapon attacks are magical.

traits.name: Headless
traits.text: It is blinded and deafened, giving it disadvantage on all its attack rolls, and it can't use its Poison Breath.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The golem makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +13 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 20 (3d8 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Sword
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. On hit: 23 (3d10 + 7) slashing damage.

traits.name: Brave
traits.text: Hengar has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

traits.name: Brute
traits.text: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when Hengar hits with it (included in the attack).

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Hengar makes three melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

actions.name: Spear
actions.text: Melee or ranged weapon attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. and range 20/60 ft., one target. On hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage, or 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

actions.name: Shield Bash
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. On hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

name: Hypnos Magen
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

traits.name: Fiery End
traits.text: If the magen dies, its body disintegrates in a harmless burst of fire and smoke, leaving behind anything it was wearing or carrying.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: The magen has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.text: The magen doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Psychic Lash
actions.text: The magen's eyes glow silver as it targets one creature that it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw or take 11 (2d10) psychic damage.

actions.name: Suggestion
actions.text: The magen casts the suggestion spell (save DC 12), requiring no material components. The target must be a creature that the magen can communicate with telepathically. If it succeeds on its saving throw, the target is immune to this magen's suggestion spell for the next 24 hours. The magen's spellcasting ability is Intelligence.

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.text: While the ice piercer remains motionless on the ceiling, it is indistinguishable from a normal stalactite.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.text: The ice piercer can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.name: Drop
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +3 to hit, one creature directly underneath the ice piercer. On hit: 10 (3d6) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) cold damage. Miss: The ice piercer takes half the normal falling damage for the distance fallen.

traits.name: Cold Aura
traits.text: While it's alive, the troll generates an aura of bitter cold that fills the area within 10 feet of it. At the start of the troll's turn, all nonmagical flames in the aura are extinguished. Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the troll takes 10 (3d6) cold damage.

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.text: The ice troll has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.text: The ice troll regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the troll takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the troll's next turn. The ice troll dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The troll makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) cold damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage plus 9 (2d8) cold damage. If the target takes any of the cold damage, the target must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or have disadvantage on its attack rolls until the end of its next turn.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.text: The kobold has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kobold's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.text: While in sunlight, the kobold has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.text: Melee or ranged weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. On hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.text: Melee or ranged weapon attack +0 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. On hit: 1 (1d6 - 2) piercing damage.

name: Icewind Kobold Zombie
languages: understands Common and Draconic but can't speak

traits.name: Undead Fortitude
traits.text: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.text: The zombie doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 2 (1d6 - 1) piercing damage.

traits.name: Blood Frenzy
traits.text: Isarr has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

traits.name: Indomitable (3/Day)
traits.text: Isarr can reroll a saving throw he fails. He must use the new roll.

traits.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
traits.text: Isarr has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Isarr makes three melee attacks.

actions.name: Sickle
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage, plus 13 (2d12) piercing damage if the target has no allies it can see within 10 feet of it.

actions.name: Heavy Crossbow
actions.text: Ranged weapon attack +6 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. On hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage.

traits.name: Brute
traits.text: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when Jarund hits with it (included in the attack).

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Jarund makes three melee attacks.

actions.name: Warhammer
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage, or 15 (2d10 + 4) bludgeoning damage when used with two hands.

actions.name: Shield
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. On hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage, and Jarund pushes the target 5 feet away from him if it's Large or smaller. Jarund then enters the space vacated by the target. If the target is pushed to within 5 feet of a creature friendly to Jarund, that creature can make an attack against the target as a reaction.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.text: Melee or ranged weapon attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. On hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.

traits.name: Dark Devotion
traits.text: The fanatic has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The fanatic makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.text: Melee or ranged weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one creature. On hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

traits.name: Hold Breath
traits.text: Kingsport can hold its breath for 20 minutes.

actions.name: Beak
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.

traits.name: Dark Devotion
traits.text: The fanatic has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

traits.name: Icy Doom
traits.text: When the cultist dies, its corpse freezes for 9 days, during which time it can't be thawed, harmed by fire, animated, or raised from the dead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The fanatic makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.text: Melee or ranged weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one creature. On hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

traits.name: Water Breathing
traits.text: The trout can breathe only underwater.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.text: The vampire has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the vampire's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.text: The vampire regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point and isn't in sunlight or running water. If the vampire takes radiant damage or damage from holy water, this trait doesn't function at the start of its next turn.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.text: The vampire doesn't require air.

traits.name: Vampire Weaknesses
traits.text:
The vampire has the following flaws:

Forbiddance. The vampire can't enter a residence without an invitation from one of the occupants.

Harmed by Running Water. The vampire takes 20 acid damage when it starts its turn in running water.

Stake to the Heart. The vampire is destroyed if a piercing weapon made of wood is driven into its heart while it is incapacitated in its resting place.

Sunlight Hypersensitivity. The vampire takes 20 radiant damage when it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. On hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage plus 5 (2d4) necrotic damage. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and the vampire regains hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: The living spell has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.text: The living spell doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Force Fist
actions.text: ms +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 26 (4d8 + 8) force damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, the living spell can move it up to 5 feet and move with it, without provoking opportunity attacks.

actions.name: Grasping Hand
actions.text: The living spell attempts to grab a Huge or smaller creature within 5 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or be grappled (escape DC 15). Until the grapple ends, the target takes 15 (2d6 + 8) bludgeoning damage at the start of each of its turns. The living spell can grapple only one creature at a time and can't use Force Fist until the grapple ends.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: The living spell has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Unfettered
traits.text: The living spell can move through any barrier, even a wall of magical force.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.text: The living spell doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Force Blade
actions.text: ms +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 26 (4d12) force damage, unless the living spell rolled an 18 or higher on the d20 for the attack, in which case the attack is a critical hit that deals 78 (12d12) force damage instead.

traits.name: Dimensional Form
traits.text: The living spell can enter another creature's space and vice versa, and it can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing. The living spell can't detach from a solid surface, such as a wall, ceiling, or floor. If it has no surface to attach to, the living spell is destroyed (see "Planar Destruction" below).

traits.name: Extradimensional Chamber
traits.text: When the living spell enters another creature's space (or vice versa) for the first time on a turn, the other creature must succeed on a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw or be pulled into the living spell's extradimensional space, an unfurnished stone chamber 30 feet in every dimension. A creature too big to fit in this space succeeds on the saving throw automatically. Creatures in the chamber never run out of breathable air. Magic that enables transit between planes, such as plane shift, can be used to escape the chamber, which has no exits otherwise. Creatures trapped inside the extradimensional chamber can't see, target, or deal damage to the living spell; however, they can damage the room around them. Each 5-foot-square section of ceiling, wall, and floor in the chamber has AC 17, 50 hit points, immunity to poison and psychic damage, and immunity to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage that is nonmagical. If any section is reduced to 0 hit points, the living spell and its chamber are destroyed (see "Planar Destruction" below).

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: The living spell has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Planar Destruction
traits.text: The living spell is destroyed when it or a 5-foot-square section of its extradimensional chamber is reduced to 0 hit points, or when the living spell has no surface to attach to. When the living spell is destroyed, the contents of its extradimensional chamber are expelled, appearing as close to the living spell's previous location as possible. Each expelled creature appears in a randomly determined unoccupied space, along with whatever it is wearing or carrying.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.text: The living spell doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

traits.name: Detect Life
traits.text: The banshee can magically sense the presence of creatures up to 5 miles away that aren't undead or constructs. She knows the general direction they're in but not their exact locations.

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
traits.text: The banshee can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. She takes 5 (1d10) force damage if she ends her turn inside an object.

actions.name: Spectral Longbow
actions.text: rs +4 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. On hit: 12 (3d6 + 2) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Horrifying Visage
actions.text: Each non-undead creature within 60 feet of the banshee that can see her must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened for 1 minute. A frightened target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, with disadvantage if the banshee is within line of sight, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to the banshee's Horrifying Visage for the next 24 hours.

actions.name: Wail (1/Day)
actions.text: The banshee releases a mournful wail, provided that she isn't in sunlight. This wail has no effect on constructs and undead. All other creatures within 30 feet of her that can hear her must make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw. On a failure, a creature drops to 0 hit points. On a success, a creature takes 10 (3d6) psychic damage.

actions.name: Quarterstaff
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +2 to hit (+4 to hit with shillelagh), reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage, 4 (1d8) bludgeoning damage if wielded with two hands, or 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage with shillelagh.

traits.name: Charge
traits.text: If the goat moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 12 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

traits.name: Sure-Footed
traits.text: The goat has advantage on Strength and Dexterity saving throws made against effects that would knock it prone.

actions.name: Ram
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Ethereal Sight
traits.text: The ghost can see 60 feet into the Ethereal Plane when it is on the Material Plane, and vice versa.

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
traits.text: The ghost can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

actions.name: Withering Touch
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 17 (4d6 + 3) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Etherealness
actions.text: The ghost enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, or vice versa. It is visible on the Material Plane while it is in the Border Ethereal, and vice versa, yet it can't affect or be affected by anything on the other plane.

actions.name: Horrifying Visage
actions.text: Each non-undead creature within 60 feet of the ghost that can see it must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened for 1 minute. If the save fails by 5 or more, the target also ages 1d4 × 10 years. A frightened target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the frightened condition on itself on a success. If the target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to this ghost's Horrifying Visage for the next 24 hours. The aging effect can be reversed by a greater restoration spell, but only if it is cast within 24 hours.

actions.name: Possession (recharge on 6)
actions.text: One humanoid that the ghost can see within 5 feet of it must succeed on a DC 14 Charisma saving throw or be possessed by the ghost; the ghost then disappears, and the target is incapacitated and loses control of its body. The ghost now controls the body but doesn't deprive the target of awareness. The ghost can't be targeted by any attack, spell, or other effect, except ones that turn undead, and it retains its alignment, Intelligence, Wisdom, Charisma, and immunity to being charmed and frightened. It otherwise uses the possessed target's statistics, but doesn't gain access to the target's knowledge, class features, or proficiencies. The possession lasts until the body drops to 0 hit points, the ghost ends it as a bonus action, or the ghost is turned or forced out by an effect like the dispel evil and good spell. When the possession ends, the ghost reappears in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the body. The target is immune to this ghost's Possession for 24 hours after succeeding on the saving throw or after the possession ends.

actions.name: Shocking Grasp (Cantrip)
actions.text: ms +5 to hit (with advantage on the attack if the target is wearing armor made of metal), reach 5 ft., one creature. On hit: 9 (2d8) lightning damage, and the target can't take reactions until the start of its next turn.

actions.text: Melee weapon attack +2 to hit (+4 to hit with shillelagh), reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage, 4 (1d8) bludgeoning damage if wielded with two hands, or 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage with shillelagh.

actions.name: Spear
actions.text: Melee or ranged weapon attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. On hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage, or 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

traits.name: Hold Breath

traits.name: Keen Smell

traits.name: Cold Regeneration

If he takes fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of Sephek's next turn. Sephek dies only if he starts his turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

actions.name: Multiattack

actions.name: Ice Longsword
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if Sephek uses the weapon with two hands, plus 5 (2d4) cold damage.

actions.name: Ice Dagger
actions.text: Ranged weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. On hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 5 (2d4) cold damage.

traits.name: Immutable Form

traits.name: Melt

traits.name: Unusual Nature

traits.text: The snowy owlbear has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight or smell.

actions.name: Multiattack

actions.name: Beak
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. On hit: 10 (1d10 + 5) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
