traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.text: Aerisi has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put her to sleep.

traits.name: Howling Defeat
traits.text: When Aerisi drops to 0 hit points, her body disappears in a howling whirlwind that disperses quickly and harmlessly. Anything she is wearing or carrying is left behind.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
traits.text: If Aerisi fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Windvane
actions.text: Melee or ranged weapon attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. On hit: 9 (1d6 + 6) piercing damage, or 10 (1d8 + 6) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack, plus 3 (1d6) lightning damage.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.text: Melee or ranged weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. On hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Multiattack

actions.name: Morningstar
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The priest makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Glaive
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. On hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) slashing damage.

traits.name: Bond of the Black Earth
traits.text: The burrowshark is magically bound to a bulette trained to serve as its mount. While mounted on its bulette, the burrowshark shares the bulette's senses and can ride the bulette while it burrows. The bonded bulette obeys the burrowshark's commands. If its mount dies, the burrowshark can train a new bulette to serve as its bonded mount, a process requiring a month.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The burrowshark makes three melee attacks.

actions.name: Spear
actions.text: Melee or ranged weapon attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. On hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage, or 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

actions.name: Quarterstaff
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Sharktoothed Longsword
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage, or 7 (1d10 + 2) slashing damage if used with two hands. Against a target is wearing no armor, the reaver deals an extra die of damage with this sword.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.text: Melee or ranged weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. On hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

traits.name: Bonded Mount
traits.text: The knight is magically bound to a beast with an innate swimming speed trained to serve as its mount. While mounted on this beast, the knight gains the beast's senses and ability to breathe underwater. The bonded mount obeys the knight's commands. If its mount dies, the knight can train a new beast to serve as its bonded mount, a process requiring a month.

traits.name: Sneak Attack
traits.text: The knight deals an extra 7 (2d6) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the knight that isn't incapacitated and the knight doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The knight makes two shortsword attacks.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Lance
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. On hit: 9 (1d12 + 3) piercing damage.

traits.name: Action Surge (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
traits.text: Drannin takes an additional action on his turn.

traits.name: Brute
traits.text: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when Drannin hits with it (included in the attack).

traits.name: Dwarven Resilience
traits.text: Drannin has advantage on saving throws against poison.

traits.name: Indomitable (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
traits.text: Drannin can reroll a saving throw that he fails. He must use the new roll.

traits.name: Second Wind (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
traits.text: Drannin can use a bonus action to regain 16 (1d10 + 11) hit points.

traits.name: Special Equipment
traits.text: Drannin wears a control amulet for his shield guardian (see the Monster Manual) and a ring of cold resistance. He also carries a potion of frost giant strength.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Drannin makes three attacks with his greataxe.

actions.name: Greataxe
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 17 (2d12 + 4) slashing damage.

traits.name: Summon Mephits (Recharges after a Long Rest)
traits.text: By puffing on his pipe, Elizar can use an action to cast conjure minor elementals. If he does so, he summons four smoke mephits.

actions.name: Dagger +1
actions.text: Melee or ranged weapon attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. On hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

traits.name: Flaming Weapon (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
traits.text: As a bonus action, the guard can wreath one melee weapon it is wielding in flame. The guard is unharmed by this fire, which lasts until the end of the guard's next turn. While wreathed in flame, the weapon deals an extra 3 (1d6) fire damage on a hit.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The guard makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Heavy Crossbow
actions.text: Ranged weapon attack +3 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. On hit: 6 (1d10 + 1) piercing damage.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.text: Melee or ranged weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. On hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

traits.name: Shapechanger (2/Day)
traits.text:
The fathomer can use its action to polymorph into a Medium serpent composed of water, or back into its true form. Anything the fathomer is wearing or carrying is subsumed into the serpent form during the change, inaccessible until the fathomer returns to its true form. The fathomer reverts to its true form after 4 hours, unless it can expend another use of this trait. If the fathomer is knocked unconscious or dies, it also reverts to its true form.

While in serpent form, the fathomer gains a swimming speed of 40 feet, the ability to breathe underwater, immunity to poison damage, as well as resistance to fire damage and bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical attacks. It also has immunity to the following conditions: exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, poisoned, restrained, prone, unconscious. The serpent form can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. In addition, if water can pass through a space, the serpent can do so without squeezing.

traits.name: Olhydra's Armor (Human Form Only)
traits.text: The fathomer can cast mage armor at will, without expending material components.

actions.name: Constrict (Serpent Form Only)
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is grappled (escape DC 12). Until the grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the fathomer can't constrict another target.

actions.name: Dagger (Human Form Only)
actions.text: Melee or ranged weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. On hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The knight makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage, or 7 (1d10 + 2) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Spear
actions.text: Melee or ranged weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. On hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

traits.name: Wreathed in Flame
traits.text: For the flamewrath, the warm version of the fire shield spell has a duration of "until dispelled." The fire shield burns for 10 minutes after the flamewrath dies, consuming its body.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.text: Melee or ranged weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. On hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.text: Gar can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
traits.text: If Gar fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Water Walk
traits.text: Gar can stand and move on liquid surfaces as if they were solid ground.

traits.name: Watery Fall
traits.text: When Gar drops to 0 hit points, his body collapses into a pool of inky water that rapidly disperses. Anything he was wearing or carrying is left behind.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Gar makes two melee attacks, one with his claw and one with Drown.

actions.name: Claw
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 13). Until the grapple ends, Gar can't attack other creatures with his claw.

actions.name: Drown
actions.text: Melee or ranged weapon attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. On hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) cold damage.

traits.name: Assassinate
traits.text: During its first turn, Ghald has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn. Any hit Ghald scores against a surprised creature is a critical hit.

traits.name: Limited Amphibiousness
traits.text: Ghald can breathe air and water, but he needs to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

traits.name: Shark Telepathy
traits.text: Ghald can magically command any shark within 120 feet of him, using a limited telepathy.

traits.name: Sneak Attack
traits.text: Ghald deals an extra 14 (4d6) damage when he hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of Ghald's that isn't incapacitated and Ghald doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Ghald makes three attacks, one with his bite and two with his shortswords.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. On hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Garrote
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one Medium or Small creature against which Ghald has advantage on the attack roll. On hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 15). Until the grapple ends, the target can't breathe, and Ghald has advantage on attack rolls against it.

traits.name: Evasion
traits.text: If Hellenrae is subjected to an effect that allows her to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, she instead takes no damage if she succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if she fails.

traits.name: Stunning Strike (recharge 5-6)
traits.text: When Hellenrae hits a target with a melee weapon attack, the target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of Hellenrae's next turn.

traits.name: Unarmored Defense
traits.text: While Hellenrae is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, her AC includes her Wisdom modifier.

traits.name: Unarmored Movement
traits.text: While Hellenrae is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, her speed increases by 20 feet (included in her speed).

actions.text: Hellenrae makes three melee attacks.

actions.name: Unarmed Strike
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

traits.text: As a bonus action, the initiate gains advantage on the next ranged attack roll it makes before the end of its next turn.

traits.name: Hold Breath
traits.text: The initiate can hold its breath for 30 minutes.

actions.name: Multiattack

traits.name: Unarmored Defense

traits.name: Unarmored Movement

actions.name: Multiattack

actions.name: Unarmed Strike
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Empowered Attacks
traits.text: Imix's slam attacks are treated as magical for the purpose of bypassing resistance and immunity to nonmagical attacks.

traits.name: Fire Aura
traits.text: At the start of each of Imix's turns, each creature within 10 feet of him takes 17 (5d6) fire damage, and flammable objects in the aura that aren't being worn or carried ignite. A creature also takes 17 (5d6) fire damage if it touches Imix or hits him with a melee attack while within 10 feet of him, and a creature takes that damage the first time on a turn that Imix moves into its space. Nonmagical weapons that hit Imix are destroyed by fire immediately after dealing damage to him

traits.name: Fire Form
traits.text: Imix can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. He can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without squeezing if fire could pass through that space.

traits.name: Illumination
traits.text: Imix sheds bright light in a 60-foot radius and dim light for an additional 60 feet.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.text: If Imix fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: Imix has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Imix makes two slam attacks or two flame blast attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. On hit: 18 (2d10 + 7) bludgeoning damage plus 18 (5d6) fire damage.

actions.name: Flame Blast
actions.text: rs +12 to hit, range 250 ft., one target. On hit: 35 (10d6) fire damage.

actions.name: Summon Elementals (1/Day)
actions.text: Imix summons up to three fire elementals and loses 30 hit points for each elemental he summons. Summoned elementals have maximum hit points, appear within 100 feet of Imix, and disappear if Imix is reduced to 0 hit points.

legendary_actions.name: ​
legendary_actions.text: The Imix can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The Imix regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary_actions.name: Heat Wave
legendary_actions.text: Imix creates a blast of heat within 300 feet of himself. Each creature in the area in physical contact with metal objects (for example, carrying metal weapons or wearing metal armor) takes 9 (2d8) fire damage. Each creature in the area that isn't resistant or immune to fire damage must make a DC 21 Constitution saving throw or gain one level of exhaustion.

legendary_actions.name: Teleport (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.text: Imix magically teleports up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space he can see. Anything Imix is wearing or carrying isn't teleported with him.

legendary_actions.name: Combustion (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.text: Imix causes one creature he can see within 30 feet of him to burst into flames. The target must make a DC 21 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 70 (20d6) fire damage and catches fire. A target on fire takes 10 (3d6) fire damage when it starts its turn, and remains on fire until it or another creature takes an action to douse the flames. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and doesn't catch fire.

traits.name: Earthen Defeat
traits.text: When Marlos drops to 0 hit points, his body transforms into mud and collapses into a pool. Anything he is wearing or carrying is left behind.

traits.name: Earth Passage
traits.text: Marlos can move in difficult terrain composed of anything made from earth or stone as if it were normal terrain. He can move through solid earth and rock as if it were difficult terrain. If he ends his turn there, he is shunted into the nearest space he last occupied.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
traits.text: If Marlos fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Petrifying Gaze
traits.text:
When a creature that can see Marlos's eyes starts its turn within 30 feet of him, Marlos can force it to make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw if Marlos isn't incapacitated and can see the creature. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the creature is instantly petrified. Otherwise, a creature that fails the save begins to turn to stone and is restrained. The restrained creature must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn, becoming petrified on a failure or ending the effect on a success. The petrification lasts until the creature is freed by the greater restoration spell or other magic.

Unless surprised, a creature can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If the creature does so, it can't see Marlos until the start of its next turn, when it can decide to avert its eyes again. If the creature looks at Marlos in the meantime, it must immediately make the save.

If Marlos sees himself reflected on a polished surface within 30 feet of him and in an area of bright light, Marlos is, due to his curse, affected by his own gaze.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Marlos makes three melee attacks, one with his snake hair and two with Ironfang.

actions.name: Snake Hair
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 14 (4d6) poison damage.

actions.name: Ironfang
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) thunder damage.

traits.name: Earth Walk
traits.text: Moving through difficult terrain made of earth or stone costs Miraj no extra movement.

actions.name: Staff

traits.name: Empowered Attacks
traits.text: Ogrémoch's slam attacks are treated as magical and adamantine for the purpose of bypassing resistance and immunity to nonmagical attacks.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.text: If Ogrémoch fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: Ogrémoch has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.text: Ogrémoch deals double damage to objects and structures with his melee and ranged weapon attacks.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Ogrémoch makes two slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +14 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. On hit: 30 (4d10 + 8) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Boulder
actions.text: Ranged weapon attack +6 to hit, range 500 ft., one target. On hit: 46 (7d10 + 8) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 23 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Summon Elementals (1/Day)
actions.text: Ogrémoch summons up to three earth elementals and loses 30 hit points for each elemental he summons. Summoned elementals have maximum hit points, appear within 100 feet of Ogrémoch, and disappear if Ogrémoch is reduced to 0 hit points.

legendary_actions.name: ​
legendary_actions.text: The Ogrémoch can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The Ogrémoch regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary_actions.name: Illuminating Crystals
legendary_actions.text: Ogrémoch's crystalline protrusions flare. Each creature within 30 feet of Ogrémoch becomes outlined in orange light, shedding dim light in a 10-foot radius. Any attack roll against an affected creature has advantage if the attacker can see it, and the affected creature can't benefit from being invisible.

legendary_actions.name: Stomp (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.text: Ogrémoch stomps the ground, creating an earth tremor that extends in a 30-foot radius. Other creatures standing on the ground in that radius must succeed on a DC 23 Dexterity saving throw or fall prone.

legendary_actions.name: Create Gargoyle (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.text: Ogrémoch's hit points are reduced by 50 as he breaks off a chunk of his body and places it on the ground in an unoccupied space within 15 feet of him. The chunk of rock instantly transforms into a gargoyle and acts on the same initiative count as Ogrémoch. Ogrémoch can't use this action if he has 50 hit points or fewer. The gargoyle obeys Ogrémoch's commands and fights until destroyed.

traits.name: Empowered Attacks

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)

traits.name: Magic Resistance

traits.name: Water Form

actions.name: Multiattack

actions.name: Slam
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. On hit: 21 (3d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 19). Olhydra can grapple up to four targets. When Olhydra moves, all creatures she is grappling move with her.

actions.text: Ranged weapon attack +12 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. On hit: 21 (6d6) bludgeoning damage, and the target is knocked prone if it fails a DC 19 Strength saving throw.

actions.name: Summon Elementals (1/Day)
actions.text: Olhydra summons up to three water elementals and loses 30 hit points for each elemental she summons. Summoned elementals have maximum hit points, appear within 100 feet of Olhydra, and disappear if Olhydra is reduced to 0 hit points.

legendary_actions.name: ​
legendary_actions.text: The Olhydra can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The Olhydra regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary_actions.name: Crush
legendary_actions.text: One creature that Olhydra is grappling is crushed for 21 (3d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

legendary_actions.name: Fling (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.text: Olhydra releases one creature she is grappling by flinging the creature up to 60 feet away from her, in a direction of her choice. If the flung creature comes into contact with a solid surface, such as a wall or floor, the creature takes 1d6 bludgeoning damage for every 10 feet it was flung.

legendary_actions.name: Water to Acid (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.text: Olhydra transforms her watery body into acid. This effect lasts until Olhydra's next turn. Any creature that comes into contact with Olhydra or hits her with a melee attack while standing within 5 feet of her takes 11 (2d10) acid damage. Any creature grappled by Olhydra takes 22 (4d10) acid damage at the start of its turn.

traits.name: Chilling Mist
traits.text: While it is alive, the one-eyed shiver projects an aura of cold mist within 10 feet of itself. If the one-eyed shiver deals damage to a creature in this area, the creature also takes 5 (1d10) cold damage.

actions.name: Dagger

actions.name: Eye of Frost
actions.text: The one-eyed shiver casts ray of frost from its missing eye. If it hits, the target is also restrained. A target restrained in this way can end the condition by using an action, succeeding on a DC 13 Strength check.

traits.name: Grim Harvest
traits.text: Once per turn when Oreioth kills one or more creatures with a spell of 1st level or higher, he regains hit points equal to twice the spell's level.

traits.name: Swift Animation (Recharges after a Long Rest)
traits.text: When a living Medium or Small humanoid within 30 feet of Oreioth dies, he can use an action on his next turn to cast animate dead on that humanoid's corpse, instead of using the spell's normal casting time.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.

traits.text: The razerblast's armor is hot. Any creature grappling the razerblast or grappled by it takes 5 (1d10) fire damage at the end of that creature's turn.

traits.name: Shrapnel Explosion
traits.text: When the razerblast drops to 0 hit points, a flaming orb in its chest explodes, destroying the razerblast's body and scattering its armor as shrapnel. Creatures within 10 feet of the razerblast when it explodes must succeed on a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 (6d6) piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The razerblast makes three melee attacks.

actions.name: Spear

traits.name: Unarmored Defense
traits.text: While the monk is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifier.

traits.name: Unarmored Movement
traits.text: While the monk is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its walking speed increases by 10 feet (included in its speed).

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The monk makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Unarmed Strike
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.text: Melee or ranged weapon attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or ranged 20/60 ft., one target. On hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.text: Melee or ranged weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. On hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.

Each creature within 10 feet of the exploding Stonemelder must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking 11 (2d10) bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: Black Earth Rod
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage. The Stonemelder can also expend a spell slot to deal extra damage, dealing 2d8 bludgeoning damage for a 1st level slot, plus an additional 1d8 for each level of the slot above 1st.

actions.name: Multiattack

traits.text: If Vanifer fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

traits.text: Wiggan has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

actions.name: Multiattack

actions.text: Melee weapon attack +0 to hit (+4 to hit with shillelagh), reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 1 (1d4 - 1) bludgeoning damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage with shillelagh.

traits.text: Windharrow has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put him to sleep.

traits.name: Magic Resistance

On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and is deafened until the start of Yan-C-Bin's next turn.

actions.text: Yan-C-Bin polymorphs into a Medium humanoid. While in polymorphed form, a swirling breeze surrounds him, his eyes are pale and cloudy, and he loses the Air Form trait. He can remain in polymorphed form for up to 1 hour. Reverting to his true form requires an action.

legendary_actions.name: ​

legendary_actions.name: Suffocate (Costs 3 Actions)

On a failed save, the target drops to 0 hit points and is dying. On a successful save, the target can't breathe or speak until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Clay Jug
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Dragon Fanatic
traits.text: The dragonfang has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened. While the dragonfang can see a dragon or higher-ranking Cult of the Dragon cultist friendly to it, the dragonfang ignores the effects of being charmed or frightened.

traits.name: Fanatic Advantage
traits.text: Once per turn, if the dragonfang makes a weapon attack with advantage on the attack roll and hits, the target takes an extra 10 (3d6) damage.

traits.name: Limited Flight
traits.text: The dragonfang can use a bonus action to gain a flying speed of 30 feet until the end of its turn.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.text: The dragonfang has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the dragonfang's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The Dragonfang attacks twice with its shortsword.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) damage of the type to which the dragonfang has resistance.

actions.name: Orb of Dragon's Breath (2/Day)
actions.text: rs +5 to hit, range 50 ft., one target. On hit: 22 (5d8) damage of the type to which the dragonfang has damage resistance.

traits.name: Dragon Fanatic
traits.text: The dragonsoul has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened. While the dragonsoul can see a dragon or higher-ranking Cult of the Dragon cultist friendly to it, the dragonsoul ignores the effects of being charmed or frightened.

traits.name: Fanatic Advantage
traits.text: Once per turn, if the dragonsoul makes a weapon attack with advantage on the attack roll and hits, the target takes an extra 10 (3d6) damage.

traits.name: Limited Flight
traits.text: The dragonsoul can use a bonus action to gain a flying speed of 30 feet until the end of its turn.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.text: The dragonsoul has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the dragonsoul's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

actions.text: Melee weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) damage of the type to which the dragonsoul has resistance.

actions.name: Orb of Dragon's Breath (3/Day)
actions.text: rs +7 to hit, range 90 ft., one target. On hit: 27 (6d8) damage of the type to which the dragonsoul has damage resistance.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.text: The toad can breathe air or water.

traits.name: Cold Aura
traits.text: Any creature that starts its turn within 5 feet of the toad takes 3 (1d6) cold damage.

traits.name: Standing Leap
traits.text: The toad's long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 4 (1d8) cold damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature it is grappled (escape DC 11). Until this grapple ends, the toad can't bite another target.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.text: While in sunlight, Naergoth has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Naergoth makes three attacks, either with his longsword or longbow. He can use Life Drain in place of one longsword attack.

actions.name: Life Drain
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 20 (5d6 + 3) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) slashing damage, or 10 (1d10 + 5) if used with two hands, plus 10 (3d6) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.text: Ranged weapon attack +5 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. On hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) necrotic damage.

traits.name: Draconic Majesty
traits.text: Neronvain adds his Charisma bonus to his AC (included).

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.text: Magic can't put Neronvain to sleep.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Neronvain makes two attacks, either with his shortsword or Eldritch Arrow.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 13 (3d8) poison damage.

actions.name: Eldritch Arrow
actions.text: rs +7 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. On hit: 11 (2d10) force damage plus 9 (2d8) poison damage.

actions.name: Poisonous Cloud (2/Day)
actions.text: Poison gas fills a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on a point Neronvain can see within 50 feet of him. The gas spreads around corners and remains until the start of Neronvain's next turn. Each creature that starts its turn in the gas must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

name: Severin
senses: While wearing the Mask of the Dragon Queen: darkvision 60 ft.

traits.name: Special Equipment
traits.text: Severin has the Mask of the Dragon Queen.

traits.name: Draconic Majesty
traits.text: Severin adds his Charisma bonus to his AC (included).

traits.name: Ignite Enemy
traits.text: If Severin deals fire damage to a creature while wearing the Mask of the Dragon Queen, the target catches fire. At the start of each of its turns, the burning target takes 5 (1d10) fire damage. A creature within reach of the fire can use an action to extinguish it.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (5/Day)
traits.text: While wearing the Mask of the Dragon Queen, if Severin fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Burning Touch
actions.text: ms +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 18 (4d8) fire damage.

actions.name: Flaming Orb
actions.text: rs +5 to hit, range 90 ft., one target. On hit: 40 (9d8) fire damage.

actions.name: Scorching Burst
actions.text: Severin chooses a point he can see within 60 feet of him. Each creature within 5 feet of that point must make a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw, taking 18 (4d8) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary_actions.name: ​
legendary_actions.text: The Severin can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The Severin regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary_actions.name: ​
legendary_actions.text: If Severin is wearing the Mask of the Dragon Queen, he can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options listed. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. Severin regains spent legendary actions at the start of his turn.

legendary_actions.name: Attack
legendary_actions.text: Severin makes one attack.

legendary_actions.name: Fiery Teleport (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.text: Severin, along with any objects he is wearing or carrying, teleports up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space he can see. Each creature within 5 feet of Severin before he teleports takes 5 (1d10) fire damage.

legendary_actions.name: Hellish Chains (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.text: Severin targets one creature he can see within 30 feet of him. The target is wrapped in magical chains of fire and restrained. The restrained target takes 21 (6d6) fire damage at the start of each of its turns. At the end of its turns, the target can make a DC 17 Strength saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

traits.name: Discorporation
traits.text: When Tiamat drops to 0 hit points or dies, her body is destroyed but her essence travels back to her domain in the Nine Hells, and she is unable to take physical form for a time.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (5/Day)
traits.text: If Tiamat fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Limited Magic Immunity
traits.text: Unless she wishes to be affected, Tiamat is immune to spells of 6th level or lower. She has advantage on saving throws against all other spells and magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
traits.text: Tiamat's weapon attacks are magical.

traits.name: Multiple Heads
traits.text: Tiamat can take one reaction per turn, rather than only one per round. She also has advantage on saving throws against being knocked unconscious. If she fails a saving throw against an effect that would stun a creature, one of her unspent legendary actions is spent.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.text: Tiamat regains 30 hit points at the start of her turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Tiamat can use her Frightful Presence. She then makes three attacks: two with her claws and one with her tail.

actions.name: Claw
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +19 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. On hit: 24 (4d6 + 10) slashing damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +19 to hit, reach 25 ft., one target. On hit: 28 (4d8 + 10) piercing damage.

actions.name: Frightful Presence
actions.text: Each creature of Tiamat's choice that is within 240 feet of Tiamat and aware of her must succeed on a DC 26 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to Tiamat's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

legendary_actions.name: ​
legendary_actions.text:
Tiamat can take 5 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. Tiamat regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.
Tiamat's legendary action options are associated with her five dragon heads (a bite and a breath weapon for each). Once Tiamat chooses a legendary action option for one of her heads, she can't choose another one associated with that head until the start of her next turn.

legendary_actions.name: Bite
legendary_actions.text: Melee weapon attack +19 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. On hit: 32 (4d10 + 10) slashing damage plus 14 (4d6) acid damage (black dragon head), lightning damage (blue dragon head), poison damage (green dragon head), fire damage (red dragon head), or cold damage (white dragon head).

legendary_actions.name: Black Dragon Head: Acid Breath (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.text: Tiamat breathes acid in a 120-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 27 Dexterity saving throw, taking 67 (15d8) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary_actions.name: Blue Dragon Head: Lightning Breath (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.text: Tiamat breathes lightning in a 120-foot line that is 10 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 27 Dexterity saving throw, taking 88 (16d10) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary_actions.name: Green Dragon Head: Poison Breath (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.text: Tiamat breathes poisonous gas in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 27 Constitution saving throw, taking 77 (22d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary_actions.name: Red Dragon Head: Fire Breath (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.text: Tiamat breathes fire in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 27 Dexterity saving throw, taking 91 (26d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary_actions.name: White Dragon Head: Cold Breath (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.text: Tiamat breathes an icy blast in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 27 Dexterity saving throw, taking 72 (16d8) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

name: Adult Sapphire Dragon
speed: walk 40 ft., climb 40 ft., fly 80 ft., burrow 40 ft.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
traits.text: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.text: The dragon can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Tunneler
traits.text: The dragon can burrow through solid rock at half its burrow speed and can choose to leave a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The dragon can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes two melee attacks, one with its bite and one with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. On hit: 17 (2d10 + 6) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) thunder damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. On hit: 19 (3d8 + 6) slashing damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. On hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Frightful Presence
actions.text: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

actions.name: Debilitating Breath (recharge 5-6)
actions.text: The dragon exhales a pulse of high-pitched, nearly inaudible sound in a 60-foot-cone. Each creature in that cone must make a DC 18 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 45 (13d6) thunder damage and is incapacitated until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't incapacitated.

legendary_actions.name: ​
legendary_actions.text: The Adult Sapphire Dragon can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The Adult Sapphire Dragon regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary_actions.name: Tail Attack
legendary_actions.text: The dragon makes a tail attack.

legendary_actions.name: Telekinetic Fling
legendary_actions.text: The dragon chooses a Small or smaller object that isn't being worn or carried that it can see within 60 feet of it, and magically hurls the object at a creature it can see within 60 feet of the object. The target must succeed on a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw or take 15 (4d6) bludgeoning damage.

legendary_actions.name: Teleport (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.text: The dragon magically teleports to an unoccupied space it can see within 30 feet of it.

traits.name: Helpful
traits.text: The expert can take the Help action as a bonus action, and the creature who receives the help gains a 1d6 bonus to the d20 roll. If that roll is an attack roll, the creature can forgo adding the bonus to it, and then if the attack hits, the creature can add the bonus to the attack's damage roll against one target.

traits.name: Evasion
traits.text: When the expert is not incapacitated and subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it failed.

traits.name: Tools
traits.text: The expert has thieves' tools and a musical instrument.

actions.name: Extra Attack
actions.text: The expert can attack twice, instead of once, whenever it takes the attack action on its turn.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.text: Melee or ranged weapon attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. On hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.text: Ranged weapon attack +8 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. On hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

traits.name: Blood Frenzy
traits.text: The giant shark skeleton has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 22 (3d10 + 6) piercing damage.

name: Lhammaruntosz
speed: walk 40 ft., fly 80 ft., swim 40 ft.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.text: Lhammaruntosz can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.text: If Lhammaruntosz fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.text: Lhammaruntosz regains 5 hit points at the start of her turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Lhammaruntosz can use her Frightful Presence. She then makes three attacks: one with her bite and two with her claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. On hit: 18 (2d10 + 7) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 14 (2d6 + 7) slashing damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +12 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. On hit: 16 (2d8 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Frightful Presence
actions.text: Each creature of Lhammaruntosz's choice that is within 120 feet of her and aware of her must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to Lhammaruntosz's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

actions.name: Breath Weapons (recharge 5-6)
actions.text: Lhammaruntosz uses one of the following breath weapons.

actions.name: Lightning Breath
actions.text: Lhammaruntosz exhales lightning in a 90- foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 19 Dexterity saving throw, taking 66 (12d10) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: Repulsion Breath
actions.text: Lhammaruntosz exhales repulsion energy in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 19 Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is pushed 60 feet away from the dragon.

actions.name: Change Shape
actions.text:
Lhammaruntosz magically polymorphs into a humanoid or beast that has a challenge rating no higher than her own, or back into her true form. She reverts to her true form if she dies. Any equipment she is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (Lhammaruntosz's choice).

In a new form, Lhammaruntosz retains her alignment, hit points, Hit Dice, ability to speak, proficiencies, Legendary Resistance, lair actions, and Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores, as well as this action. Her statistics and capabilities are otherwise replaced by those of the new form, except any class features or legendary actions of that form.

legendary_actions.name: ​
legendary_actions.text: The Lhammaruntosz can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The Lhammaruntosz regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary_actions.name: Detect
legendary_actions.text: Lhammaruntosz makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

legendary_actions.name: Tail Attack
legendary_actions.text: Lhammaruntosz makes a tail attack.

legendary_actions.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.text: Lhammaruntosz beats its wings. Each creature within 10 feet of Lhammaruntosz must succeed on a DC 20 Dexterity saving throw or take 14 (2d6 + 7) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone. Lhammaruntosz can then fly up to half her flying speed.

traits.name: Potent Cantrip
traits.text: The spellcaster can add its spellcasting ability modifier to the damage it deals with any cantrip.

actions.name: Quarterstaff
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage, or 4 (1d8) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

traits.name: Potent Cantrip
traits.text: The spellcaster can add its spellcasting ability modifier to the damage it deals with any cantrip.

actions.name: Quarterstaff
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage, or 4 (1d8) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

traits.name: Battle Readiness
traits.text: The warrior has advantage on initiative rolls.

traits.name: Improved Critical
traits.text: The warrior's attack rolls score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20 on the d20.

traits.name: Indomitable (1/Day)
traits.text: The warriorcan reroll a saving throw that it fails, but it must use the new result.

traits.name: Martial Role
traits.text: The warrior has one of the following traits of your choice:

traits.name: Attacker
traits.text: The warrior gains a +2 bonus to attack rolls.

traits.name: Defender
traits.text: The warrior gains the Protection reaction below.

traits.name: Second Wind (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
traits.text: The warrior can use a bonus action on its turn to regain hit points equal to 1d10 + its level.

actions.name: Extra Attack
actions.text: The warrior can attack twice, instead of once, whenever it takes the attack action on its turn.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.text: Ranged weapon attack +6 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. On hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

traits.name: Dive Attack
traits.text: If the aarakocra is flying and dives at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a melee weapon attack, the attack deals an extra 3 (1d6) damage to the target.

traits.name: Simulacra
traits.text: When a simulacrum drops to 0 hit points or is subjected to a successful dispel magic spell (DC 17), it reverts to ice and snow and is destroyed.

actions.name: Talon
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.text: Melee or ranged weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. On hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Summon Air Elemental
actions.text: Five aarakocra within 30 feet of each other can magically summon an air elemental. Each of the five must use its action and movement on three consecutive turns to perform an aerial dance and must maintain concentration while doing so (as if concentrating on a spell). When all five have finished their third turn of the dance, the elemental appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of them. It is friendly toward them and obeys their spoken commands. It remains for 1 hour, until it or all its summoners die, or until any of its summoners dismisses it as a bonus action. A summoner can't perform the dance again until it finishes a short rest. When the elemental returns to the Elemental Plane of Air, any aarakocra within 5 feet of it can return with it.

traits.name: Dwarven Resilience
traits.text: Augrek has advantage on saving throws against poison.

traits.name: Roleplaying Information
traits.text:
Sheriff's deputy Augrek guards the southwest gate of Bryn Shander and welcomes visitors to town. She has a good heart.

Ideal: "You'll get farther in life with a kind word than an axe."

Bond: "Bryn Shander is my home. It's my job to protect her."

Flaw: "I'm head over heels in love with Sheriff Southwell. One day I hope to marry him."

actions.name: Warhammer
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage, or 7 (1d10 + 2) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Heavy Crossbow
actions.text: Ranged weapon attack +2 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. On hit: 5 (1d10) piercing damage. Augrek carries ten crossbow bolts.

traits.name: Roleplaying Information
traits.text:
Beldora is a member of the harpers who survives using her wits and wiles. She looks like a homeless waif, but she's a survivor who shies away from material wealth.

Ideal: "We should all strive to help one another"

Bond: "I'll risk my life to protect the powerless."

Flaw: "I like lying to people. Makes life more interesting, no?"

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Hand Crossbow
actions.text: Ranged weapon attack +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. On hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage. Beldora carries ten crossbow bolts.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The giant makes two greatclub attacks or two unarmed attacks.

actions.name: Greatclub
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. On hit: 18 (3d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Unarmed Attack
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. On hit: 12 (3d4 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Rock
actions.text: Ranged weapon attack +8 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. On hit: 21 (3d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.text: Sansuri has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

actions.name: Fling
actions.text: Sansuri tries to throw a Small or Medium creature within 10 feet of her. The target must succeed on a DC 20 Dexterity saving throw or be hurled up to 60 feet horizontally in a direction of Sansuri's choice and land prone, taking 1d8 bludgeoning damage for every 10 feet it was thrown.

actions.name: Wind Aura
actions.text: A magical aura of wind surrounds Sansuri. The aura is a 10-foot-radius sphere that lasts as long as Sansuri maintains concentration on it (as if concentrating on a spell). While the aura is in effect, Sansuri gains a +2 bonus to its AC against ranged weapon attacks, and all open flames within the aura are extinguished unless they are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Sansuri makes two spear attacks.

actions.name: Morningstar
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +12 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. On hit: 21 (3d8 + 8) piercing damage.

actions.name: Rock
actions.text: Ranged weapon attack +12 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. On hit: 30 (4d10 + 8) bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Nondetection
traits.text: The cat cannot be targeted or detected by any divination magic or perceived through magical scrying sensors.

traits.name: Pounce
traits.text: If the cat moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the cat can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

traits.name: Spell Turning
traits.text: The cat has advantage on saving throws against any spell that targets only the cat (not an area). If the cat's saving throw succeeds and the spell is of 7th level or lower, the spell has no effect on the cat and instead targets the caster.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage.

traits.name: Brave
traits.text: Darathra has advantage on saving throws against being frightened

traits.name: Roleplaying Information
traits.text:
As the Lord Protector of Triboar and a secret agent of the Harpers, Darathra has sworn an oath to defend the town. She takes her duty very seriously. In addition to her gear, Darathra has an unarmored warhorse named Buster.

Ideal: "Good people should be given every chance to prosper, free of tyranny."

Bond: "I'll lay down my life to protect Triboar and its citizens."

Flaw: "I refuse to back down. Push me, and I'll push back."

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Darthra makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Greatsword
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage

actions.name: Heavy Crossbow
actions.text: Ranged weapon attack +2 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. On hit: 5 (1d10) piercing damage. Darathra carries twenty crossbow bolts.

traits.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
traits.text: Darz deals an extra 7 (2d6) damage when he hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of Darz that isn't incapacitated and Darz doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

traits.name: Roleplaying Information
traits.text:
In his youth, Darz was a member of the Xanathar Thieves' Guild in Waterdeep. After serving ten years in prison for his crimes, he cut all ties to the city and moved north to be a campground caretaker.

Ideal: "You can run from your past, but you can't hide from it."

Bond: "I've made a new life in Triboar. I'm not gonna run away this time. "

Flaw: "I have no regrets. I do whatever it takes to survive."

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Sling
actions.text: Ranged weapon attack +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. On hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage. Darz carries twenty sling stones.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.text: Zalto deals double damage to objects and structures.

traits.name: Special Equipment
traits.text: Zalto wears a ring of lightning resistance.

traits.name: Tackle
traits.text: When Zalto enters any enemy's space for the first time on a turn, the enemy must succeed on a DC 19 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Zalto makes two maul attacks.

actions.name: Maul
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. On hit: 28 (6d6 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Rock
actions.text: Ranged weapon attack +11 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. On hit: 29 (4d10 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Roleplaying Information
traits.text:
The daughter of a Waterdhavian trader and a tavern server, Duvessa has her mother's talent for negotiation and her father's charm. As the first woman to serve as Town Speaker of Bryn Shander, and a young one at that, she has much to prove.

Ideal: "The people of Icewind Dale are survivors. They can weather any storm."

Bond: "My mother taught me what it means to be a good leader. I won't disappoint her."

Flaw: "I don't give an inch in any argument of conflict."

actions.name: Dagger
actions.text: Melee or ranged weapon attack +2 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. On hit: 2 (1d4) piercing damage. Duvessa carries only one dagger.

traits.name: Dwarven Resilience
traits.text: Ghelryn has advantage on saving throws against poison.

traits.name: Giant Slayer
traits.text: Any weapon attack that Ghelryn makes against a giant deals an extra 7 (2d6) damage on a hit.

traits.name: Roleplaying Information
traits.text:
The blacksmith Ghelryn has a good heart, but he hates orcs and giants—hates them with a fiery passion. He considers it the solemn duty of all dwarves to cave in their skulls!

Ideal: "It is incumbent upon every dwarf to forge a legacy."

Bond: "I stand for Clan Foehammer and all dwarvenkind."

Flaw: "I never run from a fight, especially if it involves killing orcs or giants."

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Ghelryn makes two battleaxe attacks.

actions.name: Battleaxe
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage if used with two hands.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
traits.text: If Harshnag fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Weighted Net
actions.text: Ranged weapon attack +5 to hit, ranged 20/60 ft., one Small, Medium, or Large creature. On hit: The target is restrained until it escapes the net. Any creature can use its action to make a DC 17 Strength check to free itself or another creature in the net, ending the effect on a success. Dealing 15 slashing damage to the net (AC 12) destroys the net and frees the target.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The giant makes two greataxe attacks.

actions.name: Gurt's Greataxe
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. On hit: 26 (3d12 + 7) slashing damage, or 39 (5d12 + 7) slashing damage if the target is human.

actions.name: Rock
actions.text: Ranged weapon attack +9 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. On hit: 28 (4d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.text: The crab can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Shell Camouflage
traits.text: While the crab remains motionless with its eyestalks and pincers tucked close to its body, it resembles a natural formation or a pile of detritus. A creature within 30 feet of it can discern its true nature with a successful DC 15 Intelligence (Nature) check.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The crab makes two attacks with its claws.

actions.name: Claw
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. On hit: 20 (3d10 + 4) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 15). The crab has two claws, each of which can grapple only one target

speed: walk 40 ft., climb 40 ft., fly 80 ft.

traits.text: If Klauth fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Dual Wand Wielder

traits.name: Special Equipment

actions.text: Melee weapon attack +17 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. On hit: 19 (2d8 + 10) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Frightful Presence
actions.text: Each creature of Klauth's choice that is within 120 feet of Klauth and aware of him must succeed on a DC 21 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to Klauth's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

actions.name: Fire Breath (recharge 5-6)
actions.text: Klauth exhales fire in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 24 Dexterity saving throw, taking 91 (26d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary_actions.name: ​
legendary_actions.text: The Klauth can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The Klauth regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary_actions.name: Detect
legendary_actions.text: Klauth makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

legendary_actions.name: Tail Attack
legendary_actions.text: Klauth makes a tail attack.

legendary_actions.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.text: Klauth beats his wings. Each creature within 15 feet of Klauth must succeed on a DC 25 Dexterity saving throw or take 17 (2d6 + 10) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone. Klauth can then fly up to half his flying speed.

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.text: While Lifferlas remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal tree.

traits.name: Roleplaying Information
traits.text:
A druid of the Emerald Enclave awakened the tree Lifferlas with a spell. Goldenfields is his home, its people his friends. Children like to carve their name and initials into his body and hang from his boughs, and he's happy with that.

Ideal: "I exist to protect the people and plants of Goldenfields."

Bond: "Children are wonderful. I would do anything to make them feel happy and safe."

Flaw: "I can't remember people's names and often get them mixed up."

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Lifferlas makes two slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. On hit: 14 (3d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Empowered Attacks
traits.text: Maegera's slam attacks are treated as magical for the purpose of overcoming resistance and immunity to damage from nonmagical attacks.

traits.name: Fire Aura
traits.text: At the start of each of Maegera's turns, each creature within 30 feet of it takes 35 (10d6) fire damage, and flammable objects in the aura that aren't being worn or carried ignite. A creature also takes 35 (10d6) fire damage from touching Maegera or from hitting it with a melee attack while within 10 feet of it, and a creature takes that damage the first time on a turn that Maegera moves into its space. Nonmagical weapons that hit Maegera are destroyed by fire immediately after dealing damage to it.

traits.name: Fire Form
traits.text: Maegera can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing if fire could pass through that space.

traits.name: Illumination
traits.text: Maegera sheds bright light in a 120-foot radius and dim light in an additional 120 ft..

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: Maegera has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Maegera makes three slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +12 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. On hit: 15 (3d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage plus 35 (10d6) fire damage

legendary_actions.name: ​
legendary_actions.text: The Maegera the Dawn Titan can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The Maegera the Dawn Titan regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary_actions.name: Quench Magic
legendary_actions.text: Maegera targets one creature that it can see within 60 feet of it. Any resistance or immunity to fire damage that the target gains from a spell or magic item is suppressed. The effect lasts until the end of Maegera's next turn.

legendary_actions.name: Smoke Cloud (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.text: Maegera exhales a billowing cloud of hot smoke and embers that fills a 60 feet cube. Each creature in the area takes 11 (2d10) fire damage. The cloud lasts until the end of Maegera's next turn. Creatures completely in the cloud are blinded and can't be seen.

legendary_actions.name: Create Fire Elemental (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.text: Maegera's hit points are reduced by 50 as part of it separates and becomes a fire elemental with 102 hit points. The fire element appears in an unoccupied space within 15 feet of Maegera and acts on Maegera's initiative count. Maegera can't use this action if it has 50 hit points or fewer. The fire element obeys Maegera's commands and fights until destroyed.

traits.name: Roleplaying Information
traits.text:
Sheriff Markham of Bryn Shander is a brawny, likable man of few words. Nothing is more important to him than protecting Icewind Dale. He judges others by their actions, not their words.

Ideal: "All people deserve to be treated with dignity."

Bond: "Duvessa is a natural leader, but she needs help. That's my job."

Flaw: "I bury my emotions and have no interest in small talk."

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Markham makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage, or 7 (1d10 + 2) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Heavy Crossbow
actions.text: Ranged weapon attack +3 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. On hit: 6 (1d10 + 1) piercing damage. Markham carries twenty crossbow bolts.

traits.name: Roleplaying Information
traits.text:
Innkeeper Miros is a retired carnival attraction, dubbed "the Yeti" because of his barrel-shaped body and the thick, white hair covering his arms, chest, back, and head. When Goldenfields suffers, so does his business, so he takes strides to protect the compound.

Ideal: "As does the Emerald Enclave, I believe that civilization and the wilderness need to learn to coexist."

Bond: "Make fun of me all you like, but don't speak ill of my inn or my employees."

Flaw: "When something upsets me, I have a tendency to fly into a rage."

actions.name: Bear Hug
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. On hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage, and the target grappled (escape DC 13) and takes 5 (1d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage at the start of each of Miros's turns until the grapple ends. Miros cannot make attacks while grappling a creature.

actions.name: Club
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 5 (1d4 + 1) bludgeoning damage

actions.name: Heavy Crossbow
actions.text: Ranged weapon attack +2 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. On hit: 5 (1d10) piercing damage. Miros carries ten crossbow bolts.

traits.name: Cunning Action
traits.text: On each of his turns, Narth can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

traits.name: Roleplaying Information
traits.text:
Narth sells gear to adventurers, and he also has an adventurous spirit. The Lionshield Coster pays him well, but he longs to make a name for himself. At the same time, he runs a business with his partner Alaestra and knows she wouldn't forgive him if he ran off and never returned.

Ideal: "The bigger the risk, the greater the reward."

Bond: "I adore my colleague Alestra, and I'd like to do something to impress her."

Flaw: "I'll risk life and limb to become a legend.-"

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Hand Crossbow
actions.text: Ranged weapon attack +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. On hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage. Narth carries twenty crossbow bolts.

traits.name: Roleplaying Information
traits.text:
Goldenfields' crops are vital Waterdeep's survival, which is why the Watchful Order of Magists and Protectors sent Naxene to make sure the temple-farm is adequately defended. At first she regarded the task as a punishment, but now she appreciates the peace and quiet.

Ideal: "There's no problem that can't be solved with magic."

Bond: "I have great respect for Lady Laeral Silverhand of Waterdeep. She and the Lords' Alliance are going to bring some much-needed order to this lawless land."

Flaw: "I'm too smart to be wrong about anything."

actions.name: Staff
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. On hit: 2 (1d6 - 1) bludgeoning damage, or 3 (1d8 - 1) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

traits.name: Halfling Nimbleness
traits.text: Oren can move through the space of any creature that is of a size larger than his.

traits.name: Lucky
traits.text: When Oren rolls a 1 on an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, he can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

traits.name: Stout Resilience
traits.text: Oren has advantage on saving throws against poison

traits.name: Roleplaying Information
traits.text:
Oren came to Nurthfurrow's End looking for easy work and found it. He sings for his supper, drinks like a fish, and wanders the fields at night dreaming up new lyrics to entertain the inn's other guests. Oren likes to stir up trouble from time to time, but he doesn't have a mean bone in his body.

Ideal: "Music is food for the soul."

Bond: "You had me at "Can I buy you a drink."

Flaw: "I have a knack for putting myself in harm's way. Good thing I'm lucky!"

actions.name: Dagger
actions.text: Melee or ranged weapon attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. On hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage. Duvessa carries only one dagger.

traits.name: Roleplaying Information
traits.text:
Othovir is a gifted harness-maker who doesn't talk about his family or where he came from. He cares about his business, his clients, and his good name.

Ideal: "Find what you do well, and do it to the best of your ability."

Bond: "I won't allow my name to be tarnished."

Flaw: "I get angry when others pry into my private life."

actions.name: Rapier
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 4 (1d8) piercing damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The wormling makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its stinger.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text:
Melee weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 7 (1d8 + 5) piercing damage. If the target is a Small or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or be swallowed by the worm. A swallowed creature is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the wormling, and it takes 3 (1d6) acid damage at the start of each of the wormling's turns.

If the wormling takes 10 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the wormling must succeed on a DC 21 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall prone in a space within 10 feet of the wormling. If the wormling dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse by using 5 feet of movement, exiting prone.

actions.name: Tail Stinger
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. On hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw, taking 10 (3d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

traits.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
traits.text: Shalvus deals an extra 7 (2d6) damage when he hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of Shalvus that isn't incapacitated and Shalvus doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

traits.name: Roleplaying Information
traits.text:
Nalaskur Thaelond of Bargewright Inn has entrusted the shepherd Shalvus with an important assignment: to figure out the best way by which Goldenfields can be brought under the Black Network's control. Shalvus believes that success will ensure his swift rise through the Zhentarim ranks.

Ideal: "I'll do what it takes to prove myself to the Zhentarim."

Bond: "I love animals, and I'm very protective of them."

Flaw: "I can't resist taking risks to feed my ambitions."

actions.name: Quarterstaff
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage, or 4 (1d8) bludgeoning damage if used with both hands.

actions.name: Hand Crossbow
actions.text: Ranged weapon attack +2 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. On hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage. Shalvus carries ten crossbow bolts.

traits.name: Brave
traits.text: Baric has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

traits.name: Roleplaying Information
traits.text:
As a knight of the Order of the Gauntlet, Sir Baric has sworn oaths to catch evildoers and bring them to justice. His current quarry is a dwarf brigand, Worvil "the Weevil" Forkbeard, who is rumored to be hiding in Icewind Dale. In addition to his gear, Sir Baric has an unarmored warhorse, Henry.

Ideal: "Evil must not be allowed to thrive in this world."

Bond: "Tyr is my lord; the order, my family. Through my actions, I shall honor both."

Flaw: "I'm not afraid to die. When Tyr finally calls me, I'll go to him happily."

actions.name: Maul
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Heavy Crossbow
actions.text: Ranged weapon attack +2 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. On hit: 5 (1d10) piercing damage. Baric carries twenty crossbow bolts.

traits.name: Roleplaying Information
traits.text:
An acolyte of Torm, Sirac grew up on the streets of Suzail, the capital of Cormyr. He came to Icewind Dale to become a knucklehead trout fisher but instead found religion. The misbegotten son of Artus Cimber, a renowned human adventurer, Sirac hasn't seen his father since he was a baby.

Ideal: "Without duty or loyalty, a man is nothing."

Bond: "Icewind Dale is where i belong for the rest of my life."

Flaw: "I am honest to a fault."

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Dart
actions.text: Ranged weapon attack +5 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. On hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage. Sirac carries six darts.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.text: If Slarkrethel fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.text: Slarkrethel can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Freedom of Movement
traits.text: Slarkrethel ignores difficult terrain, and magical effects can't reduce its speed or cause it to be restrained. It can spend 5 feet of movement to escape from nonmagical restraints or being grappled.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.text: Slarkrethel deals double damage to objects and structures.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Slarkrethel makes three tentacle attacks, each of which it can replace with one use of Fling.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +17 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 23 (3d8 + 10) piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature grappled by Slarkrethel, that creature is swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the creature is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside Slarkrethel, and it takes 42 (12d6) acid damage at the start of each of Slarkrethel's turns. If Slarkrethel takes 50 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, Slarkrethel must succeed on a DC 25 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall prone in a space within 10 feet of Slarkrethel. If Slarkrethel dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse using 15 feet of movement, exiting prone.

actions.name: Tentacle
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +17 to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. On hit: 20 (3d6 + 10) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 18). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained. Slarkrethel has ten tentacles, each of which can grapple one target.

actions.name: Fling
actions.text: One Large or smaller object held or creature grappled by Slarkrethel is thrown up to 60 feet in a random direction and knocked prone. If a thrown target strikes a solid surface, the target takes 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage for every 10 feet it was thrown. If the target is thrown at another creature, that creature must succeed on a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw or take the same damage and be knocked prone.

actions.name: Lightning Storm
actions.text: Slarkrethel magically creates three bolts of lightning, each of which can strike a target Slarkrethel can see within 120 feet of it. A target must make a DC 23 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary_actions.name: ​
legendary_actions.text: The Slarkrethel can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The Slarkrethel regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary_actions.name: Tentacle Attack or Fling
legendary_actions.text: Slarkrethel makes one tentacle attack or uses its Fling.

legendary_actions.name: Lightning Storm (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.text: Slarkrethel uses Lightning Storm.

legendary_actions.name: Ink Cloud (Costs 3 Actions)
