legendary_actions.text: While underwater, Slarkrethel expels an ink cloud in a 60-foot radius. The cloud spreads around corners, and that area is heavily obscured to creatures other than Slarkrethel. Each creature other than Slarkrethel that ends its turn there must succeed on a DC 23 Constitution saving throw, taking 16 (3d10) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A strong current disperses the cloud, which otherwise disappears at the end of Slarkrethel's next turn.

traits.name: Stone Camouflage
traits.text: The giant has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

traits.name: Olach Morrah
traits.text:
The giant meditates for 1 hour, during which time it can do nothing else. At the end of the hour, provided the giant's meditation has been uninterrupted, it becomes petrified for 8 hours. At the end of this time, the giant is no longer petrified and gains tremorsense out to a range of 30 feet, as well as a measure of innate spellcasting ability based on Wisdom. For the next 24 hours, it can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

3/day: meld into stone, stone shape

1/day: stoneskin, time stop

actions.name: Fling
actions.text: The giant tries to throw a Small or Medium creature within 10 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw or be hurled up to 60 feet horizontally in a direction of the giant's choice. and land prone, taking 1d6 bludgeoning damage for every 10 feet it was thrown.

actions.name: Rolling Rock
actions.text: The giant sends a rock tumbling along the ground in a 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 (3d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage and falling prone on a failed save

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The giant makes two adamantine greatclub attacks.

actions.name: Greatclub
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +9 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. On hit: 19 (3d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Rock
actions.text: Ranged weapon attack +9 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. On hit: 28 (4d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 17 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., On hit: 18 (4d6 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.text: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. On hit: 18 (4d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage. Succeed on a DC14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

name: Tressym
speed: walk 40 ft., climb 30 ft., fly 40 ft.

traits.name: Detect Invisibility
traits.text: Within 60 feet of the tressym, magical invisibility fails to conceal anything from the tressym's sight.

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.text: The tressym has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Poison Sense
traits.text: The tressym can detect whether a substance is poisonous by taste, touch, or smell.

traits.name: Familiar
traits.text: With the DM's permission, a person who casts the find familiar spell can choose to conjure a tressym in stead of a normal cat.

actions.name: Claws
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 1 slashing damage.

traits.name: Giant Slayer
traits.text: Any weapon attack that Urgala makes against a giant deals an extra 7 (2d6) damage on a hit.

traits.name: Roleplaying Information
traits.text:
A retired adventurer, Urgala owns a respectable inn, the North shield House, and she doesn't want to see it or her neighbors' homes destroyed. She has no tolerance for monsters or bullies.

Ideal: "We live in a violent world, and sometimes violence is necessary for survival."

Bond: "My home is my life. Threaten it, and I'll hurt you."

Flaw: "I know how treacherous and greedy adventurers can be. I don't trust them—any of them."

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Urgala makes two attacks with her morningstar or her shortbow.

actions.name: Morningstar
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.text: Ranged weapon attack +3 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. On hit: 5 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage. Urgala carries a quiver of twenty arrows.

actions.name: Spear
actions.text: Melee or ranged weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. On hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage if wielded with two hands.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.text: Ranged weapon attack +3 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. On hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.

traits.name: Possession (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
traits.text:
The yakfolk attempts to magically possess a humanoid or giant. The yakfolk must touch the target throughout a short rest, or the attempt fails. At the end of the rest, the target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be possessed by the yakfolk, which disappears with everything it is carrying and wearing. Until the possession ends, the target is incapacitated, loses control of its body, and is unaware of its surroundings. The yakfolk now controls the body and can't be targeted by any attack, spell, or other effect, and it retains its alignment; its Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores; and its proficiencies. It otherwise uses the target's statistics, except the target's knowledge, class features, feats, and proficiencies.

The possession lasts until either the body drops to 0 hit points, the yakfolk ends the possession as an action, or the yakfolk is forced out of the body by an effect such as the dispel evil and good spell. When the possession ends, the yakfolk reappears in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the body and is stunned until the end of its next turn. If the host body dies while it is possessed by the yakfolk, the yakfolk dies as well, and its body doesn't reappear.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The yakfolk makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Quarterstaff
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage, or 12 (2d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Summon Earth Elemental (1/Day)
actions.text: The yakfolk summons an earth elemental. The elemental appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of its summoner and acts as an ally of the summoner. It remains for 10 minutes, until it dies, or until its summoner dismisses it as an action.

traits.name: Possession (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
traits.text:
The yakfolk attempts to magically possess a humanoid or giant. The yakfolk must touch the target throughout a short rest, or the attempt fails. At the end of the rest, the target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be possessed by the yakfolk, which disappears with everything it is carrying and wearing. Until the possession ends, the target is incapacitated, loses control of its body, and is unaware of its surroundings. The yakfolk now controls the body and can't be targeted by any attack, spell, or other effect, and it retains its alignment; its Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores; and its proficiencies. It otherwise uses the target's statistics, except the target's knowledge, class features, feats, and proficiencies.

The possession lasts until either the body drops to 0 hit points, the yakfolk ends the possession as an action, or the yakfolk is forced out of the body by an effect such as the dispel evil and good spell. When the possession ends, the yakfolk reappears in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the body and is stunned until the end of its next turn. If the host body dies while it is possessed by the yakfolk, the yakfolk dies as well, and its body doesn't reappear.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The yakfolk makes two attacks, either with its greatsword or its longbow.

actions.name: Greatsword
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 18 (4d6 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.text: Ranged weapon attack +2 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. On hit: 9 (2d8) piercing damage.

actions.name: Battleaxe
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 14 (2d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.text: Melee or ranged weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. On hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage.

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.text: Zephyros has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

actions.name: Fling
actions.text: Zephyros tries to throw a Small or Medium creature within 10 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 20 Dexterity saving throw or be hurled up to 60 feet horizontally in a direction of Zephyros's choice and land prone, taking 1d8 bludgeoning damage for every 10 feet it was thrown.

actions.name: Wind Aura
actions.text: A magical aura of wind surrounds Zephyros. The aura is a 10-foot-radius sphere that lasts as long as he maintains concentration on it (as if concentrating on a spell). While the aura is in effect, Zephyros gains a +2 bonus to his AC against ranged weapon attacks, and all open flames within the aura are extinguished unless they are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Zephyros makes two staff attacks.

actions.name: Staff of the Magi
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +15 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. On hit: 20 (3d6 + 10) bludgeoning damage, or 23 (3d8 + 10) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands. This damage is considered magical..

actions.name: Rock
actions.text: Ranged weapon attack +12 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. On hit: 30 (4d10 + 8) bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Unarmored Defense
traits.text: While Zi is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, her AC includes her Wisdom modifier.

traits.name: Roleplaying Information
traits.text:
Zi Liang is a devout worshiper of Chauntea, the Earth Mother. She has considerably less faith in Goldenfields' defenders, so she patrols the temple-farm during her off-duty hours.

Ideal: "If we faithfully tend to our gardens and our fields, Chauntea will smile upon us."

Bond: "Goldenfields is the breadbasket of the North. People depend on its safety and prosperity, and I'll do what must be done to protect it."

Flaw: "I don't trust authority. I do what my heart says is right."

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Zi makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Quarterstaff
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage, or 5 (1d8 + 1) bludgeoning damage if used with both hands.

actions.name: Sling
actions.text: Ranged weapon attack +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. On hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage. Zi carries twenty sling stones.

traits.name: Helpful
traits.text: The expert can take the Help action as a bonus action, and the creature who receives the help gains a 1d6 bonus to the d20 roll. If that roll is an attack roll, the creature can forgo adding the bonus to it, and then if the attack hits, the creature can add the bonus to the attack's damage roll against one target.

traits.name: Tools
traits.text: The expert has thieves' tools and a musical instrument.

actions.name: Extra Attack
actions.text: The expert can attack twice, instead of once, whenever it takes the Attack action on its turn.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.text: Melee or ranged weapon attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. On hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.text: Ranged weapon attack +6 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. On hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Sting
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. On hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 11 Constitution saving throw, taking 10 (3d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is paralyzed while poisoned in this way.

traits.name: Potent Cantrip
traits.text: The spellcaster can add its spellcasting ability modifier to the damage it deals with any cantrip.

actions.name: Quarterstaff
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage, or 4 (1d8) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

traits.name: Potent Cantrip
traits.text: The spellcaster can add its spellcasting ability modifier to the damage it deals with any cantrip.

actions.name: Quarterstaff
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage, or 4 (1d8) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.text: While the statue remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an inanimate statue.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The statue makes five attacks: one with its headbutt and four with its lightning bolt blades.

actions.name: Headbutt
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Lightning Bolt Blades
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) slashing damage.

name: Tooth-N-Claw
languages: understands Infernal but can't speak it

traits.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
traits.text: Tooth-N-Claw has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.text: Tooth-N-Claw has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of its allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) cold damage.

actions.name: Freezing Breath (recharge 5-6)
actions.text: Tooth-N-Claw exhales an icy blast in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 (6d6) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

traits.name: Battle Readiness
traits.text: The warrior has advantage on initiative rolls.

traits.name: Improved Critical
traits.text: The warrior's attack rolls score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20 on the d20.

traits.name: Martial Role
traits.text:
The warrior has one of the following traits of your choice:

• Attacker The warrior gains a +2 bonus to attack rolls.
• Defender The warrior gains the Protection reaction below

actions.name: Extra Attack
actions.text: The warrior can attack twice, instead of once, whenever it takes the Attack action on its turn.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.text: Ranged weapon attack +5 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. On hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

name: Aberrant Spirit
speed: walk 30 ft., fly 30 ft. (beholderkin only; hover)

traits.name: Regeneration (Slaadi Only)
traits.text: The aberration regains 5 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point.

traits.name: Whispering Aura (Star Spawn Only)
traits.text: At the start of each of the aberration's turns, each creature within 5 feet of the aberration must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw against your spell save DC or take 2d6 psychic damage, provided that the aberration isn't incapacitated.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The aberration makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

actions.name: Eye Ray (Beholderkin Only)
actions.text: rs your spell attack modifier to hit, range 150 ft., one creature. On hit: 1d8 + 3 + the spell's level psychic damage.

actions.name: Claws (Slaadi Only)
actions.text: Melee weapon attack your spell attack modifier to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 1d10 + 3 + the spell's level slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it can't regain hit points until the start of the aberration's next turn.

actions.name: Psychic Slam (Star Spawn Only)
actions.text: ms your spell attack modifier to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. On hit: 1d8 + 3 + the spell's level psychic damage.

name: Beast of the Land
hp: 5 + five times your ranger level (the beast has a number of Hit Dice [d8s] equal to your ranger level)

traits.name: Charge
traits.text: If the beast moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a maul attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 1d6 slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a Strength saving throw against your spell save DC or be knocked prone.

traits.name: Primal Bond
traits.text: You can add your proficiency bonus to any ability check or saving throw that the beast makes.

actions.name: Maul
actions.text: Melee weapon attack your spell attack modifier to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 1d8 + 2 + PB slashing damage.

name: Beast of the Sea
hp: 5 + five times your ranger level (the beast has a number of Hit Dice [d8s] equal to your ranger level)

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.text: The beast can breathe both air and water.

traits.name: Primal Bond
traits.text: You can add your proficiency bonus to any ability check or saving throw that the beast makes.

actions.name: Binding Strike
actions.text: Melee weapon attack your spell attack modifier to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 1d6 + 2 + PB piercing damage or 1d6 + 2 + PB bludgeoning damage (your choice), and the target is grappled (escape DC equal to your spellcasting save DC). Until this grapple ends, the beast can't use this attack on another target.

name: Beast of the Sky
hp: 4 + four times your ranger level (the beast has a number of Hit Dice [d6s] equal to your ranger level)

traits.name: Flyby
traits.text: The beast doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

traits.name: Primal Bond
traits.text: You can add your proficiency bonus to any ability check or saving throw that the beast makes.

actions.name: Shred
actions.text: Melee weapon attack your spell attack modifier to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 1d4 + 3 + PB slashing damage

name: Bestial Spirit
speed: walk 30 ft., climb 30 ft. (land only), fly 60 ft. (air only), swim 30 ft. (water only)
hp: 20 (Air only) or 30 (Land and Water only) + 5 for each spell level above 2nd

traits.name: Water Breathing (Water Only)
traits.text: The beast can breathe only underwater.

traits.name: Flyby (Air Only)
traits.text: The beast doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

traits.name: Pack Tactics (Land and Water Only)
traits.text: The beast has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the beast's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The beast makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

actions.name: Maul
actions.text: Melee weapon attack your spell attack modifier to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 1d8 + 4 + the spell's level piercing damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The celestial makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

actions.name: Radiant Bow (Avenger Only)
actions.text: Ranged weapon attack your spell attack modifier to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. On hit: 2d6 + 2 + the spell's level radiant damage.

actions.name: Radiant Mace (Defender Only)
actions.text: Melee weapon attack your spell attack modifier to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 1d10 + 3 + the spell's level radiant damage, and the celestial can choose itself or another creature it can see within 10 feet of the target. The chosen creature gains 1d10 temporary hit points.

actions.name: Healing Touch (1/Day)
actions.text: The celestial touches another creature. The target magically regains hit points equal to 2d8 + the spell's level.

traits.name: Heated Body (Metal Only)
traits.text: A creature that touches the construct or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 1d10 fire damage.

traits.name: Stony Lethargy (Stone Only)
traits.text: When a creature the construct can see starts its turn within 10 feet of the construct, the construct can force it to make a Wisdom saving throw against your spell save DC. On a failed save, the target can't use reactions and its speed is halved until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The construct makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

actions.name: Slam
actions.text: Melee weapon attack your spell attack modifier to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 1d8 + 4 + the spell's level bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.text: The item is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

traits.name: Irrepressible Dance
traits.text: When any creature starts its turn within 10 feet of the item, the item can increase or decrease (your choice) the walking speed of that creature by 10 feet until the end of the turn, provided the item isn't incapacitated.

actions.name: Force-Empowered Slam
actions.text: Melee weapon attack your spell attack modifier to hit, reach 5 ft., one target you can see. On hit: 1d10 + PB force damage.

name: Elemental Spirit
speed: walk 40 ft., fly 40 ft. (air only hover), burrow 40 ft. (earth only), swim 40 ft. (water only)

traits.name: Amorphous Form (Air, Fire, and Water Only)
traits.text: The elemental can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The elemental makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

actions.name: Slam
actions.text: Melee weapon attack your spell attack modifier to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 1d10 + 4 + the spell's level bludgeoning damage (Air, Earth, and Water only) or fire damage (Fire only).

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The fey makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.text: Melee weapon attack your spell attack modifier to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 1d6 + 3 + the spell's level piercing damage + 1d6 force damage.

name: Fiendish Spirit
speed: walk 40 ft., climb 40 ft. (demon only), fly 60 ft. (devil only)
hp: 50 (Demon only) or 40 (Devil only) or 60 (Yugoloth only) + 15 for each spell level above 6th

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: The fiend has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Death Throes (Demon Only)
traits.text: When the fiend drops to 0 hit points or the spell ends, the fiend explodes, and each creature within 10 feet of it must make a Dexterity saving throw against your spell save DC. A creature takes 2d10 + this spell's level fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

traits.name: Devil's Sight (Devil Only)
traits.text: Magical darkness doesn't impede the fiend's darkvision.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The fiend makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

actions.name: Bite (Demon Only)
actions.text: Melee weapon attack your spell attack modifier to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 1d12 + 3 + the spell's level necrotic damage.

actions.name: Claws (Yugoloth Only)
actions.text: Melee weapon attack your spell attack modifier to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 1d8 + 3 + the spell's level slashing damage. Immediately after the attack hits or misses, the fiend can magically teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

actions.name: Hurl Flame (Devil Only)
actions.text: rs your spell attack modifier to hit, range 150 ft., one target. On hit: 2d6 + 3 + the spell's level fire damage. If the target is a flammable object that isn't being worn or carried, it also catches fire.

name: Homunculus Servant
hp: 1 + your Intelligence modifier + your artificer level (the homunculus has a number of Hit Dice [d4s] equal to your artificer level)

traits.name: Evasion
traits.text: If the homunculus is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails. It can't use this trait if it's incapacitated.

traits.name: Might of the Master
traits.text: The following numbers increase by 1 when your proficiency bonus increases by 1: the homunculus's skill and saving throw bonuses (above) and the bonuses to hit and damage of its attack (below).

actions.name: Force Strike
actions.text: Ranged weapon attack your spell attack modifier to hit, range 30 ft., one target you can see. On hit: 1d4 + PB force damage.

traits.name: False Appearance (Object Form Only)
traits.text: While the mimic remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary object.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.text: The mimic can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 1 piercing damage plus 2 (1d4) acid damage.

actions.name: Shape-Shift
actions.text: The mimic polymorphs into an object or back into its true, amorphous form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

name: Mighty Servant of Leuk-o
languages: understands the languages of creatures attuned to it but can't speak

traits.name: Immutable Existence
traits.text: The servant is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form or send it to another plane of existence.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: The servant has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects, and spell attacks made against it have disadvantage.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.text: The servant regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If it is reduced to 0 hit points, this trait doesn't function until an attuned creature spends 24 hours repairing the artifact or until the artifact is subjected to lightning damage.

traits.name: Standing Leap
traits.text: The servant's long jump is up to 50 feet and its high jump is up to 25 feet, with or without a running start.

traits.name: Unusual Nature
traits.text: The servant doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

actions.name: Destructive Fist
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +17 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. On hit: 36 (4d12 + 10) force damage. Or Ranged Weapon Attack: +17 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. On hit: 36 (4d12 + 10) force damage. If the target is an object, it takes triple damage.

actions.name: Crushing Leap
actions.text: If the servant jumps at least 25 feet as part of its movement, it can then use this action to land on its feet in a space that contains one or more other creatures. Each of those creatures is pushed to an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the servant and must make a DC 25 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 26 (4d12) bludgeoning damage and is knocked prone. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't knocked prone.

traits.name: Terror Frenzy (Fury Only)
traits.text: The spirit has advantage on attack rolls against frightened creatures.

traits.name: Weight of Sorrow (Despair Only)
traits.text: Any creature, other than you, that starts its turn within 5 feet of the spirit has its speed reduced by 20 feet until the start of that creature's next turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The spirit makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

actions.name: Chilling Rend
actions.text: Melee weapon attack your spell attack modifier to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 1d12 + 3 + the spell's level cold damage.

actions.name: Dreadful Scream (1/Day)
actions.text: The spirit screams. Each creature within 30 feet of it must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw against your spell save DC or be frightened for 1 minute. The frightened creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

name: Steel Defender
hp: 2 + your Intelligence modifier + five times your artificer level (the defender has a number of Hit Dice [ d8s] equal to your artificer level)

traits.name: Vigilant
traits.text: The defender can't be surprised.

actions.name: Force-Empowered Rend
actions.text: Melee weapon attack your spell attack modifier to hit, reach 5 ft., one target you can see. On hit: 1d8 + PB force damage.

actions.name: Repair (3/Day)
actions.text: The magical mechanisms inside the defender restore 2d8 + PB hit points to itself or to one construct or object within 5 feet of it.

name: Undead Spirit
speed: walk 30 ft., fly 40 ft. (ghostly only; hover)
hp: 30 (Ghostly and Putrid only) or 20 (Skeletal only) + 10 for each spell level above 3rd

traits.name: Incorporeal Passage (Ghostly Only)
traits.text: The spirit can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. If it ends its turn inside an object, it is shunted to the nearest unoccupied space and takes 1d10 force damage for every 5 feet traveled.

traits.name: Festering Aura (Putrid Only)
traits.text: Any creature, other than you, that starts its turn within 5 feet of the spirit must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against your spell save DC or be poisoned until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The spirit makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

actions.name: Deathly Touch (Ghostly Only)
actions.text: Melee weapon attack your spell attack modifier to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. On hit: 1d8 + 3 + the spell's level necrotic damage, and the creature must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw against your spell save DC or be frightened of the undead until the end of the target's next turn.

actions.name: Grave Bolt (Skeletal Only)
actions.text: rs your spell attack modifier to hit, range 150 ft., one target. On hit: 2d4 + 3 + the spell's level necrotic damage.

actions.name: Rotting Claw (Putrid Only)
actions.text: Melee weapon attack your spell attack modifier to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 1d6 + 3 + the spell's level slashing damage. If the target is poisoned, it must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against your spell save DC be paralyzed until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Flame Seed
actions.text: Ranged weapon attack your spell attack modifier to hit, range 60 ft., one target you can see. On hit: 1d6 + PB fire damage.

actions.name: Fiery Teleportation
actions.text: The spirit and each willing creature of your choice within 5 feet of it teleport up to 15 feet to unoccupied spaces you can see. Then each creature within 5 feet of the space that the spirit left must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw against your spell save DC or take 1d6 + PB fire damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The decapus makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tentacles.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature grappled by the decapus. On hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Tentacles
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. On hit: 24 (9d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage or 14 (5d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage if the decapus is grappling a creature other than the target or if the decapus is on the ground or floor. The target is also grappled (escape DC 14) unless the decapus is already grappling a creature. Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained.

traits.name: Boulder Guise
traits.text: While fully withdrawn into its shell, the geonid can't see and is indistinguishable from a small boulder

actions.name: Club
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Stone Tell
actions.text: The geonid touches a stone object or surface and knows what types of creatures have been within 10 feet of that stone in the past 24 hours. The geonid can also determine the number of creatures of each type, but not their identities.

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.text: The slug has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.text: The slug can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The slug makes two attacks: one with its tentacles and one with its bite.

actions.name: Tentacles
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. On hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. Until this poison ends, the target is paralyzed. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the poison on itself on a success.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) piercing damage.

name: Topi
languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

traits.name: Turn Resistance
traits.text: The topi has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

traits.name: Undead Fortitude
traits.text: If damage reduces the topi to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5+the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the topi drops to 1 hit point instead.

actions.name: Venomous Claws
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage plus 2 (1d4) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the end of the target's next turn.

traits.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
traits.text: The table is incapacitated while in the area of an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic, the table must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall unconscious for 1 minute.

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.text: While the table remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal table.

traits.name: Charge
traits.text: If the table moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 9 (2d8) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Ram
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +6, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Quarterstaff
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +2 to hit (+4 to hit with shillelagh), reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage with shillelagh or if wielded with two hands.

name: Calcryx
speed: walk 30 ft., burrow 15 ft., fly 60 ft., swim 30 ft.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage plus 2 (1d4) cold damage.

actions.name: Cold Breath (recharge 5-6)
actions.text: The dragon exhales an icy blast of hail in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 12 Constitution saving throw, taking 22 (5d8) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

traits.name: Charge
traits.text: If the centaur mummy moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a pike attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 10 (3d6) piercing damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The centaur mummy makes two melee attacks, one with its pike and one with its hooves, or it attacks with its pike and uses Dreadful Glare.

actions.name: Pike
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. On hit: 10 (1d10 + 5) piercing damage.

actions.name: Hooves
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be cursed with mummy rot. The cursed target can't regain hit points, and its hit point maximum decreases by 10 (3d6) for every 24 hours that elapse. If the curse reduces the target's hit point maximum to 0, the target dies, and its body turns to dust. The curse lasts until removed by the remove curse spell or similar magic.

actions.name: Dreadful Glare
actions.text: The centaur mummy targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. If the target can see the mummy, the target must succeed on a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw against this magic or become frightened until the end of the mummy's next turn. If the target fails the saving throw by 5 or more, it is also paralyzed for the same duration. A target that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to the Dreadful Glare of all mummies (but not mummy lords) for the next 24 hours.

traits.name: Undead Fortitude
traits.text: If damage reduces the dread warrior to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5+the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the dread warrior drops to 1 hit point instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The dread warrior makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Battleaxe
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage, or 7 (1d10 + 2) slashing damage if wielded with two hands.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.text: Melee or ranged weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. On hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

traits.name: Cunning Action
traits.text: On each of its turns, the spy can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

traits.name: Duergar Resilience
traits.text: The spy has advantage on saving throws against poison, spells, and illusions, as well as to resist being charmed or paralyzed.

traits.name: Sneak Attack
traits.text: Once per turn, the spy can deal an extra 7 (2d6) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the spy that isn't incapacitated and the spy doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.text: While in sunlight, the spy has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The spy makes two shortsword attacks.

actions.name: Enlarge (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
actions.text: For 1 minute, the spy magically increases in size, along with anything it is wearing or carrying. While enlarged, the spy is Large, doubles her damage dice on Strength-based weapon attacks (included in the attacks), and makes Strength checks and Strength saving throws with advantage. If the spy lacks the room to become Large, it attains the maximum size possible in the space available.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage, or 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage while enlarged.

actions.name: Hand Crossbow
actions.text: Ranged weapon attack +5 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. On hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Invisibility (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
actions.text: The spy magically turns invisible until it attacks, deals damage, casts a spell, or uses its Enlarge, or until its concentration is broken, up to 1 hour (as if concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the spy wears or carries is invisible with it.

traits.name: Martial Advantage
traits.text: Once per turn, the hobgoblin can deal an extra 7 (2d6) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the hobgoblin that isn't incapacitated.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) slashing damage, or 6 (1d10 + 2) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.text: Ranged weapon attack +4 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. On hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage.

actions.name: Club
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Channel Divinity: Turn Undead (1/Short Rest)
actions.text:
Erky presents his holy Symbol and speaks a prayer censuring the Undead. Each Undead that can see or hear Erky within 30 feet of him must make a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw. If the creature fails its saving throw, it is turned for 1 minute or until it takes any damage.

A turned creature must spend its turns trying to move as far away from Erky as it can, and it can't willingly move to a space within 30 feet of him. It also can't take reactions. For its action, it can use only the Dash action or try to escape from an effect that prevents it from moving. If there's nowhere to move, the creature can use the Dodge action.

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.text: While the gargoyle remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an inanimate statue.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The gargoyle makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.text: The giant crayfish can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The giant crayfish makes two claw attacks.

actions.name: Claw
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 12). The crayfish has two claws, each of which can grapple only one target.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.text: The toad can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Cold Aura
traits.text: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the toad takes 5 (1d10) cold damage.

traits.name: Standing Leap
traits.text: The toad's long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 13). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the toad can't bite another target.

actions.name: Swallow
actions.text:
Melee weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one Medium or smaller creature the toad is grappling. On hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage, the target is swallowed, and the grapple ends. The swallowed target is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the toad, and it takes 10 (3d6) acid damage and 11 (2d10) cold damage at the start of each of the toad's turns. The toad can have only one target swallowed at a time.

If the toad dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse using 5 feet of movement, exiting prone.

traits.name: Water Breathing
traits.text: The eel can breathe only underwater.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The eel makes two bite attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) lightning damage.

actions.name: Lightning Jolt (recharge 5-6)
actions.text: One creature the eel touches within 5 feet of it outside water, or each creature within 15 feet of it in a body of water, must make a DC 12 Constitution saving throw. On failed save, a target takes 13 (3d8) lightning damage. If the target takes any of this damage, the target is stunned until the end of the eel's next turn. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage and isn't stunned.

traits.name: Evasion
traits.text: If the skeleton is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: The skeleton has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Turn Immunity
traits.text: The skeleton is immune to effects that turn undead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The skeleton makes three scimitar attacks.

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. On hit: 15 (3d6 + 5) slashing damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The lizard makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail. One attack can be replaced by Swallow.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) piercing damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 15). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the lizard can't bite another target.

actions.name: Tail
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. On hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Swallow
actions.text:
Melee weapon attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one Medium or smaller creature the lizard is grappling. On hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) piercing damage. The target is swallowed, and the grapple ends. The swallowed target is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the lizard, and it takes 10 (3d6) acid damage at the start of each of the lizard's turns. The lizard can have only one target swallowed at a time.

If the lizard dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse using 10 feet of movement, exiting prone.

name: Greater Zombie
languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

traits.name: Turn Resistance
traits.text: The zombie has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

traits.name: Undead Fortitude
traits.text: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The zombie makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Empowered Slam
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage and 7 (2d6) necrotic damage.

traits.name: Nimble Escape
traits.text: The goblin can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.text: Ranged weapon attack +4, range 80/320 ft., one target. On hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or contract a disease. Until the disease is cured, the target can't regain hit points except by magical means, and the target's hit point maximum decreases by 3 (1d6) every 24 hours. If the target's hit point maximum drops to 0 as a result of this disease, the target dies.

traits.name: Banded Claw
traits.text: On one of its claws, the crab wears a rune-covered copper band that makes it immune to being charmed, frightened, and paralyzed. The copper band is worthless as a treasure, as the magic is keyed to this crab.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.text: The crab can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Claw
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. On hit: 27 (4d10 + 5) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled, escape DC 14. The crab has two claws, each of which can grapple only one target.

traits.name: Chameleon Skin
traits.text: The troglodyte has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide.

traits.name: Stench
traits.text: Any creature other than a troglodyte that starts its turn within 5 feet of the troglodyte must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the start of the creature's next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the stench of all troglodytes for 1 hour.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.text: While in sunlight, the troglodyte has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The troglodyte makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.text: Kalka-Kylla can breathe air and water.

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.text: While Kalka-Kylla remains motionless and hidden in its shell, it is indistinguishable from a polished boulder.

traits.name: Shell
traits.text: Kalka-Kylla can use a bonus action to retract into or emerge from its shell. While retracted, Kalka-Kylla gains a +4 bonus to AC, and it has a speed of 0 and can't benefit from bonuses to speed.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Kalka-Kylla makes two claw attacks.

actions.name: Claw
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage, and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape DC 13). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained. Kalka-Kylla has two claws, each of which can grapple only one target.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.text: The kelpie can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Seaweed Shape
traits.text: The kelpie can use its action to reshape its body into the form of a humanoid or beast that is Small, Medium, or Large. Its statistics are otherwise unchanged. The disguise is convincing, unless the kelpie is in bright light or the viewer is within 30 feet of it, in which case the seams between the seaweed strands are visible. The kelpie returns to its true form if takes a bonus action to do so or if it dies.

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.text: While the kelpie remains motionless in its true form, it is indistinguishable from normal seaweed.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The kelpie makes two slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. On hit: 11 (2d8 + 2) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape DC 12).

actions.name: Drowning Hypnosis
actions.text:
The kelpie chooses one humanoid it can see within 150 feet of it. If the target can see the kelpie, the target must succeed on a DC 11 Wisdom saving throw or be magically charmed while the kelpie maintains concentration, up to 10 minutes (as if concentrating on a spell). The charmed target is incapacitated, and instead of holding its breath underwater, it tries to breathe normally and immediately runs out of breath, unless it can breathe water. If the charmed target is more than 5 feet away from the kelpie, the target must move on its turn toward the kelpie by the most direct route, trying to get within 5 feet. It doesn't avoid opportunity attacks.

Before moving into damaging terrain, such as lava or a pit, and whenever it takes damage from a source other than the kelpie or drowning, the target can repeat the saving throw. A charmed target can also repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns. If the saving throw is successful, the effect ends on it.

A target that successfully saves is immune to this kelpie's hypnosis for the next 24 hours.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.text: The kraken can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Siege Monster
traits.text: The kraken deals double damage to objects and structures.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The kraken makes three tentacle attacks. One of them can be replaced with a bite attack, and any of them can be replaced with Fling.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 16 (2d8 + 7) piercing damage.

actions.name: Tentacle
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +11 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. On hit: 14 (2d6 + 7) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 16). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained. The kraken has ten tentacles, each of which can grapple one target.

actions.name: Fling
actions.text: One Medium or smaller object held or creature grappled by the kraken 's tentacles is thrown up to 60 feet in a random direction and knocked prone. If a thrown target strikes a solid surface, the target takes 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage for every 10 feet it was thrown. If the target is thrown at another creature, that creature must succeed on a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw or take the same damage and be knocked prone.

actions.name: Lightning Storm
actions.text: The kraken creates three bolts of lightning, each of which can strike a target the kraken can see within 150 feet of it. A target must make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw, taking 16 (3d10) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

traits.name: Shapechanger
traits.text: The doppelganger can use its action to polymorph into a Small or Medium humanoid it has seen, or back into its true form. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

traits.name: Ambusher
traits.text: In the first round of a combat, the doppelganger has advantage on attack rolls against any creature it has surprised.

traits.name: Surprise Attack
traits.text: If the doppelganger surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra 10 (3d6) damage from the attack.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The doppelganger makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Read Thoughts
actions.text: The doppelganger magically reads the surface thoughts of one creature within 60 feet of it. The effect can penetrate barriers, but 3 feet of wood or dirt, 2 feet of stone, 2 inches of metal, or a thin sheet of lead blocks it. While the target is in range, the doppelganger can continue reading its thoughts, as long as the doppelganger's concentration isn't broken (as if concentrating on a spell). While reading the target's mind, the doppelganger has advantage on Wisdom (Insight) and Charisma (Deception, Intimidation, and Persuasion) checks against the target.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.text: The nereid can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Aquatic Invisibility
traits.text: If immersed in water, the nereid can make itself invisible as a bonus action. It remains invisible until it leaves the water, ends the invisibility as a bonus action, or dies.

traits.name: Mantle Dependent
traits.text: The nereid wears a mantle of silky cloth the color of sea foam, which holds the creature's spirit. The mantle has an AC and hit points equal to that of the nereid, but the garment can't be directly harmed while the nereid wears it. If the mantle is destroyed, the nereid becomes poisoned and dies within 1 hour. A nereid is willing to do anything in its power to recover the mantle if it is stolen, including serving the thief.

traits.name: Shape Water
traits.text: The nereid can cast control water at will, requiring no components. Its spellcasting ability for it is Charisma. This use of the spell has a range of 30 feet and can affect a cube of water no larger than 30 feet on a side.

traits.name: Speak With Animals
traits.text: The nereid can comprehend and verbally communicate with beasts.

actions.name: Blinding Acid
actions.text: Melee or ranged spell attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30 ft., one target. On hit: 16 (2d12 + 3) acid damage, and the target is blinded until the start of the nereid's next turn.

actions.name: Drowning Kiss (recharge 5-6)
actions.text: The nereid touches one creature it can see within 5 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or take 22 (3d12 + 3) acid damage. On a failure, it also runs out of breath and can't speak for 1 minute. At the end of each of its turns, it can repeat the save, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Water Lash
actions.text: The nereid causes a 5-foot cube of water within 60 feet of it to take a shape of its choice and strike one target it can see within 5 feet of that water. The target must make a DC 13 Strength saving throw. On a failed save, it takes 17 (4d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage, and if it is a Large or smaller creature, it is pushed up to 15 feet in a straight line or is knocked prone (nereid's choice). On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and isn't pushed or knocked prone.

traits.name: Corrosive Form
traits.text:
A creature that touches the Ooze Master or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 9 (2d8) acid damage. Any nonmagical weapon that hits the Ooze Master corrodes. After dealing damage, the weapon takes a permanent and cumulative −1 penalty to damage rolls. If its penalty drops to −5, the weapon is destroyed. Nonmagical ammunition that hits the Ooze Master is destroyed after dealing damage.

The Ooze Master can eat through 2-inch-thick, nonmagical wood or metal in 1 round.

traits.name: Instinctive Attack
traits.text: When the Ooze Master casts a spell with a casting time of 1 action, it can make one pseudopod attack as a bonus action.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.text: The Ooze Master can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.name: Pseudopod
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. On hit: 13 (3d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 10 (3d6) acid damage.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.text: The sea lion can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.text: The sea lion has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.text: The sea lion has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the sea lion's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

traits.name: Swimming Leap
traits.text: With a 10-foot swimming start, the sea lion can long jump out of or across the water up to 25 feet.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The sea lion makes three attacks: one bite attack and two claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) piercing damage.

traits.name: Barkskin
traits.text: Sharwyn's AC can't be lower than 16.

traits.name: Special Equipment
traits.text: Sharwyn has a spellbook that contains the spells listed in her Spellcasting trait, plus detect magic and silent image.

traits.name: Tree Thrall
traits.text: If the Gulthias Tree dies, Sharwyn dies 24 hours later.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

traits.name: Barkskin
traits.text: Sir Braford's AC can't be lower than 16.

traits.name: Special Equipment
traits.text: Sir Braford wields Shatterspike, a magic longsword that grants a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with it (included in his attack). See the Shatterspike handout for the item's other properties.

traits.name: Tree Thrall
traits.text: If the Gulthias Tree dies, Sir Braford dies 24 hours later.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage, or 9 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage if used with two hands.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.text: Siren can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: Siren has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Stupefying Touch
actions.text: Siren touches one creature she can see within 5 feet of her. The creature must succeed on a DC 13 Intelligence saving throw or take 13 (3d6 + 3) psychic damage and be stunned until the start of Siren's next turn.

name: Snarla
speed: walk 30 ft. (40 ft. in wolf form)
ac: 11 (in humanoid form); 12 (in wolf and hybrid forms) (natural armor)

traits.name: Shapechanger
traits.text: The werewolf can use its action to polymorph into a wolf-humanoid hybrid or into a wolf, or back into its true form, which is humanoid. Its statistics, other than its AC, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

traits.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
traits.text: The werewolf has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

actions.name: Multiattack (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.text: The werewolf makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws or spear.

actions.name: Bite (Wolf or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage. If the target is a humanoid, it must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be cursed with werewolf lycanthropy.

actions.name: Claws (Hybrid Form Only)
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. On hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Spear (Humanoid Form Only)
actions.text: Melee or ranged weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one creature. On hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

traits.name: Duergar Resilience
traits.text: The duergar has advantage on saving throws against poison, spells, and illusions, as well as to resist being charmed or paralyzed.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.text: While in sunlight, the duergar has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Enlarge (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
actions.text: For 1 minute, the duergar magically increases in size, along with anything it is wearing or carrying. While enlarged, the duergar is Large, doubles its damage dice on Strength-based weapon attacks (included in the attacks), and makes Strength checks and Strength saving throws with advantage. If the duergar lacks the room to become Large, it attains the maximum size possible in the space available.

actions.name: War Pick
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage, or 11 (2d8 + 2) piercing damage while enlarged.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.text: Melee or ranged weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. On hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, or 9 (2d6 + 2) piercing damage while enlarged.

actions.name: Invisibility (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
actions.text: The duergar magically turns invisible until it attacks, casts a spell, or uses its Enlarge, or until its concentration is broken, up to 1 hour (as if concentrating on a spell). Any equipment the duergar wears or carries is invisible with it.

traits.name: Focused Conjuration
traits.text: While Var is concentrating on a conjuration spell, his concentration can't be broken as a result of taking damage.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.text: If Var fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Rejuvenation
traits.text: If Var is destroyed but his phylactery remains intact, Var gains a new body in 1d10 days, regaining all his hit points and becoming active again. The new body appears within 5 feet of the phylactery.

traits.name: Turn Resistance
traits.text: Var has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

actions.name: Paralyzing Touch
actions.text: ms +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. On hit: 10 (3d6) cold damage. The target must succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Benign Transposition
actions.text: Var teleports up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space he can see. Alternatively, he can choose a space within range that is occupied by a Small or Medium creature. If that creature is willing, both creatures teleport, swapping places. Var can use this feature again only after he finishes a long rest or casts a conjuration spell of 1st level or higher.

legendary_actions.name: ​
legendary_actions.text: The Tarul Var can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The Tarul Var regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary_actions.name: Cantrip
legendary_actions.text: Var casts a cantrip.

legendary_actions.name: Paralyzing Touch (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.text: Var uses Paralyzing Touch.

legendary_actions.name: Frightening Gaze (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.text: Var fixes his gaze on one creature he can see within 10 feet of him. The target must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw against this magic or become frightened for 1 minute. The frightened target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to Var's gaze for the next 24 hours.

name: Tecuziztecatl
speed: walk 30 ft., climb 30 ft., swim 30 ft.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.text: Tecuziztecatl can breathe air and water.

traits.name: Glowing
traits.text: Tecuziztecatl sheds dim light within 20 feet of itself.

traits.name: Flexible
traits.text: Tecuziztecatl can enter a space large enough for a Medium creature without squeezing.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.text: Tecuziztecatl can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Tecuziztecatl makes two pseudopod attacks.

actions.name: Pseudopod
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. On hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Spit Acid (recharge 4-6)
actions.text: Tecuziztecatl exhales acid in a 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 18 (4d8) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

traits.name: Doomvault Devotion
traits.text: Within the Doomvault, the apprentice has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.text: Melee or ranged weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. On hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

traits.name: Doomvault Devotion
traits.text: Within the Doomvault, the warrior has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.text: The warrior has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the warrior's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The warrior makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.text: Melee or ranged weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. On hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

traits.name: Adhesive Blossoms
traits.text:
The thorn slinger adheres to anything that touches it. A Medium or smaller creature adhered to the thorn slinger is also grappled by it (escape DC 11). Ability checks made to escape this grapple have disadvantage.

At the end of each of the thorn slinger's turns, anything grappled by it takes 3 (1d6) acid damage.

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.text: While the thorn slinger remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an inanimate bush.

actions.name: Thorns
actions.text: Melee or ranged weapon attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30 ft., one target. On hit: 8 (2d6 + 1) piercing damage.

name: Tloques-Popolocas
languages: the languages it knew in life

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.text: The vampire regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point and isn't in sunlight or running water. If the vampire takes radiant damage or damage from holy water, this trait doesn't function at the start of the vampire's next turn.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.text: The vampire can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Vampire Weaknesses
traits.text:
The vampire has the following flaws:

• Forbiddance. The vampire can't enter a residence without an invitation from one of the occupants.
• Harmed by Running Water. The vampire takes 20 acid damage when it ends its turn in running water.
• Stake to the Heart. The vampire is destroyed if a piercing weapon made of wood is driven into its heart while it is incapacitated in its resting place.
• Sunlight Hypersensitivity. The vampire takes 20 radiant damage when it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks

traits.name: Shapechanger
traits.text:
If the vampire isn't in sunlight or running water, it can use its action to Polymorph into a Tiny bat, or back into its true form.

While in bat form, the vampire can't speak, its walking speed is 5 feet, and it has a flying speed of 30 feet. Its Statistics, other than its size and speed, are unchanged. Anything it is wearing transforms with it, but nothing it is carrying does. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The vampire makes two attacks.

actions.name: Claws
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. On hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) slashing damage. Instead of dealing damage, the vampire can grapple the target, escape DC 13.

actions.name: Children of the Night (1/Day)
actions.text: The vampire magically calls 2d4 swarms of bats, provided that the sun isn't up. The called creatures arrive in 1d4 rounds, acting as allies of the vampire and obeying its spoken commands. The beasts remain for 1 hour, until the vampire dies, or until the vampire dismisses them as a bonus action.

actions.name: Tloques' Berserker Axe +2
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) slashing damage.

traits.name: Amorphous Form
traits.text: White Maw can occupy another creature's space and vice versa.

traits.name: Corrode Metal
traits.text:
Any nonmagical weapon made of metal that hits White Maw corrodes. After dealing damage, the weapon takes a permanent and cumulative −1 penalty to damage rolls. if its penalty drops to −5, the weapon is destroyed. Nonmagical ammunition made of metal that hits White Maw is destroyed after dealing damage.

White Maw can eat through 2-inch-thick, nonmagical metal in 1 round.

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.text: While White Maw remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from white stone.

traits.name: Killer Response
traits.text: Any creature that starts its turn in White Maw's space is targeted by a pseudopod attack if White Maw isn't incapacitated.

actions.name: Pseudopod
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. On hit: 22 (4d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 9 (2d8) acid damage. If the target is wearing nonmagical metal armor, its armor is partly corroded and takes a permanent and cumulative −1 penalty to the AC it offers. The armor is destroyed if the penalty reduces its AC to 10.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.text: While in sunlight, Yusdrayl has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.text: Yusdrayl has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of her allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

traits.name: Special Equipment
traits.text: Acererak carries the Staff of the Forgotten One. He wears a Talisman of the Sphere and has a Sphere of Annihilation under his control.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
traits.text: If Acererak fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Rejuvenation
traits.text: Acererak's body turns to dust when he drops to 0 hit points, and his equipment is left behind. Acererak gains a new body after 1d10 days, regaining all his hit points and becoming active again. The new body appears within 5 feet of Acererak's phylactery, the location of which is hidden.

traits.name: Turn Resistance
traits.text: Acererak has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

actions.name: Paralyzing Touch
actions.text: ms +15 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. On hit: 10 (3d6) cold damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 20 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Staff (+3 Quarterstaff)
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +11 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 10 (3d6) necrotic damage, or 8 (1d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 10 (3d6) necrotic damage when used with two hands.

actions.name: Invoke Curse
actions.text: While holding the Staff of the Forgotten One, Acererak expends 1 charge from it and targets one creature he can see within 60 feet of him. The target must succeed on a DC 23 Constitution saving throw or be cursed. Until the curse is ended, the target can't regain hit points and has vulnerability to necrotic damage. Greater restoration, remove curse, or similar magic ends the curse on the target.

legendary_actions.name: ​
legendary_actions.text: The Acererak can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The Acererak regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary_actions.name: At-Will Spell
legendary_actions.text: Acererak casts one of his at-will spells.

legendary_actions.name: Melee Attack
legendary_actions.text: Acererak uses Paralyzing Touch or makes one melee attack with his staff.

legendary_actions.name: Frightening Gaze (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.text: Acererak fixes his gaze on one creature he can see within 10 feet of him. The target must succeed on a DC 20 Wisdom saving throw against this magic or become frightened for 1 minute. The frightened target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target its immune to Acererak's gaze for the next 24 hours.

legendary_actions.name: Talisman of the Sphere (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.text: Acererak uses his Talisman of the Sphere to move the Sphere of Annihilation under his control up to 90 feet.

legendary_actions.name: Disrupt Life (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.text: Each creature within 20 feet of Acererak must make a DC 20 Constitution saving throw against this magic, taking 42 (12d6) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

traits.name: Dwarven Resilience
traits.text: The dwarf has advantage on saving throws against poison.

actions.name: Handaxe
actions.text: Melee or ranged weapon attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. On hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) slashing damage.

traits.name: Dwarven Resilience
traits.text: The dwarf has advantage on saving throws against poison.

actions.name: Handaxe
actions.text: Melee or ranged weapon attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. On hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) slashing damage.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.text: The aldani can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The aldani makes two attacks with its claws.

actions.name: Claw
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) slashing damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 11). The aldani has two claws, each of which can grapple only one target.

traits.name: Keen Senses
traits.text: The almiraj has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

traits.name: Familiar
traits.text: With the DM's permission, the find familiar spell can summon an almiraj.

actions.name: Horn
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

traits.name: Undead Fortitude
traits.text: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5+the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.

actions.name: Tail
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target On hit: 18 (4d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

traits.name: Special Equipment
traits.text:
Artus wears the Ring of Winter. He and the ring can't be targeted by divination magic or perceived through magical scrying sensors. While attuned to and wearing the ring, Artus ceases to age and is immune to cold damage and the effects of extreme cold.

Artus wields Bookmark a +3 dagger with additional magical properties. As a bonus action, Artus can activate any one of the following properties while attuned to the dagger, provided he has the weapon drawn:

• Cause a blue gem set into the dagger's pommel to shed bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet, or make the gem go dark.
• Turn the dagger into a compass that, while resting on your palm, points north.
• Cast dimension door from the dagger. Once this property is used, it can't be used again until the next dawn.
• Cast compulsion (save DC 15) from the dagger. The range of the spell increases to 90 feet but it targets only spiders that are beasts. Once this property is used, it can't be used again until the next dawn

actions.name: Multiattack
