actions.text: Melee weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Enslave (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
actions.text: The neogi targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or be magically charmed by the neogi for 1 day, or until the neogi dies or is more than 1 mile from the target. The charmed target obeys the neogi's commands and can't take reactions, and the neogi and the target can communicate telepathically with each other at a distance of up to 1 mile. Whenever the charmed target takes damage, it can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.

traits.name: Creature Sense
traits.text: The neothelid is aware of the presence of creatures within 1 mile of it that have an Intelligence score of 4 or higher. It knows the distance and direction to each creature, as well as each creature's Intelligence score, but can't sense anything else about it. A creature protected by a mind blank spell, a nondetection spell, or similar magic can't be perceived in this manner.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: The neothelid has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Tentacles
actions.text:
Melee weapon attack +13 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. On hit: 21 (3d8 + 8) bludgeoning damage plus 13 (3d8) psychic damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 18 Strength saving throw or be swallowed by the neothelid. A swallowed creature is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the neothelid, and it takes 35 (10d6) acid damage at the start of each of the neothelid's turns.

If the neothelid takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the neothelid must succeed on a DC 18 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall prone in a space within 10 feet of the neothelid. If the neothelid dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse by using 20 feet of movement, exiting prone.

actions.name: Acid Breath (recharge 5-6)
actions.text: The neothelid exhales acid in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw, taking 35 (10d6) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

traits.name: Nilbogism
traits.text: Any creature that attempts to damage the nilbog must first succeed on a DC 12 Charisma saving throw or be charmed until the end of the creature's next turn. A creature charmed in this way must use its action praising the nilbog. The nilbog can't regain hit points, including through magical healing, except through its Reversal of Fortune reaction.

traits.name: Nimble Escape
traits.text: The nilbog can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

actions.name: Fool's Scepter
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.text: Ranged weapon attack +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. On hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

traits.name: Aggressive
traits.text: As a bonus action, the orc can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

traits.name: Foe Smiter of Ilneval
traits.text: The orc deals an extra die of damage when it hits with a longsword attack (included in the attack).

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The orc makes two melee attacks with its longsword or two ranged attacks with its javelins. If Ilneval's Command is available to use, the orc can use it after these attacks.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 14 (2d10 + 3) slashing damage when used with two hands.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.text: Melee or ranged weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. On hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Ilneval's Command (Recharges 4–6)
actions.text: Up to three allied orcs within 120 feet of this orc that can hear it can use their reactions to each make one weapon attack.

traits.name: Aggressive
traits.text: As a bonus action, the orc can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The orc makes two claw attacks, or four claw attacks if it has fewer than half of its hit points remaining.

actions.name: Claw
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage.

name: Orc Hand of Yurtrus
languages: understands Common and Orc but can't speak

traits.name: Aggressive
traits.text: As a bonus action, the orc can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

actions.name: Touch of the White Hand
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 9 (2d8) necrotic damage.

traits.name: Aggressive
traits.text: As a bonus action, the orc can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

traits.name: Corrupted Carrier
traits.text: When the orc is reduced to 0 hit points, it explodes, and any creature within 10 feet of it must make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 14 (4d6) poison damage and becomes poisoned. On a success, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't poisoned. A creature poisoned by this effect can repeat the save at the end of each of its turn, ending the effect on itself on a success. While poisoned by this effect, a creature can't regain hit points.

traits.name: Nurtured One of Yurtrus
traits.text: The orc has advantage on saving throws against poison and disease.

actions.name: Claws
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage plus 2 (1d4) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Corrupted Vengeance
actions.text: The orc reduces itself to 0 hit points, triggering its Corrupted Carrier trait.

traits.name: Cunning Action
traits.text: On each of its turns, the orc can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

traits.name: Hand of Shargaas
traits.text: The orc deals 2 extra dice of damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack (included in its attacks).

traits.name: Shargaas's Sight
traits.text: Magical darkness doesn't impede the orc's darkvision.

traits.name: Slayer
traits.text: In the first round of a combat, the orc has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn yet. If the orc hits a creature that round who was surprised, the hit is automatically a critical hit.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The orc makes two scimitar or dart attacks.

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 13 (3d6 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Dart
actions.text: Ranged weapon attack +5 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. On hit: 10 (3d4 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Veil of Shargaas (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
actions.text: The orc casts darkness without any components. Wisdom is its spellcasting ability.

traits.name: Charge
traits.text: If the ox moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) piercing damage.

traits.name: Beast of Burden
traits.text: The oxen is considered to be a Huge animal for the purposes of determining its carrying capacity.

actions.name: Gore
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

traits.name: Dive Attack
traits.text: If the quetzalcoatlus is flying and dives at least 30 feet toward a target and then hits with a bite attack, the attack deals an extra 10 (3d6) damage to the target.

traits.name: Flyby
traits.text: The quetzalcoatlus doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. On hit: 12 (3d6 + 2) piercing damage.

traits.name: Blurred Movement
traits.text: Attack rolls against the quickling have disadvantage unless the quickling is incapacitated or restrained.

traits.name: Evasion
traits.text: If the quickling is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The quickling makes three dagger attacks.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.text: Melee or ranged weapon attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. On hit: 8 (1d4 + 6) piercing damage.

name: Red Guard Drake
languages: understands Draconic but can't speak it

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The drake attacks twice, once with its bite and once with its tail.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Iron Boots
traits.text: While moving, the redcap has disadvantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks.

traits.name: Outsize Strength
traits.text: While grappling, the redcap is considered to be Medium. Also, wielding a heavy weapon doesn't impose disadvantage on its attack rolls.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The redcap makes three attacks with its wicked sickle.

actions.name: Wicked Sickle
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Ironbound Pursuit
actions.text: The redcap moves up to its speed to a creature it can see and kicks with its iron boots. The target must succeed on a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw or take 20 (3d10 + 4) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone.

traits.name: Charge
traits.text: If the rothé moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) piercing damage.

actions.name: Gore
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

name: Sea Spawn
languages: understands Aquan and Common but can't speak

traits.name: Limited Amphibiousness
traits.text: The sea spawn can breathe air and water, but needs to be submerged in the sea at least once a day for 1 minute to avoid suffocating.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The sea spawn makes three attacks: two unarmed strikes and one with its Piscine Anatomy.

actions.name: Unarmed Strike
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Piscine Anatomy
actions.text:
The sea spawn has one or more of the following attack options, provided it has the appropriate anatomy:

• Bite. Melee weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.
• Poison Quills. Melee weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. On hit: 3 (1d6) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
• Tentacle. Melee weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. On hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 12) if it is a Medium or smaller creature. Until this grapple ends, the sea spawn can't use this tentacle on another target

traits.name: Ethereal Awareness
traits.text: The shadow mastiff can see ethereal creatures and objects.

traits.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
traits.text: The shadow mastiff has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

traits.name: Shadow Blend
traits.text: While in dim light or darkness, the shadow mastiff can use a bonus action to become invisible, along with anything it is wearing or carrying. The invisibility lasts until the shadow mastiff uses a bonus action to end it or until the shadow mastiff attacks, is in bright light, or is incapacitated.

traits.name: Sunlight Weakness
traits.text: While in bright light created by sunlight, the shadow mastiff has disadvantage on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

traits.name: Rampage
traits.text: When it reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the shoosuva can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a bite attack.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The shoosuva makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail stinger.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 26 (4d10 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Tail Stinger
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +7 to hit, reach 15 ft., one creature. On hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned. While poisoned, the target is also paralyzed. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

name: Slithering Tracker
languages: understands languages it knew in its previous form but can't speak
speed: walk 30 ft., climb 30 ft., swim 30 ft.

traits.name: Ambusher
traits.text: In the first round of a combat, the slithering tracker has advantage on attack rolls against any creature it surprised.

traits.name: Damage Transfer
traits.text: While grappling a creature, the slithering tracker takes only haIf the damage dealt to it, and the creature it is grappling takes the other half.

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.text: While the slithering tracker remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a puddle, unless an observer succeeds on a DC 18 Intelligence (Investigation) check.

traits.name: Keen Tracker
traits.text: The slithering tracker has advantage on Wisdom checks to track prey.

traits.name: Liquid Form
traits.text: The slithering tracker can enter an enemy's space and stop there. It can also move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.text: The slithering tracker can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Watery Stealth
traits.text: While underwater, the slithering tracker has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide, and it can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

actions.name: Slam
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Life Leech
actions.text: One Large or smaller creature that the slithering tracker can see within 5 feet of it must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or be grappled (escape DC 13). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained and unable to breathe unless it can breathe water. In addition, the grappled target takes 16 (3d10) necrotic damage at the start of each of its turns. The slithering tracker can grapple only one target at a time.

name: Spawn of Kyuss
languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.text: The spawn of Kyuss regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point and isn't in sunlight or a body of running water. If the spawn takes acid, fire, or radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the spawn's next turn. The spawn is destroyed only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

traits.name: Worms
traits.text: If the spawn of Kyuss is targeted by an effect that cures disease or removes a curse, all the worms infesting it wither away, and it loses its Burrowing Worm action.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The spawn of Kyuss makes two attacks with its claws and uses Burrowing Worm.

actions.name: Burrowing Worm
actions.text: A worm launches from the spawn of Kyuss at one humanoid that the spawn can see within 10 feet of it. The worm latches onto the target's skin unless the target succeeds on a DC 11 Dexterity saving throw. The worm is a Tiny undead with AC 6, 1 hit point, a 2 (-4) in every ability score, and a speed of 1 foot. While on the target's skin, the worm can be killed by normal means or scraped off using an action (the spawn can use this action to launch a scraped-off worm at a humanoid it can see within 10 feet of the worm). Otherwise, the worm burrows under the target's skin at the end of the target's next turn, dealing 1 piercing damage to it. At the end of each of its turns thereafter, the target takes 7 (2d6) necrotic damage per worm infesting it (maximum of 10d6). A worm-infested target dies if it drops to 0 hit points, then rises 10 minutes later as a spawn of Kyuss. If a worm-infested creature is targeted by an effect that cures disease or removes a curse, all the worms infesting it wither away.

actions.name: Claw
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. On hit: 26 (6d6 + 5) piercing damage.

traits.name: Charge
traits.text: If the kow moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) piercing damage.

traits.name: Stench
traits.text: Any creature other than a stench kow that starts its turn within 5 feet of the stench kow must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the start of the creature's next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the stench of all stench kows for 1 hour.

actions.name: Gore
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

traits.name: Dreamwalker's Charm
traits.text: An enemy that starts its turn within 30 feet of the giant must make a DC 13 Charisma saving throw, provided that the giant isn't incapacitated. On a failed save, the creature is charmed by the giant. A creature charmed in this way can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. Once it succeeds on the saving throw, the creature is immune to this giant's Dreamwalker's Charm for 24 hours.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The giant makes two attacks with its greatclub.

actions.name: Greatclub
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +10 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. On hit: 19 (3d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Petrifying Touch
actions.text: The giant touches one Medium or smaller creature within 10 feet of it that is charmed by it. The target must make a DC 17 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target becomes petrified, and the giant can adhere the target to its stony body. Greater restoration spells and other magic that can undo petrification have no effect on a petrified creature on the giant unless the giant is dead, in which case the magic works normally, freeing the petrified creature as well as ending the petrified condition on it.

actions.name: Rock
actions.text: Ranged weapon attack +10 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. On hit: 28 (4d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 17 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

name: Storm Giant Quintessent
speed: walk 50 ft., fly 50 ft. (hover), swim 50 ft.

traits.name: Amphibious
traits.text: The giant can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The giant makes two Lightning Sword attacks or uses Wind Javelin twice.

actions.name: Lightning Sword
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +14 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. On hit: 40 (9d6 + 9) lightning damage.

actions.name: Windjavelin
actions.text: The giant coalesces wind into a javelin-like form and hurls it at a creature it can see within 600 feet of it. The javelin is considered a magic weapon and deals 19 (3d6 + 9) piercing damage to the target, striking unerringly. The javelin disappears after it hits.

legendary_actions.name: ​
legendary_actions.text: The Storm Giant Quintessent can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The Storm Giant Quintessent regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary_actions.name: Gust
legendary_actions.text: The giant targets a creature it can see within 60 feet of it and creates a magical gust of wind around it. The target must succeed on a DC 18 Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 20 feet in any horizontal direction the giant chooses.

legendary_actions.name: Thunderbolt (2 Actions)
legendary_actions.text: The giant hurls a thunderbolt at a creature it can see within 600 feet of it. The target must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 (4d10) thunder damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary_actions.name: One with the Storm (3 Actions)
legendary_actions.text: The giant vanishes, dispersing itself into the storm surrounding its lair. The giant can end this effect at the start of any of its turns, becoming a giant once more and appearing in any location it chooses within its lair. While dispersed, the giant can't take any actions other than lair actions, and it can't be targeted by attacks, spells, or other effects. The giant can't use this ability outside its lair, nor can it use this ability if another creature is using a control weather spell or similar magic to quell the storm.

traits.name: Illumination
traits.text: As a bonus action, the swarm can shed dim light from its brains in a 5-foot radius, increase the illumination to bright light in a 5 to 20-foot radius (and dim light for an additional number of feet equal to the chosen radius), or extinguish the light.

traits.name: Swarm
traits.text: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny rat. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

traits.name: Telepathic Shroud
traits.text: The swarm is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts. as well as to all divination spells.

actions.name: Bites
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the swarm's space. On hit: 14 (4d6) piercing damage, or 7 (2d6) piercing damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.

traits.name: Swarm
traits.text: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny maggot. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

actions.name: Bites
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +0 to hit, reach 0 ft., one creature in the swarm's space. On hit: The target is infested by 1d4 rot grubs. At the start of each of the target's turns, the target takes 1d6 piercing damage per rot grub infesting it. Applying fire to the bite wound before the end of the target's next turn deals 1 fire damage to the target and kills these rot grubs. After this time, these rot grubs are too far under the skin to be burned. If a target infested by rot grubs ends its turn with 0 hit points, it dies as the rot grubs burrow into its heart and kill it. Any effect that cures disease kills all rot grubs infesting the target.

traits.name: Lightfooted
traits.text: The swashbuckler can take the Dash or Disengage action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

traits.name: Suave Defense
traits.text: While the swashbuckler is wearing light or no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Charisma modifier.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The swashbuckler makes three attacks: one with a dagger and two with its rapier.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.text: Melee or ranged weapon attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. On hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Rapier
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

traits.name: Aggressive
traits.text: As a bonus action, the tanarukk can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: The tanarukk has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The tanarukk makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its greatsword.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Greatsword
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.

traits.name: Plant Camouflage
traits.text: The thorny has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks it makes in any terrain with ample obscuring plant life.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.text: The thorny regains 5 hit points at the start of its turn. If it takes cold, fire, or necrotic damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the thorny's next turn. The thorny dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 8 (2d6 + 1) piercing damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The tlincalli makes two attacks: one with its longsword or spiked chain, and one with its sting.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Spiked Chain
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. On hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 11) if it is a Large or smaller creature. Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the tlincalli can't use the spiked chain against another target.

actions.name: Sting
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. On hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 14 (4d6) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 minute. If it fails the saving throw by 5 or more, the target is also paralyzed while poisoned. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

traits.name: Transmuter's Stone
traits.text:
The transmuter carries a magic stone it crafted that grants its bearer one of the following effects:

Darkvision out to a range of 60 feet

An extra 10 feet of speed while the bearer is unencumbered

Proficiency with Constitution saving throws

Resistance to acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder damage (transmuter's choice whenever the transmuter chooses this benefit)

If the transmuter has the stone and casts a transmutation spell of 1st level or higher, it can change the effect of the stone.

actions.name: Quarterstaff
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 2 (1d6 - 1) bludgeoning damage, or 3 (1d8 - 1) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.text: While the trapper is attached to a ceiling, floor, or wall and remains motionless, it is almost indistinguishable from an ordinary section of ceiling, floor, or wall. A creature that can see it and succeeds on a DC 20 Intelligence (Investigation) or Intelligence (Nature) check can discern its presence.

traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.text: The trapper can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.name: Smother
actions.text: One Large or smaller creature within 5 feet of the trapper must succeed on a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw or be grappled (escape DC 14). Until the grapple ends, the target takes 17 (4d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 3 (1d6) acid damage at the start of each of its turns. While grappled in this way, the target is restrained, blinded, and at risk of suffocating. The trapper can smother only one creature at a time.

traits.name: Creature Sense
traits.text: The ulitharid is aware of the presence of creatures within 2 miles of it that have an Intelligence score of 4 or higher. It knows the distance and direction to each creature, as well as each creature's intelligence score, but can't sense anything else about it. A creature protected by a mind blank spell, a nondetection spell, or similar magic can't be perceived in this manner.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: The ulitharid has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Psionic Hub
traits.text: If an elder brain establishes a psychic link with the ulitharid, the elder brain can form a psychic link with any other creature the ulitharid can detect using its Creature Sense. Any such link ends if the creature falls outside the telepathy ranges of both the ulitharid and the elder brain. The ulitharid can maintain its psychic link with the elder brain regardless of the distance between them, so long as they are both on the same plane of existence. lithe ulitharid is more than 5 miles away from the elder brain, it can end the psychic link at any time (no action required).

actions.name: Tentacles
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. On hit: 27 (4d10 + 5) psychic damage. If the target is Large or smaller, it is grappled (escape DC 14) and must succeed on a DC 17 Intelligence saving throw or be stunned until this grapple ends.

actions.name: Extract Brain
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one incapacitated humanoid grappled by the ulitharid. On hit: 55 (10d10) piercing damage. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the ulitharid kills the target by extracting and devouring its brain.

actions.name: Mind Blast (recharge 5-6)
actions.text: The ulitharid magically emits psychic energy in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 17 Intelligence saving throw or take 31 (4d12 + 5) psychic damage and be stunned for 1 minute. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

name: Vargouille
languages: and any languages it knew before becoming a vargouille but can't speak

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) poison damage.

actions.name: Kiss
actions.text: The vargouille kisses one incapacitated humanoid within 5 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 12 Charisma saving throw or become cursed. The cursed target loses 1 point of Charisma after each hour, as its head takes on fiendish aspects. The curse doesn't advance while the target is in sunlight or the area of a daylight spell; don't count that time. When the cursed target's Charisma becomes 2, it dies, and its head tears from its body and becomes a new vargouille. Casting remove curse, greater restoration, or a similar spell on the target before the transformation is complete can end the curse. Doing so undoes the changes made to the target by the curse.

actions.name: Stunning Shriek
actions.text: The vargouille shrieks. Each humanoid and beast within 30 feet of the vargouille and able to hear it must succeed on a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of the vargouille's next turn. While frightened in this way, a target is stunned. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to the Stunning Shriek of all vargouilles for 1 hour.

traits.name: Plant Camouflage
traits.text: The vegepygmy has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks it makes in any terrain with ample obscuring plant life.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.text: The vegepygmy regains 3 hit points at the start of its turn. If it takes cold, fire, or necrotic damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the vegepygmy's next turn. The vegepygmy dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

actions.name: Claws
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Sling
actions.text: Ranged weapon attack +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. On hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

traits.name: Plant Camouflage
traits.text: The vegepygmy has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks it makes in any terrain with ample obscuring plant life.

traits.name: Regeneration

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The vegepygmy makes two attacks with its claws or two melee attacks with its spear.

actions.name: Claws

actions.name: Spear
actions.text: Melee or ranged weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. On hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

actions.name: Spores (1/Day)
actions.text: A 15-foot-radius cloud of toxic spores extends out from the vegepygmy. The spores spread around corners. Each creature in that area that isn't a plant must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned. While poisoned in this way, a target takes 9 (2d8) poison damage at the start of each of its turns. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.text: The velociraptor has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the velociraptor's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The velociraptor makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. On hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.text: Melee weapon attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Dagger

name: Warlock of the Fiend
languages: any two languages (usually Abyssal or Infernal)

traits.name: Dark One's Own Luck (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
traits.text: When the warlock makes an ability check or saving throw, it can add a d10 to the roll. It can do this after the roll is made but before any of the roll's effects occur.

actions.name: Mace
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage plus 10 (3d6) fire damage.

name: Warlock of the Great Old One

traits.name: Whispering Aura
traits.text: At the start of each of the warlock's turns, each creature of its choice within 5 feet of it must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or take 10 (3d6) psychic damage, provided that the warlock isn't incapacitated.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.text: Melee or ranged weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. On hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

traits.name: Indomitable (3/Day)
traits.text: The warlord can reroll a saving throw it fails. It must use the new roll.

traits.name: Survivor
traits.text: The warlord regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point but fewer hit points than half its hit point maximum.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The warlord makes two weapon attacks.

actions.name: Greatsword
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) slashing damage.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.text: Ranged weapon attack +7 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. On hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

legendary_actions.name: ​
legendary_actions.text: The Warlord can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The Warlord regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary_actions.name: Weapon Attack
legendary_actions.text: The warlord makes a weapon attack.

legendary_actions.name: Command Ally
legendary_actions.text: The warlord targets one ally it can see within 30 feet of it. if the target can see and hear the warlord, the target can make one weapon attack as a reaction and gains advantage on the attack roll.

legendary_actions.name: Frighten Foe (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.text: The warlord targets one enemy it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see and hear it, the target must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of warlord's next turn.

name: White Guard Drake
languages: understands Draconic but can't speak it
speed: walk 30 ft., burrow 20 ft., climb 30 ft.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The drake attacks twice, once with its bite and once with its tail.

actions.text: Melee weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Tail

traits.text: In the wood woad's hand, its club is magical and deals 7 (3d4) extra damage (included in its attacks).

traits.name: Plant Camouflage
traits.text: The wood woad has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks it makes in any terrain with ample obscuring plant life.

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.text: The wood woad regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it is in contact with the ground. If the wood woad takes fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the wood woad's next turn. The wood woad dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

traits.name: Tree Stride
traits.text: Once on each of its turns, the wood woad can use 10 feet of its movement to step magically into one living tree within 5 feet of it and emerge from a second living tree within 60 feet of it that it can see, appearing in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the second tree. Both trees must be Large or bigger.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The wood woad makes two attacks with its club.

actions.text: Melee weapon attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 14 (4d4 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

traits.text: The xvart can communicate with ordinary bats and rats, as well as giant bats and giant rats.

actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.

traits.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
traits.text: The yeth hound has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

traits.name: Sunlight Banishment
traits.text: If the yeth hound starts its turn in sunlight, it is transported to the Ethereal Plane. While sunlight shines on the spot from which it vanished, the hound must remain in the Deep Ethereal. After sunset, it returns to the Border Ethereal at the same spot, whereupon it typically sets out to find its pack or its master. The hound is visible on the Material Plane while it is in the Border Ethereal, and vice versa, but it can't affect or be affected by anything on the other plane. Once it is adjacent to its master or a pack mate that is on the Material Plane, a yeth hound in the Border Ethereal can return to the Material Plane as an action.

traits.name: Telepathic Bond
traits.text: While the yeth hound is on the same plane of existence as its master, it can magically convey what it senses to its master, and the two can communicate telepathically with each other.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage, plus 14 (4d6) psychic damage if the target is frightened.

actions.name: Baleful Baying
actions.text: The yeth hound bays magically. Every enemy within 300 feet of the hound that can hear it must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of the hound's next turn or until the hound is incapacitated. A frightened target that starts its turn within 30 feet of the hound must use all its movement on that turn to get as far from the hound as possible, must finish the move before taking an action, and must take the most direct route, even if hazards lie that way. A target that successfully saves is immune to the baying of all yeth hounds for the next 24 hours.

name: Yuan-ti Anathema
speed: walk 40 ft., climb 30 ft., swim 30 ft.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: The anathema has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Ophidiophobia Aura
traits.text: Any creature of the anathema's choice, other than a snake or a yuan-ti, that starts its turn within 30 feet of the anathema and can see or hear it must succeed on a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened of snakes and yuan-ti. A frightened target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to this aura for the next 24 hours.

traits.name: Shapechanger
traits.text: The anathema can use its action to polymorph into a Huge giant constrictor snake, or back into its true form. its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed.

traits.name: Six Heads
traits.text: The anathema has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks and on saving throws against being blinded. charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned, or knocked unconscious.

Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained and takes 16 (3d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) acid damage at the start of each of its turns, and the anathema can't constrict another target.

actions.text: The yuan-ti taps into the nightmares of a creature it can see within 60 feet of it and creates an illusory, immobile manifestation of the creature's deepest fears, visible only to that creature. The target must make a DC 13 Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 11 (2d10) psychic damage and is frightened of the manifestation, believing it to be real. The yuan-ti must concentrate to maintain the illusion (as if concentrating on a spell), which lasts for up to 1 minute and can't be harmed. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the illusion on a success, or taking 11 (2d10) psychic damage on a failure.

actions.text: The yuan-ti targets up to five creatures that it can see within 60 feet of it. Each target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or fall into a magical sleep and be unconscious for 10 minutes. A sleeping target awakens if it takes damage or if someone uses an action to shake or slap it awake. This magical sleep has no effect on a creature immune to being charmed.

actions.text: Melee weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

name: Dancing Item
hp: equal the dancing item's Constitution modifier + your Charisma modifier + five times your level in this class

traits.name: Endless Waltz
traits.text: Immediately after the item makes a slam attack, it can take the Dodge action as a bonus action.

traits.name: Immutable Form
traits.text: The item is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

actions.name: Force-Empowered Slam
actions.text: Melee weapon attack your spell attack modifier to hit, reach 5 ft., one target you can see. On hit: 1d10 + your Charisma modifier force damage.

name: Drake Companion

saves.special: Dex d20 +2 plus PB, Wis d20 +2 plus PB

hp: 5 + five times your ranger level (the drake has a number of hit dice [d10s] equal to your ranger level)

traits.name: Draconic Essence
traits.text: When you summon the drake, choose a damage type: acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison. The chosen type determines the drake's damage immunity, the damage of its bite, and the damage of its Infused Strikes trait.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +3 plus PB to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 1d6 piercing damage plus PB damage of a type determined by the drake's Draconic Essence.

traits.name: Regeneration (Slaadi Only)

actions.text: ms +3 + the spell's level to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. On hit: 1d6 + 3 + the spell's level psychic damage.

traits.name: Amphibious (Water Only)

traits.name: Flyby (Air Only)

The chosen creature gains temporary hit points equal to the damage dealt, provided it doesn't already have temporary hit points.

traits.text: The elemental can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The elemental makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

actions.name: Slam
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 + the spell's level to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 1d10 + 4 + the spell's level bludgeoning damage (Air, Earth, and Water only) or fire damage (Fire only).

name: Fey Spirit
hp: equal the fey's Constitution modifier + your spellcasting ability modifier + ten times the spell's level

traits.name: Fey Step
traits.text: As a bonus action, the fey can magically teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

traits.name: Darkening Step (Deceitful Only)
traits.text: Immediately after using its Fey Step, the fey can fill a 5-foot cube within 5 feet of it with magical darkness, which remains until the end of the fey's next turn.

traits.name: Ecstatic Step (Joyful Only)
traits.text: Immediately after using its Fey Step, the fey can choose a creature it can see within 10 feet of it and force it to succeed on a Wisdom saving throw against your spell save DC or be charmed by the fey for 1 minute. The charm ends if the fey or any of its companions deals any damage to the target.

traits.name: Impassioned Step (Furious Only)
traits.text: Immediately after using its Fey Step, the fey has advantage on the next attack roll it makes before the end of its turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The fey makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +3 + the spell's level to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 1d6 + 3 + the spell's level piercing damage + 1d6 force damage.

name: Fiendish Spirit
speed: walk 40 ft., climb 40 ft. (demon only), fly 60 ft. (devil only)
hp: equal the fiend's Constitution modifier + your spellcasting ability modifier + ten times the spell's level

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.text: The fiend has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Death Throes (Demon Only)
traits.text: When the fiend drops to 0 hit points or the spell ends, the fiend explodes, and each creature within 10 feet of it must make a Dexterity saving throw against your spell save DC. A creature takes 2d10 + this spell's level fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

traits.name: Devil's Sight (Devil Only)
traits.text: Magical darkness doesn't impede the fiend's darkvision.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The fiend makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

actions.name: Bite (Demon Only)
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +3 + the spell's level to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 1d12 + 3 + the spell's level necrotic damage.

actions.name: Claws (Yugoloth Only)
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +3 + the spell's level to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 1d8 + 3 + the spell's level slashing damage. Immediately after the attack hits or misses, the fiend can magically teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

actions.name: Hurl Flame (Devil Only)
actions.text: rs +3 + the spell's level to hit, range 150 ft., one target. On hit: 2d6 + 3 + the spell's level fire damage. If the target is a flammable object that isn't being worn or carried, it also catches fire.

name: Shadow Spirit
hp: equal the shadow's Constitution modifier + your spellcasting ability modifier + ten times the spell's level

traits.name: Bloodthirsty Frenzy (Fury Only)
traits.text: The spirit has advantage on attack rolls against frightened creatures.

traits.name: Shadow Stealth (Fear Only)
traits.text: While in dim light or darkness, the spirit can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

traits.name: Weight of Ages (Despair Only)
traits.text: Any beast or humanoid, other than you, that starts its turn within 5 feet of the spirit has its speed reduced by 20 feet until the start of that beast or humanoid's next turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The spirit makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

actions.name: Chilling Rend
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +3 + the spell's level to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 2d8 + 3 + the spell's level cold damage.

actions.name: Dreadful Scream (1/Day)
actions.text: The spirit screams. Each creature within 30 feet of it must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw against your spell save DC or be frightened of the spirit for 1 minute. The frightened creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

name: Undead Spirit
speed: walk 30 ft., fly 40 ft. (ghostly only; hover)
hp: equal the undead's Constitution modifier + your spellcasting ability modifier + ten times the spell's level

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement (Ghostly Only)
traits.text: The undead can become incorporeal while moving and pass through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. If it ends its turn inside an object, it is shunted to the nearest unoccupied space and takes 1d10 force damage for every 5 feet traveled.

traits.name: Festering Aura (Putrid Only)
traits.text: Any creature, other than you, that starts its turn within 5 feet of the undead must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against your spell save DC or be poisoned until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The spirit makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down).

actions.name: Deathly Touch (Ghostly Only)
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +3 + the spell's level to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. On hit: 1d8 + 3 + the spell's level necrotic damage, and the creature must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw against your spell save DC or be frightened of the undead until the end of the target's next turn.

actions.name: Grave Bolt (Skeletal Only)
actions.text: rs +3 + the spell's level to hit, range 150 ft., one target. On hit: 2d8 + 3 + the spell's level necrotic damage.

actions.name: Rotting Claw (Putrid Only)
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +3 + the spell's level to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 1d6 + 3 + the spell's level slashing damage. If the target is poisoned, it must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against your spell save DC or be paralyzed until the end of its next turn.

name: Alchemical Homunculus
hp: equal to five times your level in this class + your Intelligence modifier

traits.name: Might of the Master
traits.text: The following numbers increase by 1 when your proficiency bonus increases by 1: the homunculus's skill bonuses and the bonuses to hit and damage of its Acidic Spittle.

actions.name: Acidic Spittle
actions.text: Ranged weapon attack +4 to hit, range 30 ft., one target you can see. On hit: 1d6 + 2 acid damage.

actions.name: Alchemical Salve (3/Day)
actions.text:
The homunculus produces a salve and touches one creature you designate. The target receives one of the following magical benefits of your choice:

• Buoyancy The target gains a flying speed of 10 feet for 10 minutes.
• Inspiration The target feels giddy and effective, gaining advantage on certain ability checks in the next hour. The target chooses the checks before or after rolling. The magic runs out after the target has used it on a number of checks equal to your Intelligence modifier (minimum of 1).
• Resilience The target gains a number of temporary hit points equal to 2d6 + your Intelligence modifier

name: Iron Defender
hp: equal to five times your level in this class + your Intelligence modifier + the iron defender's Constitution modifier

traits.name: Might of the Master
traits.text: The following numbers increase by 1 when your proficiency bonus increases by 1: the iron defender's skill bonuses, the bonuses to hit and damage of its bite, and the number of hit points restored by its Repair action.

traits.name: Vigilant
traits.text: The iron defender can't be surprised.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target you can see. On hit: 1d8 + 2 piercing damage.

actions.name: Repair (3/Day)
actions.text: The magical mechanisms inside the iron defender restore 2d8 + 2 hit points to itself or to one construct or object within 5 feet of it.

name: Beast of the Air
hp: equal the beast's Constitution modifier + your Wisdom modifier + five times your ranger level (the beast has a number of Hit Dice [d6s] equal to your ranger level)

traits.name: Flyby
traits.text: The beast doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

traits.name: Primal Rebirth
traits.text: If the beast has died within the last hour, you can use your action to touch it and expend a spell slot of 1st level or higher. The beast returns to life after 1 minute with all its hit points restored.

traits.name: Ready Companion
traits.text: As a bonus action, you can command the beast to make its shred attack or to Hide.

actions.name: Shred
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 1d6 + 3 slashing damage.

name: Beast of the Earth
speed: walk 40 ft., choose from climb, swim 40 ft. (your choice when you bond with the beast)
hp: equal the beast's Constitution modifier + your Wisdom modifier + five times your ranger level (the beast has a number of Hit Dice [d8s] equal to your ranger level)

traits.name: Charge
traits.text: If the beast moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a maul attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 1d6 slashing damage. The DC equals your spell save DC. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a Strength saving throw against your spell save DC or be knocked prone.

traits.name: Primal Rebirth
traits.text: If the beast has died within the last hour, you can use your action to touch it and expend a spell slot of 1st level or higher. The beast returns to life after 1 minute with all its hit points restored.

traits.name: Ready Companion
traits.text: As a bonus action, you can command the beast to make its maul attack or to Hide.

actions.name: Maul
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 1d6 + 2 slashing damage.

name: Wildfire Spirit
hp: equal to the wildfire spirit's Constitution modifier + your Wisdom modifier + five times your level in this class

traits.name: Soul Bond
traits.text: The following numbers increase by 1 when your proficiency bonus increases by 1: the spirit's skill and saving throw bonuses above, the bonuses to hit and damage of its Flame Seed, and the bonus to damage of its Fiery Teleportation.

actions.name: Flame Seed
actions.text: Ranged weapon attack +4 to hit, range 30 ft., one target you can see. On hit: 1d6 + 2 fire damage.

actions.name: Fiery Teleportation (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
actions.text: The spirit and each willing creature of your choice within 5 feet of it teleport up to 30 feet to unoccupied spaces you can see. Each creature within 10 feet of the space that the spirit left must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw against your spell save DC or take 1d6 + 2 fire damage.

traits.name: Dwarven Resilience
traits.text: Ahmaergo has advantage on saving throws against being poisoned.

traits.name: Indomitable (2/Day)
traits.text: Ahmaergo can reroll a saving throw that he fails. He must use the new roll.

traits.name: Second Wind (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
traits.text: As a bonus action, Ahmaergo can regain 20 hit points.

traits.name: Extra Damage
traits.text: If Ahmaergo has more than half his hit points remaining he deals an extra 7 (2d6) slashing damage on every hit.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Ahmaergo makes three attacks with his greataxe.

actions.name: Greataxe
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 11 (1d12 + 5) slashing damage

actions.name: Heavy Crossbow
actions.text: Ranged weapon attack +6 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. On hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Quarterstaff
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 2 (1d6 - 1) bludgeoning damage, or 3 (1d8 - 1) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.text: The rat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 1 piercing damage.

traits.name: Special Equipment
traits.text: Barnibus carries a wand of magic detection. (spell included in spell list below but does not use a slot when cast from the wand)

actions.name: Dagger
actions.text: Melee or ranged weapon attack +2 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. On hit: 2 (1d4) piercing damage.

traits.name: Halfling Nimbleness
traits.text: Bepis can move through a space occupied by a creature of a size larger than him

traits.name: Brave
traits.text: Bepis has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

traits.name: Cunning Action
traits.text: On each of her turns, the Black Viper can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

traits.name: Evasion
traits.text: If the Black Viper is subjected to an effect that allows her to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, she instead takes no damage if she succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if she fails. She can't use this trait if she's incapacitated.

traits.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
traits.text: The Black Viper deals an extra 14 (4d6) damage when she hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the Black Viper that isn't incapacitated and the Black Viper doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The Black Viper makes three attacks with her rapier.

actions.name: Rapier
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 7 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Hand Crossbow
actions.text: Ranged weapon attack +7 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. On hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.text: Davil has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put him to sleep.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage. Or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. On hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

traits.name: Shapechanger
traits.text: The mimic can use its action to polymorph into an object or back into its true, amorphous form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

traits.name: Adhesive (Object Form Only)
traits.text: The mimic adheres to anything that touches it. A Huge or smaller creature adhered to the mimic is also grappled by it (escape DC 13). Ability checks made to escape this grapple have disadvantage.

traits.name: False Appearance (Object Form Only)
traits.text: While the mimic remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary object.

traits.name: Grappler
traits.text: The mimic has advantage on attack rolls against any creature grappled by it.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The mimic can make three attacks; two with its pseudopods and one with its bite

actions.name: Pseudopod
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage. If the mimic is in object form, the target is subjected to its Adhesive trait.

actions.name: Bite
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) acid damage.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.text: The drow has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put the drow to sleep.

traits.name: Gunslinger
traits.text: Being within 5 feet of a hostile creature or attacking at long range doesn't impose disadvantage on the drow's ranged attack rolls with a pistol. In addition, the drow ignores half cover and three-quarters cover when making ranged attacks with a pistol.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.text: While in sunlight, the drow has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: The drow makes two shortsword attacks.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Poisonous Pistol
actions.text: Ranged weapon attack +6 to hit, range 30/90 ft., one target. On hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) piercing damage plus 11 (2d10) poison damage.

traits.name: Special Equipment
traits.text: Durnan wields a sword of sharpness (greatsword) called Grimvault. He wears boots of striding and springing, elven chain, and a ring of spell turning.

traits.name: Indomitable (Recharges after a Long Rest)
traits.text: Durnan can reroll a saving throw that he fails. He must use the new roll.

traits.name: Spell Turning
traits.text: While wearing his ring of spell turning, Durnan has advantage on saving throws against any spell that targets only him (not in an area of effect). If Durnan rolls a 20 for the save and the spell is 7th level or lower, the spell has no effect on him and instead targets the caster, using the slot level, spell save DC, attack bonus, and spellcasting ability of the caster.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Durnan makes four melee weapon attacks.

actions.name: Grimvault
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage. If the target is an object, the hit instead deals 16 slashing damage. If the target is a creature and Durnan rolls a 20 on the d20 for the attack roll, the target takes an extra 14 slashing damage, and Durnan rolls another d20. On a roll of 20, he lops off one of the target's limbs, or some other part of its body if it is limbless.

actions.name: Double Crossbow
actions.text: Ranged weapon attack +6 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. On hit: 13 (2d10 + 2) piercing damage.

traits.name: Gnome Cunning
traits.text: The gnome has advantage on all Intelligence, Wisdom and Charisma saving throws against magic.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 2 (1d4) piercing damage. Or Ranged Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. On hit: 2 (1d4) piercing damage.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.text: Fala has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put them to sleep.

actions.name: Quarterstaff
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +2 to hit or Melee Weapon Attack +4 to hit with shillelagh, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage with shillelagh or if wielded with two hands.

traits.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
traits.text: The staff is incapacitated while in the area of an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic, the staff must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall unconscious for 1 minute.

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.text: While the staff remains motionless and isn't flying, it is indistinguishable from a normal staff.

actions.name: Knife
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Lance
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit (with disadvantage against a target within 5 ft.), reach 10 ft., one target. On hit: 8 (1d12 + 2) piercing damage, or 11 (1d12 + 5) piercing damage while mounted.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage. Or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. On hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Feather Fall
actions.text: The rider wears a magic ring with which it can cast the feather fall spell on itself once as a reaction to falling. After the spell is cast, the ring becomes nonmagical.

traits.name: Relentless Endurance
traits.text: When reduced to 0 hit points, Grum'shar drops to 1 hit point instead. He can only do this once per long rest.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 2 (1d4) piercing damage. Or Ranged Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. On hit: 2 (1d4) piercing damage.

traits.name: Evasion
traits.text: If Hlam is subjected to an effect that allows him to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, he instead takes no damage if he succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if he fails. He can't use this trait if he's incapacitated.

traits.name: Magic Attacks
traits.text: Hlam's unarmed strikes are magical.

traits.name: Unarmored Defense
traits.text: While Hlam is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, his AC includes his Wisdom modifier.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Hlam attacks three times using his unarmed strike, darts, or both.

actions.name: Unarmed Strike
actions.text:
Melee weapon attack +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 12 (1d10 + 7) bludgeoning, magic damage. If the target is a creature, Hlam can choose one of the following additional effects:

The target must succeed on a DC 18 Strength saving throw or drop one item it is holding (Hlam's choice).

The target must succeed on a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw or be knocked prone.

The target must succeed on a DC 18 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of Hlam's next turn.

actions.name: Dart
actions.text: Ranged weapon attack +12 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. On hit: 9 (1d4 + 7) piercing damage.

actions.name: Quivering Palm (recharge on 6)
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +12 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. On hit: The target must make a DC 18 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target is reduced to 0 hit points. On a successful save, the target takes 55 (10d10) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Wholeness of Body (Recharges after a Long Rest)
actions.text: Hlam regains 60 hit points.

legendary_actions.name: ​
legendary_actions.text: The Hlam can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The Hlam regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary_actions.name: Quick Step
legendary_actions.text: Hlam moves up to his speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary_actions.name: Unarmed Strike (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.text: Hlam makes one unarmed strike.

legendary_actions.name: Invisibility (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary_actions.text: Hlam becomes invisible until the end of his next turn. The effect ends if Hlam attacks or casts a spell.

traits.name: Indomitable (2/Day)
traits.text: Hrabbaz can reroll a saving throw that he fails. He must use the new roll.

traits.name: Relentless Endurance (Recharges after a Long Rest)
traits.text: When Hrabbaz is reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, he drops to 1 hit point instead.

traits.name: Extra Damage
traits.text: As long as Hrabbaz has more than half his hit points left he deals an extra 3 (1d6) damage on all hits.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Hrabbaz makes three attacks with his morningstar.

actions.name: Morningstar
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) piercing damage.

traits.name: Dwarven Resilience
traits.text: Istrid has advantage on saving throws against being poisoned.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Istrid makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Maul
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 8 (2d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Treasure Sense (3/Day)
actions.text: Istrid magically pinpoints precious metals and stones, such as coins and gems, within 60 feet of her.

traits.name: Special Equipment
traits.text: Jalester carries a badge of the Watch.

traits.name: Second Wind (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
traits.text: As a bonus action, Jalester can regain 16 (1d10 + 11) hit points.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Jalester makes two weapon attacks.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage, or 7 (1d10 + 2) slashing damage when used with two hands.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage. Or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. On hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

traits.name: Dark Devotion
traits.text: Jandar has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Jandar makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. On hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage. Or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one creature. On hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

traits.name: Special Equipment
traits.text: Jarlaxle wears +3 leather armor, a hat of disguise, a bracer of flying daggers, a cloak of invisibility, a knave's eye patch, and a ring of truth telling. He wields a +3 rapier and carries a portable hole and a wand of web. His hat is adorned with a feather of diatryma summoning.

traits.name: Evasion
traits.text: If he is subjected to an effect that allows him to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, Jarlaxle instead takes no damage if he succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if he fails. He can't use this trait if he's incapacitated.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.text: Jarlaxle has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put him to sleep.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (1/Day)
traits.text: If Jarlaxle fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Master Attuner
traits.text: Jarlaxle can attune to up to five magic items, and he can attune to magic items that normally require attunement by a sorcerer, warlock, or wizard.

traits.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
traits.text: Jarlaxle deals an extra 24 (7d6) damage when he hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of Jarlaxle's that isn't incapacitated and Jarlaxle doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

traits.name: Suave Defense
traits.text: While Jarlaxle is wearing light or no armor and wielding no shield, his AC includes his Charisma modifier.

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.text: When not wearing his knave's eye patch, Jarlaxle has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.text: Jarlaxle makes three attacks with his +3 rapier or two attacks with daggers created by his bracer of flying daggers.

actions.name: +3 Rapier
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +14 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 13 (1d8 + 9) piercing damage.

actions.name: Flying Dagger
actions.text: Ranged weapon attack +11 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. On hit: 8 (1d4 + 6) piercing damage.

legendary_actions.name: ​
legendary_actions.text: The Jarlaxle Baenre can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The Jarlaxle Baenre regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary_actions.name: Quick Step
legendary_actions.text: Jarlaxle moves up to his speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary_actions.name: Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.text: Jarlaxle makes one attack with his +3 rapier or two attacks with daggers created by his bracer of flying daggers.

traits.name: Special Equipment
traits.text: Kaevja carries a yellow elemental gem. As an action she can break the gem releasing an earth elemental under her command.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.text: Melee weapon attack +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. On hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage. Or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. On hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

traits.name: Fey Ancestry
traits.text: Kalain has advantage on saving throws against being charmed and magic can't put her to sleep.

traits.name: Art Imitates Life (3/Day)
traits.text: Kalain touches one of her paintings and causes its subject to spring forth, becoming a creature of that kind provided its CR is 3 or lower. The creature appears in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the painting, which becomes blank. The creature is friendly toward Kalain and hostile toward all others. It rolls initiative to determine when it acts. It disappears after 1 minute, when it is reduced to 0 hit points, or when Kalain dies or falls unconscious.

actions.name: Spellfire (Recharges after a Long Rest)
actions.text:
Magical, heatless, silver fire harmlessly erupts from Laeral and surrounds her until she is incapacitated or until she uses an action to quench it. She gains one of the following benefits of her choice, which lasts until the silver fire ends:

• She can breathe underwater.
• She can survive without food and water.
• She is immune to magic that would ascertain her thoughts, truthfulness, alignment, or creature type.
• She gains resistance to cold damage, and she is unharmed by temperatures as low as -50 degrees Fahrenheit.
While the silver fire is present, she has the following additional action options:

• Cast the cure wounds spell. The target regains 1d8 + 5 hit points. After Laeral takes this action, roll a d6. On a roll of 1, the silver fire disappears.
• Cast the revivify spell without material components. After Laeral takes this action, roll a d6. On a roll of 1-2, the silver fire disappears.
• Release a 60-foot line of silver fire that is 5 feet wide or a 30-foot cone of silver fire. Objects in the area that aren't being worn or carried take 26 (4d12) fire damage. Each creature in the area must succeed on a DC 21 Dexterity saving throw, taking 26 (4d12) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. After Laeral takes this action, roll a d6. On a roll of 1-3, the silver fire disappears
